name: Her Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Floral..Scent Type: Fruity Floral..Key Notes: Blackcurrant, Jasmine Accord, White Woods, Musk, Dry Amber..Fragrance Description: A fruity gourmand scent opening with a trio of dark and red berries lightened by white woody accord. A blend of jasmine and violet unfurl, illuminated by a bright accord of white woods. Amber and musk envelop this long lasting scent, further elevating the fusion of floral and fruity facets...About the Bottle: A creation by master perfumer Francis Kurkdjian, this Burberry fragrance represents dynamic women with a zest for life and love of stepping into the unknown. Effortlessly chic, the understated bottle is topped with a light pink cap, echoing the luminosity of the feminine scent within...About the Fragrance: Burberry Her Eau de Parfum is an artful blend of berries elevated by spirited jasmine and violet, and smoothed out with amber and musk. A fruity floral creation bringing together berries, jasmine and violet, grounded by an ambery and musky base. A multi-faceted, long lasting fruity gourmand scent.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance, Water, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Limonene, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Linalool, Bht, Alcohol, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Ext. Violet 2 (Ci 60730), Red 33 (Ci 17200), Yellow 5 (Ci 19140).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent..-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly..-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent..-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

reviews.review_text: As someone who loves a good gourmand scent, this perfume is a sweet little treat without being over-the-top. It gives me cherry vibes with a soft, powdery finish-very feminine and playful. It's the kind of fragrance that makes you feel effortlessly put-together, like you're stepping into your soft girl era. That said, the longevity isn't the best. It fades after about 4 hours, which is a bit of a letdown because I like my perfumes to last all day. But if you're okay with reapplying or you don't mind a lighter scent, this could still be a great pick. What really stands out to me is how youthful and girly it feels-like the perfect blend of sweetness and sophistication. It's giving brunch with the girls or a casual day out when you want to smell fresh and flirty. I still like it. Burberry

reviews.review_title: One of my new favorite perfume!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume! Burberry Her Eau de Parfum quickly became one of my favorites. The fruity top notes of blackberry and red fruits are so refreshing, while the heart of jasmine and violet adds a soft, floral elegance. As it settles, the warm, creamy base of musk and amber gives it a depth that's both comforting and sophisticated. It’s the perfect balance of fresh and refined, and I find myself reaching for it for both everyday wear and special occasions. The scent lasts beautifully throughout the day, making it an all-around perfect choice.

reviews.review_title: A Must-Have Juicy Mix Of Berries
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Her is one of those perfumes that just makes you feel good the second you spray it. It kicks off with this super juicy mix of berries—sweet, but not over-the-top—like a perfect summer smoothie. Then, as it settles, you get these soft floral vibes from jasmine and violet that make it feel a little more grown-up without being too serious ;)  The base is where the magic happens—it’s warm, musky, and just cozy enough to feel like a hug in a bottle. Plus, it lasts forever, so you won’t need to keep reapplying all day. The scent isn’t too loud, either—people will notice it, but it won’t take over the room.    The bottle is simple but super pretty, with its blush pink tone giving total “clean girl” and “coquette” vibes. 🎀🦢  All in all, Burberry Her is playful, chic, and so easy to wear. Whether you’re running errands or heading out for drinks, it’s a go-to scent that feels fresh and fun every time. 🩵

Its musky, amber base adds depth, making it versatile for both daytime and evening wear. The scent is long-lasting without being overpowering, and the sleek, minimalist bottle reflects its modern elegance. A great choice for anyone seeking a youthful, feminine perfume with a touch of luxury.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Her is a delightful fragrance that perfectly balances fruity and floral notes, making it a great choice for everyday wear. The opening is sweet and vibrant, with bursts of red berries that feel fresh and playful, while the dry-down reveals a creamy, musky undertone that adds sophistication.  The scent lasts a good 6–8 hours, which is impressive, but it’s not as strong as I’d hoped for a luxury fragrance—I’d describe the sillage as moderate. The bottle design is sleek and elegant, perfectly capturing the modern yet timeless essence of the brand.  Overall, it’s a beautiful fragrance for those who enjoy sweet, fruity scents with a hint of depth. If you’re looking for a signature scent that’s feminine and versatile, Burberry Her is worth considering!  (Incentivized)

reviews.review_text: I'm not a gourmand lover but I did like this perfume. It smells fruity and clean to me, not sugary. The throw is low and the scent didn't last all day on me, which is why I chose four stars. I would expect an EDP to last longer. However, it does smell great, very femme without leaning too sweet. It's a versatile fragrance I could wear year round, day or night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has a very nice sweet fruity/floral scent with a slight musk. It is very classy and perfect for day-to-day or going out. A small spray goes a long way and it stuck around even after washing it off my hands. I'll probably end up buying a larger size of it since it is quite nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent smells so good! It definitely smells like an expensive and rich perfume. It’s got a fruity and woody scent and it works perfectly for work or going out!

reviews.review_title: Amazing! Might be my new signature scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing and lasts over 6hrs. It’s not overly strong but has a nice cast for a wide range of an area to smell. Fruity yet sultry. A very sexy adult feminine fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is the greatest. Has a simple yet elegant smell to it that I love! It's also great for my pink girlies who love pink since the bottle is all pink.🩷 I definitely would buy the full-size version of this since it lasted a long time, so it would definitely be worth the money. Hope you guys buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is clean and fruity (think strawberries) the only reason I gave 4 stars and not 5 is because although the scent is lovely it does not seem to last as long as others. It is pricey but I do get a lot of compliments!
The perfume did not smell like the sample at the store and it made my head hurt. I would not recommend buying this perfume at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very feminine and delicate fragrance. I like it more and more everyday I try it. For me it’s more of a floral than a gourmand scent, the berries are very subtle. Very wearable, for day and night and the full size packaging it’s in a beautiful pink tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think the scent is great. Im used to wearing Gucci perfumes, and this was such a clean and fun scent to change things up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells very good! It’s very fresh and floral smelling . I love the actual packaging ! It’s so pretty! I also love their other scent that they have . Might have to buy this in a full size !

reviews.review_title: Just Your Basic Floral Perfume Scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The description stated berry notes and a white woody accord but all I could smell is a sharp floral scent which cause me to sneeze when applying (and I’m not normally sensitive to smells). This scent reminded me of bottles of Victoria Secret floral perfumes which is disappointing knowing the high price and luxury brand this is. This scent is nothing to write home about, just a stereotypical floral perfume scent with no distinctive notes underneath it. The only big pro was the durability of scent strength - it lasted a whole 8hr work day on my wrists and neck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have recieved this as a free sample in return of a honest review. I have never ever smelt this brand before and I absolutely love it. It's not to strong of a scent. It has a good linger through out the day like other perfumes. I highly recommended people trying this scent.

reviews.review_title: Woodsy, berry, blissful scent and is long lasting!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not one for perfumes very often, but I was pleasantly surprised by how good the BH perfume smells. I really enjoy the woodsy and berry tones in the scent and can wear this anywhere! It’s not an overwhelming scent for other people, and it lasts a long time with just one or two spritz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so good! It smells too sweet at first but once it settles it has a subtle but delicious smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this a few weeks ago and I love it. It's scent is amazing. The packaging is cute and versatile. It IA a great value for such a great product. I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent has the perfect blend of sweet and powdery musk leaving an intense yet soft lingering scent.  The price is definitely worth it for a perfume that stays all day!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first sprayed this on, I was mildly concerned because the deep berry overtones are VERY sweet. Not necessarily unpleasant, but they’re certainly loud.   However, throughout the day the scent becomes more complex and quite lovely. As the berry scent fades, the earthy undertones begin to come through, which adds complexity and, dare I say, allure. In general, this is a well-built perfume with great throw and longevity—I never had to reapply it and was still getting compliments towards the end of my work day.  Burberry has branded this perfume with a light pink colorway, but if I were in charge of the marketing for it, I would use more velvety and lush purple tones.  This perfume is a bit flirty for work, but I think it would be perfect for a spring or summer weekend in town.  I was given this sample from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall a nice smell, very fruity so if that’s your thing, it would be nice. Slightly musky but barely noticeable just enough to have a little balance with the fruitiness so it doesn’t smell like straight candy. The real bottle in the picture (not the sample) has a very beautiful classy flask shape that would be so aesthetic on my vanity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent!! I 10/10 recommend this product to smell good all day long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a small sample from influenster to write review. It have soft and floral scent. Cute small package. I would say it last probably 5-7 hours. Easy to spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Her Eau de Parfum is a true masterpiece in the world of fragrances. Its scent impresses with its freshness, softness, and perfect balance. The top notes of berries, such as strawberry and raspberry, open brightly and juicy, followed by a delicate floral heart of jasmine that adds a feminine touch. The woody base notes create a refined and elegant finish. The perfume has excellent longevity, lasting all day on the skin with great projection. The minimalist packaging adds a classy touch, perfectly complementing this beautiful fragrance.

reviews.review_title: Delightful mix and perfect for any occasion
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Her Eau de Parfum is a delightful mix of sweet red and dark berries balanced with a soft, woody warmth. The scent feels vibrant and playful but still elegant, making it perfect for any occasion.  The packaging is sleek and minimal, with a pretty pink design that’s simple yet stylish. It has moderate projection, noticeable without being overpowering, and lasts about 6-8 hours. For the price, it offers great value, especially if you’re looking for a versatile, feminine fragrance that stands out.

reviews.review_title: A must have for date night
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off the smell…AMAZING!! Packaging is very cute! The value is definitely not great but it is a high end brand so I will give it that. It sprays very good but not too hard to shoot you in one direct area.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The notes are dark berry and white woody accord and that is spot on! It’s fruity from the berry but not overly sweet or fruity and then it has a hint of woodsy that mixes perfectly! It lasts a long time and the scent is lovely! It’s not overpowering or giving me a headache because it’s so strong I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been looking for a new signature scent and this may have to be it! It’s sweet and fruity, but not too strong! It has a creamy vanilla and floral vibe. I got so many compliments when I wore it, and it lasted a long time too! It’s great for any occasion but I could see myself using it during the day as a signature scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely scent and last long as expected. Unfortunately I received a sample size for this perfume so not sure about its packaging or if it’s worth the money for the full bottle. But for me, it does smell great and stay for a few hours. I usually apply it on my arm, neck and under the wrist. I refer a lightly scent on me, not so strong so I like this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried Burberry Her Eau de Parfum, and it’s such a gorgeous scent! It starts off super sweet with a mix of berries—like strawberries and raspberries—but it’s not overpowering. After a while, it settles into this warm, soft, floral vibe that feels really classy but still fun and youthful.  I got the 1.5 ml sample, and it’s perfect for throwing in my bag. It lasts a good 4-6 hours, which is decent for an eau de parfum, and it’s not too strong, so I feel like I could wear it anywhere—day or night. If you love sweet, fruity perfumes with a bit of elegance, this one’s definitely worth trying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! The Burberry Her perfume has a beautiful scent!! It reminds me of vanilla and flowers and clean laundry. Like walking into a clean home where someone is baking sugar cookies and loves floral arrangements. The scent also lasts a really long time. I love this perfume!! I will definitely be adding it to my daily rotation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love Burberry’s Her scent and this sample size I received is the perfect travel companion to keep on hand. You can wear this day or night. It’s so beautiful and feminine, not too strong or light. This is definitely one of my favorite perfumes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice smelling fragrance! Came in nice packaging and the scent projection is strong. It is sweet yet fruity and very feminine. I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is very sweet and gourmand. This is a fruity scent. The packaging is very cute and good quailty. The scent is very strong and long lasting, and you get a great product for the price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

It’s a versatile fragrance that pairs well with both daytime and evening looks but shines best during warmer seasons. As for longevity, Burberry Her Eau de Parfum lasts about 6-8 hours on the skin and even longer on clothes. I think the perfume is sweet but has pleasant notes.

reviews.review_title: Great product, a little on the pricey side
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Her Eau de Parfum is a stunning fragrance that combines vibrant, fruity notes with a soft floral undertone, creating a modern yet timeless scent. The packaging is sleek and elegant, reflecting the luxury of the brand. It has excellent versatility, easily transitioning from day to night, and offers solid projection, ensuring you’ll be noticed without being overpowering. While it’s on the pricier side, the quality and lasting power make it a worthwhile investment for anyone who appreciates a refined, signature scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

Perfect for a date night but also as an everyday option! It also stays for a long time on my skin! I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I decided to stop in at the Sephora in Disneyland while there for a wedding. Finally, an amazing lady working at Sephora helped me find this. Now, I wear it everyday. I will even spritz my bed cover with it every once in a while. I can’t get enough of it! Serious win for me! I guess we all just have to find the one that fits our body chemistry, and this was the winner for me.
If you like sweet smelling perfume it's amazing! Super lovely and lasts all day.

reviews.review_text: I received this trio set for free from influenster and Burberry as an incentive in exchange for my honest review. I’m very particular about my perfumes… so I was pleasantly surprised at how much I love this Her Trio set. They all three have a little sweetness to them, but they all have their own subtle unique differences. The first one has a little sweetness, fruity and floral notes to it. It has a little of everything…. It was my favorite. The second one has a bit more sweet gourmand notes in it with a little floral in there. The third one smells more clean and fresh with a little sweet floral notes as well. They’re all unique but they all smell so good. I think I would buy a full size of the first one to start off. I’ll eventually get all three!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in my VoxBox from Influenster to test and leave an honest review. I will start by saying that I was really excited to try this as I have been on the hunt for a new fragrance and Burberry is a very distinguished brand. I really wanted to like it but unfortunately it just wasn’t a fit for me. When I first sprayed it on my wrist, it had a soft, powdery, slightly sweet scent. Perhaps it’s my chemistry but after a minute or so, it took on a very artificial smell. I thought that it may be due to my soap or lotion so I tried it several times over the next few days, being certain to not apply anything else to my skin but still found it to be unpleasant. In terms of staying power, it also did not last very long and after a couple hours, there was little to no trace of it.  And so my search continues for the perfect fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this a few days after I bought YSL's Black Opium Le Parfum because I wanted something similar, but not as nauseating for hotter days. The sweet smell this has is definitely similar, on me at least (maybe my skin just likes vanilla), so if you like that one I think you'd enjoy this one, and vice versa.  I will say it does initially feel like the sweetness is a bit much for hot days, but it does become really light after you give it a little to fade. I think it's kind of just the nature of fragrances with vanilla notes, so I'd still recommend it for hot days if you don't mind that. Alternatively this could work nice for a night out or a date just because of the vanilla. It lasts quite nicely, and while it doesn't stay horribly strong it's still noticeable and the smell is very nice. I definitely think I'm going to use this for when I go out with friends and family

More than a decade passed and this perfume brought me down memory lane. It's super light, feminine, creamy and fruity but in the lightest way. The lasting power is enough for me, but I can see it being an issue for people who mind replying once during the day ( I don't). Anyway I love this. I think if you like very light, innocent and sweet scents, you could potentially really like this.

The guns likes it a lot and my 5 yr old son said mama smells yummy 😋 HOWEVER, it fades too quickly! I just want it to linger longer before I have to go back and christen myself with it again! It . reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to buy a perfume online just by reading a description, so I went to Sephora and smelled...I'm not kidding...probably 20 different perfumes. I feel like when you're in search of something and you find it, you just KNOW it's the right one! So this is what I bought. It brought me back to my days in college wearing Burberry Brit and Burberry but this one is a little more floral/fruity/vanilla and to me, is more of a spring/summery scent but here I am wearing it in January. :-)

I love this scent! I like perfumes that are very sweet & this is sweet, & a lil fruit smell. Definitely would get again but not my favorite. Nothing has topped my favorite perfume of all time Valentino

reviews.review_title: Great scent but big bottle doesn’t really last
reviews.review_text: I got a mini sample when I ordered smt else about a month ago and fell in love with it so purchased the big bottle and the mini one lasted so well but the big one doesn’t seem to for some reason. I still recommend but keep that in mind
I waited too long to get this fragrance. I love it so!
Sweet, creamy, delicious. Completely irresistible.
I love this fragrance! It’s a sweet floral fresh scent. This can be an everyday scent. Very beautiful!

reviews.review_title: More like a body spray. Not worth the money
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this perfume for 2 weeks and the smell is amazing but it doesn’t last. For the price, I was expecting for it to be more long lasting and strong. Is like putting a body splash on. The Cheirosa 68 smell stronger and better
The scent lasts for a while, but I found it too sweet smelling for what I like for myself. It started to give me a headache even after the top note disappeared. Returned for this reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Great scent…too bad it doesn’t last

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

I will still gift them but I'm disappointed in the packaging itself. I've included a pic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance. I’m getting the Elixer one too. To me it smells like strawberries and cream. It doesn’t protect much but stays on your skin, close up for hours. It a luxury scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing . Definitely will buy the large bottle .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has to be my least favourite I’ve ever smelt. Now, perfume does gear towards scent preference but this perfume is sickening. Anytime I smell it on someone or when I’ve worn it as a sample I feel nauseous, it’s just way too sweet. Don’t think this is a nice scent at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sadly, This one did not agree with me at all. It smells like I’m hugging a baby who just a couple hours ago had strawberry yogurt smeared all over his face and arms and instead of getting a bath he just got it wiped off and after that his uncle gave him a huge hug so now the baby smells like a mix of hot strawberry yogurt with baby wipes’ scent and uncle’s sweat. (there’s something masculine in this scent) Definitely not a sexy fragrance to my nose at all! You might want to try it before you buy it…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IT LASTS SO LONG LIKE IM NOT EVEN JOKING I TOOK A SHOWER AND I COULD SMELL IT THE DAY AFTER A LITTLE STILL. LITERALLY ALLLLLL MY FRIENDS STEAL IT FROM ME BECAUSE IT SMELLS SO GOOD AND LIKE EVEN MY CRUSH TELLS ME I SMELL GOOD WHEN I WEAR IT LIT BUY IT ASAP

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this it’s fruity. Smells like strawberries. Something you’d use in high school. It was a blind buy and I am so happy with my purchase. I love fruity floral scents and this was amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for about two years and I’m still in love. I’m on my second bottle (which needs to get replaced soon lol) I love sweet & fruity scents and this perfume is perfect!

reviews.review_title: Smells like the colour pink in the best way! 💖🎀
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful fruity & girly scent! Reminds me of fizzy pink pop-rock candy and strawberry milkshakes. Something every girl needs in their collection, makes my eyes roll back with the sparkly sweet notes it pumps out for the first 2 hours. Decent longevity on clothes vs skin in my opinion, I can smell the spritz on my shirt from the morning but my chest & wrists usually don’t last.  Added bonus - for how “girly” it smells, I was pleasantly surprised that my boyfriend absolutely loved it on me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally strawberry cream syrupy with a hint of floral, its nice and i can see literally any age group liking this, its just TOO sweet for me. Im sell!ng my 50ml on my dep0p - designerwithd if anyone wants it !
Ohhh! How I love the scent of this fragrance!💕 it doesn’t last sooo long but I enjoy every single hour it last, smells like flowers or yeah something like flowers! I’m in loveee!

reviews.review_title: Love but scent does not last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent but it does not last long at all. Not worth it at all in my option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: While I love the scent, it's so sweet that I have it to my granddaughter. it's definitely not a mature scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: THIS SMELL IS PERFECTION. I love it on its own or layered with Miss Dior for a more mature scent. Love love love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first impression of this scent was that it smelled amazing, light, airy and floral! I picked up scents of vanilla and a mixture of berries! I loved that it was not too overwhelming but strong enough to keep me smelling nice all day. I enjoyed wearing this as my normal daily fragrance! I just wish I had a bigger size bottle instead of the sample because I would definitely add this to my normal daily routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the smell! I’m just stuck in my ways of my normal perfume. It lasted much longer than I anticipated, which is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this perfume so badly… I bought it in December of last year and reached for it maybe 5x. It smells very “young/ high school” and artificially/chemically sweet. Did not live up to my expectations.

i recently repurchased the 100ml bottle because i love it that much. the opening is a beautiful strawberry fragrance that smells almost like a milkshake. it is sophisticated, and has beautiful subtle notes of jasmine as well as a bit of a powdery soft finish. it is light and airy, and lasts forever. as the scent warms to your skin, it develops into a beautiful slight vanilla strawberry musk that has a gorgeous depth to it.   this perfume is one of those perfumes you smell on others and it instantly grabs your attention. at every point in this fragrances performance, i truly believe it’s a head turner. my boyfriend (who knows absolutely nothing about perfume lol) loves this over every other fragrance i’ve tried. to put that into perspective, i’m a fragrance lover. it is an easy fragrance to throw on and smell beautiful no matter what time of day or year. simply beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice perfume. Only downside for me is that it doesn’t last as long as I would like and I bought the travel size at first to make sure I enjoyed how it smelled on me but the rollerball is just not it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been searching for a sweeter scent and this is just gorgeous. I'm not normally one to get a perfume to please others but I have to share this. The guy I'm seeing rarely complimented my perfume before Her (not that I smelled bad). When we smelled Her in store, I immediately perked up knowing I had to get it. He absolutely loved it too, and when I wore it for the first time with him he couldn't get his face out of my neck... It wears so beautifully and lasts all day! I put some in the crease of my elbows for the most long lasting power. Her is truly so addicting, get it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, feminine, fruity-floral scent. It's not a mature kind of scent in my opinion. It smells nice and strong at first, but didn't last too long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful fruity floral—just not on me. I love the scent out of the bottle but the dry down doesn’t work for my body. I don’t think me and Amber vibe too well, but otherwise pretty scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Call me crazy, but I personally think it’s way more similar to Delina than the Baccarat Rouge. For me they both have this fruity floral vibe, and they share some similar notes. Maybe it’s just on my skin though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is fruity and floral without being too overpowering. I usually avoid floral perfumes because they tend to smell very “old lady” to me, but this one is not so floral that it’s giving that old lady vibe. It’s described as “gourmand,” which if you didn’t know what that means (I didn’t either until I googled it), it means that it smells like things that are edible (in this case, a hint of berries and vanilla). I could smell it on me for a couple hours and then couldn’t smell it anymore, but others said that they could still smell a hint of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite perfume now. It smells so amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the mini size because I wasn’t sure if I actually liked it or not but now I’m obsessed ! It’s smells so good i have to buy a bigger size now !

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hey guy’s👋🏼 I just got my new sample of Burberry Her Elixir De Parfum from @influenster I most say this is my first time trying Burberry products and I absolutely love this product 😍. Smells good 😌. To try, I applied two spritzes on my wrist. Upon initial application and close-proximity smelling, there is a slight rubbing alcohol scent, but it dissipates completely in a couple of seconds.You are left with the fruity and sweet scent like strawberry 🍓 and vanilla,and the scent remains for a while.  I will recommend this to anyone. @burberry @sephora

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it smells soo sweet and good i love it. it lasts all day too. I spray it on in the morning and i can still smell it on my clothes the next days. the only downside is that it’s so expensive but that’s just me being broke

reviews.review_title: Must have definitely i will buy again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best sweet scented perfume i ever tried I received alot of compliments whenever i wear this one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the perfume! I was long lasting and a small spray goes a long way. I love the scent of dark berries which isn't overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this sample from Burberry & Influenster in exchange for my honest review.  This perfume gives off a warm vanilla scent that is both familiar and unique. The vanilla notes are strong but mingled with something less sugared and more like dark whiskey, then you catch the slightest sharpness of the berries. The dark vanillla lingers on the skin for most of the day making this a highly wearable scent. I liked this scent and found it was not too sweet to wear daily, but as there are a plethora of vanilla heavy scents on the market I am unlikely to  purchase.

When I received this sample I was not expecting to enjoy it as much as I do! Floral scents are usually too overwhelming for me and tend to stick with warmer notes. This floral scent is not overbearing and has subtle warmer notes which I enjoy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a 3 squirt tester to try and of course I love it! The scent seems to be a bit of a combination of sweet florals and musky Amber. Great perfume- but so very expensive

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me just say after a few uses I fell in love with the way this scent brings that crispness of fall with the freshness of lingering summer ! The best part.. it lasts all day without me being too intense. Absolutely love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells really good. Everyday time of perfume.  Fresh and fruity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my signature sent and I get asked about it all the time! Light and not overpowering

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for free from Influenster for my honest review.   I’m really picky with how perfumes smell because not everything smells the same on everyone. But this perfume is amazing. It almost smells familiar, kind of like the Pink Sugar perfume we all went crazy over. However, it’s more of a mature Pink Sugar scent. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful light fragrance.  I love that it smells different on each body. My friends complimented me so much. It is not super sweet or flowery but smells great. I just wish it lasted longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The longevity is alright but this just smells like “Ariana Grande Cloud” which is so basic now from the popularity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is my favorite perfume. so nice and light smelling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this perfume from Influenster. This perfume was initially very potent and had a strong vanilla and musky scent, but unfortunately, it mostly wore off within a few hours and took on more musk than vanilla as it settled. I didn’t find it a very attractive smell and people I asked said “it’s ok,” or “meh.” It was ok is all I can say and I wouldn’t purchase it.

reviews.review_title: I like it better than Lancôme
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best smelling perfume that I have ever had. I like it better than Lancôme. The smell is perfect. The Vanilla and amber smells so good and I love that the smell last even days after it’s been sprayed. Well worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free for me to review. When I first received this product I was pleasantly surprised, normally I stay away from perfume with hints of vanilla. With this perfume it's more floral than vanilla. It's a soft scent but long lasting. And an everyday wear kind of perfume. This perfume is a total win and must have. Great job Burberry!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: PLEASE smell this on your skin and not on a perfume blotter, smelled so grossly sweet on the paper but smells amazing on the skin. very berry and musky, almost like mon paris intensement but with more strawberries
This scent is sooo sexy it’s intoxicating! I don’t know how to describe it, but I LOVE it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: one of my favorite perfumes! Smells very sweet and feminine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was cute at first, but I after having it for a few months, it made a bunch of particulates and doesn’t smell as good any more
Loveeeee burberry her. super feminine, sweet, and fruity. my go to, definitely buy if your thinking about it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thin smell of typical high end floral-fruity perfumes. Without musk or spice, this perfume lacks sophistication.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like the perfume! Bought the mini to try before I spend on the full size. Smells of strawberries and a light floral hint that is perfect for any occasion. Truly a clean girl fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: her is the kind of scent that you have to be a very specific kind of person to enjoy. i’m not sure if i like it or dislike it completely. shes a very youthful fragrance, a sephora employee told me that her smells like a strawberry hello kitty eraser and i think it’s pretty dead on. this is NOT strawberry shortcake at all, it’s a very fruity fragrance and i can detect little to no vanilla unfortunately :( if u want to smell young and sweet, then this is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells perfect, exactly how I want it to- floral warm scent. However, nobody noticed it even if they hugged me and it wipes off my skin when I am taking a nap or doing something else in bed. I tried wearing Vaseline underneath and it helps, but It is not long lasting and I need to reapply throughout the day. I would recommend to someone who doesn’t care about having a signature scent that everyone associates you with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Queen. She smells amazing like a freshly baked and decorated strawberry shortcake. I’m in love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great sprayed on paper. It smelled awful on my skin after it dried down. Smelled very strong, overpowering, and cheap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE. i smelled it once and had to come back and buy it! Its such a lovely feminine scent. I will always repurchase this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute go-to perfume for all year round. I'm a fan of Brit for Her also, but this is my favorite Burberry scent. I always receive compliments when I wear it. Overall the smell I get from this is more fresh than fruity. When it dries down on my skin it's like a clean cotton smell. Nice and light, not overpowering. Love it!

reviews.review_title: Agree with the “it follows you” review below
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not sure why there are so many other reviewers that mentioned this perfume’s scent didn’t last long on them. This perfume lingered even after I showered with a scented body wash. Maybe it’s because I purchased the rollerball? I applied this at my nape, and lower back. It’s been 2 days and I can still smell it faintly. I will be repurchasing it in a full size because I am so in love. If you like the scent of jasmine and/or fruity scents, try this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great smelling perfume! My only thing is it doesn’t really last long, but great for everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this perfume is such a sweet, nice scent i love it. the rollerball applicator is perfect i would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In all honesty I bought this perfume because of TikTok. I thought it was going to smell like sweet strawberries or just have a really sweet scent, but whenever it arrived it smells more like strawberry wine. It has a bit of a masculine scent.. in my opinion of course. But I still like this perfume and I’ll continue to wear it. Maybe if I wear strawberry lotion it will help compliment this perfume. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love the smell of this perfume. fruity but not too juvenile and is a great everyday scent but it does not last long whatsoever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I get compliments every time I wear it. It smells so good on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it but the scent doesn’t last too long. Have to keep applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: You know that horror movie, It Follows, where a supernatural entity slowly follows the protagonist throughout the film... and if it catches up it will kill her? Wearing this perfume was a lot like that.  It followed me around for days and days. I thought I was safe and then I would get a whiff on the wind and think it's still here.   So if that's what you're looking for in a perfume, you'll be happy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing new favourite perfume 10/10 recommended super light and fruity

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: received a sample of this and couldn’t stop thinking about it so i had to purchase a full size, lasts all day and has an addicting scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so glad I received a sample size to try before spending money on a larger bottle. This perfume did not mix with my body chemistry at all. I could not wait to get home to shower and wash away this terrible scent. Hard pass for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume ! One of the favourites till this day!
Amazing. It’s just something about this I just love so much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does smell amazing on others but when I wear it, I get a headache as it is a super sugary gourmand but sickening kind of smell when it lingers too long.

reviews.review_title: Not really a fan but convenient for travel
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Heavier than expected not sure i will use often but convenient for travel

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I Liked this scent, it lasted forever! To me the scent opened as a very fruity and sweet scent. It dried down to a more light floral fruity scent. It smelt like a mature version of a very good smelling candy. I took off a star because it was a little to sweet for me but many other would definitely enjoy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this fragrance. Smells very professional and I use it as my work perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this perfume. It smells so fresh and feminine! I always receive a lot of compliments while wearing it. The only negative point is that the smell doesn’t last long (2h).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A beautiful floral perfume that isn't too sweet and still feels sexy and light.  I'm in my 30s and it doesn't feel too girly or young.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been searching for a new staple fragrance for a while and had thought about this one a lot. I smelled it on my skin many times before at Sephora and then I finally bought it. I was looking for a subtly sweet fragrance. I like florals and light scents and was really excited for Burberry Her. After using it once after buying it, I grew tired of the scent. It was an overpowering sweet fragrance that I knew I would never reach for again. I returned the product and got Beach Walk instead

reviews.review_title: i hate it but y friend liked it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: never have i had to change after i tried perfume so this is certainly a first. its constantly making me uncomfortable but my friend liked it on me and asked for the brand so i guess it isnt one star but its a very specific niche. i hate it to its core.

reviews.review_title: amazing smell with a timeframe for usage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing smell but it only last 20 minutes!!! I’m so upset!! Paid over 100 for 20 minutes?! Seriously Burberry ?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and it’s a very generic scent… like the smell of cheap shampoo or one of those celebrity perfumes that I used to wear in high school. It doesn’t smell bad, just very boring. It’s pretty non-offensive and I can see it being a crowd pleaser because of that. I prefer my fragrances to smell more luxurious than this. It’s a pass for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite scent ever! It smells so nice and I put it on for every occasion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this in my Sephora order and am 100% purchasing the bigger bottle. It's so light and fruity but also has a slight woody overlay that makes it more elegant. If whimsical was a scent, this would be it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth every penny. If you like sweet or fruity it's a great purchase. Reminds me of strawberry shortcake. It works for casual or work. It makes me seem so put together lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. A friend of mine recommended it to me so I gave it a try. I fell inlove with it. If you like sweet scent but not overpowering this one is for you.

This is disappointing on me. I love all the scents in the notes but on me it goes on so chemical and fake smelling at first. Smells soapy almost like a cheap fruity bubble bath you'd get a dollar store. It does NOT react well with my skin. Not offensive, just wrong for me.
I love this perfume, it’s my everyday perfume. When I layer it with a scented lotion I get lots of compliments <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so good at first but after like 40 minutes it smells like baby powder!?! Super disappointed cuz i loved the smell at first

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing!! The only thing I dislike is that it does not last long on me.

reviews.review_title: a must have if you like sweet
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a very fruity & sweet scent & i absolutely love it as that’s the kind of scent i’m into! but later on more of the musk note comes out on my skin & balances it out beautifully! in my opinion, this is not a dupe for BR540, they are very different as i have both in my collection. both are beautiful tho & last a long time on the skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sweet smelling.  Lasts long and is not over powering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this perfume! It smells like fruity florals, it’s definitely a spring/summer scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like it! It smells very good and I receive a lot of compliments. The only negative point is that it doesn’t smell all day long but it’s still a very good perfume and I’ll definitely repurchase!
It smells so good  It's a floral perfume and you'll get so much compliments on it  however, i have to spray it a lot so that it lasts throughout the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate musk, that is why this is not for me, I will say the musk isn't as strong so I didn't hate as much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells nice but doesn’t last all day in my opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve gotten many compliments when wearing this perfume. I love it so far, the smell is just perfect not to strong but still stays throughout my he whole day. I will definitely re-purchase once I need another one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has just recently become one of my most favorite go-to fragrances after choosing this as a sample in my Sephora order   …and I have 20-30 others that I regularly rotate and wear …but I grab this one when I’m in a hurry and don’t want to think too hard about what scent to wear that day.  It’s a no-brainer — soft, feminine, lovely, does NOT induce headaches when oversprayed, can wear it in the summertime without gagging that it’s too sweet/strong/cloying.  Men seem to love this one (likely because yes, it’s soft and feminine).  It’s sweet but definitely not overly sweet.  I can’t stand sweet perfumes (they actually make me nauseous) but this one isn’t in that category.  It’s a timeless scent and can be worn by young and old alike.  It also layers & blends beautifully with vanilla scents.  I think even those who get this as a “blind buy” will love it.  As for myself, I’ll likely have this one in my collection for a long time..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had to get this perfume the first time I smelt it but when I got my bottle at first I thought this perfume smelt plastic or like a dentists office, I was going to return it but the more I use it the more I just absolutely fall in love with this scent, so light airy and sweet. Feminine and sophisticated. I want to buy the intense version now because I hear they’re going to discontinue it and i love this scent so much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If  you like a sweet fragante, this is your perfum, the smell lasts Long time and smell very delicious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a blind buy for me while I was in Duty Free. It smells amazing. The staying power isn’t really there, that being said, I feel like this a perfume you can keep spraying and not get a headache. Spray it all over, hair, clothes, skin, go crazy. Also…THE MEN LOVE THIS SCENT. Why?? Idk. But it’s for sure a compliment getter and head turner. Buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a no-go if you don’t like powdery fragrances. Literally smells like I covered myself in baby powder. Tried to scrub it off in the bathroom at work and I can still smell it quite strongly so + 1 star for staying power at least if you do like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first sprayed this fragrance, it smelt like expensive baby powder. Which isn’t a bad thing in my opinion. BUT the dry down smell was horrible, it reminded me of an old lady perfume that went stale. I have never done a Sephora return. But I did for this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this smells amazing. it’s sweet but subtle and soft. however i did find that the longevity doesn’t last as long as other fragrances i have. nevertheless, i still 100% recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells like a scented strawberry shortcake doll but in a good way & lasted all day on me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent makes me feel so Chic & Girly but Sophisticated at the same time. I feel so beautiful when I wear it and can’t stop smelling myself. This fragrance will ALWAYS be a go-to in my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My mother absolutely loves this because she took it from me and used the entire bottle. It’s ageless and smells amazing I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: the scent lasts so long and i absolutely love it. i get compliments all the time when i’m wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: im disappointed in this. to me it smells exactly like ariana grande cloud with just a smidge of strawberry… yes it’s very light and airy, definitely an everyday summer scent, but i will be returning. the intense version of the “her” line is the best of them all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Giorgi Armani My Way Florale has all the essence of a bed of flowers. I love its light floral scent to add an ethereal touch. It is a simple summer scent to keep you smelling nice My way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this as a blind buy and so so glad I did! At first I wasn’t sure about the scent but I feel like the more I wear it, the more I love this perfume. It’s sweet without being too overpowering and childish. Great for individuals who easily get headaches or are sensitive to fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very light floral sent. I honey am barely smell it. My man loves it on me. I will try to layering to see if I like it better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my go to spring perfumes, “Her Eau de Parfum” offers a sweet floral scent that lasts for a moderate amount of time. In terms of sillage, I would say it has a medium range, not too intimate or too overpowering; trending towards the former.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know what it is about this perfume but wow is it amazing!! it's just so different than anything I have been able to find up to now! It's sweet, warm, a tiny bit fruity, and just intoxicatingly delicious! It does seem light like a close skin scent so I do wish it was a tad stronger but I get faint wiffs of it as I'm wearing it and remember why I love it so much! It pairs perfectly with the new Sol De Janiero body butter deepening the scent that much more which I also love!! Just so so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so yummy, one of my new favorites. If you like miss Dior, flower bomb and ysl mon paris you will love this. Blind bought this & was not disappointed.

reviews.review_title: Like a Poof of Baby Powder Right Up Your Nose
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is ok, but the baby powder scent is too strong. I don't want to think of changing diapers when wearing a perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: nice sweet perfume. kind of reminds me of sprays from b&bw. doesn’t last long on my skin but i see why people like this so much. not sure if it’s worth the $$$

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite scent. it changes with time and smells better and better. they say if you don’t smell it on yourself that means it suits you so keep that in mind. others do smell it on me i do get compliments! its so different. sweet with attitude!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this. Initially smelled it in store and thought it smelled great, fruity and sweet which I like. But once I put it on me and wore it all day all I could smell is plastic baby dolls. All the sweetness went away and and it smelled off on me. Not worth the price in my opinion but perfume is different for everybody.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fruity and sweet smell , it’s one of my favorite parfume , it’s not too overwhelming and lasts all day , got a lot of compliments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! My fav perfume. I get compliments from men & women of how good it smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is amazing! It reminds me of Ariana Grande’s cloud perfume but it has less of a musk/smokey undertone. It is sweet sort of like cotton candy, and the floral notes are almost non existent. It also is long lasting, so it is an all around winner for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume!!!!! It’s the perfect day time perfume!!!! Not to heavy and such a refreshing sent. I will keep purchasing this over and over again!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first time i wore this perfume i had it as a sample from a Sephora order and when my boyfriend smelled the perfume on me, he fell in love with it so he bought it for me for my bday. This perfume is an amazing fruity floral scent. It smells like strawberry but not in a childish way at all. it's a very classy and girly perfume at the same time. It's long lasting on me and it could be worn for both the colder months and warmer ones as well. The bottle is pretty too. Would recommend.

THIS. It smells so beautiful guys I recommend. Although after a while it made me sick so be careful. Get the travel bottle its more convenient and if you absolutely love it then go for the bigger one. I bought mine a year ago and it still half way full so.

reviews.review_title: NEW FAVE, you need this scent!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had tried a tester of Kate spade new York eau de parfum at Ulta and absolutely fell in love. I bought a mini and when I tried it at home I noticed it had a very strange Metallic/lead undertone smell to it. It really turned me off and I was so bummed because I loved everything else about it. This smells exactly like the Kate spade, but without the gross Metallic smell and I am IN LOVE. 100% new favorite. I cannot stop smelling myself. Sweet, creamy strawberries is the best way to describe it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume and cannot get enough of it. I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it!! I switch between this scent and my marc jacob’s perfume for everyday use. It smells like strawberry wine so if you like sweet scents with a hint of champagne i would totally get this. The scent gets more subtle throughout the day but i still find that it still lasts a good amount of time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this perfume, it's been my signature scent for the fall/winter/spring, and it's absolutely gorgeous. it had such a sweet strawberry initial scent (to some it may seem a little artificial, so smell before you buy), but the dry down is insaneeee. it doesn't last insanely long on my skin, but long enough. it lasts forever on my clothes. i get compliments all the time on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light soft fragrance. It doesn’t bother my sinuses which is hard to find. Excellent for Spring and Summer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Impulse buy due to all the reviews and 100% disappointed. I pretty much convinced myself I needed it because of all the reviews comparing this to Baccarat 540 but a daytime version. This is wrong on so many levels. No one should even mention this perfume in the same sentence as MFK. It smells like a knock off perfume you buy at Walgreens in the worst way possible. My quickest return yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a sweet smell that lasts a long time. It’s almost too strong but not quite. I love it so much. It was kind of an impulse purchase and I’m so happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this perfume. On my body chemistry it smells fruity (but not overpowering) and you can really smell the berries at first. Then it will settle to fruity/musky scent. On me I find it lasts all day on my neck and clothes. I do find I get more compliments from men than women when I wear this. I guess men like that fruity, feminine scent. My boyfriend keeps telling me I can throw all my other perfumes out (except for the Coco Chanel) b/c nothing else beats this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume has a sweet subtle floral scent to it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing, mixes well with my body chemistry and smells like berries on me! It's sweet like how Strawberry Shortcake dolls used to smell; its a very gourmand fruity scent.    Only downside in my book is the lack of longevity  (I got the rollerball so idk if the spray is different)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely did not like the way it smells! Ugh! It has a weird peppery smell that almost feels like you’re just masking Bo with it… and not that I have BO but something about this really turned me off. I gave it to my sister and she thought it was just ‘meh’

reviews.review_title: These reviews have to be fake..
reviews.review_text: Where’s the strawberry?? I smell barely any fruit it’s all M U S K. Didn’t like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product smells really good. Sephora charges $133 for 100ml, but if you go to Burberry website/store they sell it for $127, just FYI.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely flawless— smells like strawberry shortcake. Starts powdery and sweet, settles down to cool amber; feminine and youthful all the way down. If you like Miss Dior and/or you love berry and jasmine, you’ll love this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s so beautiful ! it’s a sweet floral it’s spring and summer in a bottle when you first spray it you immediately smell the raspberry as it dries down you pick up the floral and musk it’s stunning,confident, sensual head turner fragrance I also layered it with the new Burberry her the green one and it was even more impressive it’s lovely to wear day or night can’t go wrong with this ,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It has the same type of sweetness as “ sweet like candy” ariana grande perfume but the scent is much more soothing and anti “choking” . “Choking” as in when the perfume smells too strong that it keeps lingering at ur throat. This is the type of scent that ppl would take a noticed to if u passed by. Basically a comfortable sweetness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this!   Strawberry and musk is what stands out for me.  Subtle but beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i was so exited for this to arrive and when i first smelled it i was like okaaay? (maybe its gonna fade) no it didn’t. instead the scent was GONE like maybe in 1-2 hours. i would not spend a $ on this again.

reviews.review_title: Does not smell like sweets.. a floral mess
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i dont know why people say it smells like a strawberry milkshake on the skin :( it smells strongly of flowers and thats it.. so disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best new find - it’s the most delicious unique fragrance I’ve ever smelled. Like cotton candy meets sexy skittles. You will not be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this it’s my everyday scent. Sweet at first spray, dries into a lovely clean musk. I’ve heard it’s been compared to bacarrat rouge 540. I personally think it’s similar to cloud by arianna grande but this one is definitely more mature and clean scented. If you want to save try cloud first. This one does last longer on my skin at least.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So good! Smells like a strawberry milkshake and settles down into the skin beautifully. The longevity is nice too, I get about 4-6 hours of wear before reapplying a bit. Get this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THE most delicious scent you will ever smell.  I've had this for a couple years and I absolutely LOVE it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Adore this scent! Smells nice and definitely an everyday scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my goodness gracious! I love this scent! This an every day scent. I love to spray on me directly and then on my clothes. I have received numerous compliments! Will be purchasing again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Je n’ai pas reçu des compliments en portant ce parfum. C’est trop sucré et ça me sature (j’ai eu pink sugar sans avoir des problèmes). Mais je respect le lasting power et la projection

reviews.review_title: It’s ok NOT a must Have
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent lasted about 3 hours. It smells nice, a little on the sweet side. If scent lasted longer this would’ve been 5 stars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I put this on in the morning and I could still smell it on me the next day. Lasts forever - I get whiffs of it throughout the day. It really gives you THAT girl vibes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the smell of it but I find that it doesn’t last all day. It’s a little on the sweeter side and reminds me of the Taylor swift perfume. Don’t think I’ll buy again.

reviews.review_title: This stays with you all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stays with your all day, I got a sample in the mail and I have to say I am obsessed with this perfume. I love the smell, so flowery. I will be buying this for sure since I am almost done with the sample. I just recently bought the Gucci Flora, which I love too but this one definitely lasts longer.
this is really pretty perfume if u like sweet scent just not too strong but perfect amount of sweetness ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My husband is usually picky about perfumes but he loves this so much. Initially I got it in a sampler set from shoppers and instantly fell in love with it. Went ahead and bought the 100ml bottle and ladies I wasn’t disappointed. This literally smells like rich wives in California 10/10

reviews.review_title: pretty sure it’s fancy Love Spell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It doesn’t smell bad by any means….. it took me a couple minutes to place it but very reminiscent of the late 90s/early 2000s Victoria Secret Love Spell. Fruity top notes with violet base notes. Pretty but ultimately also forgettable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My Favorite and last soooooo long. I bathe and the scent was still on me .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OH MY GOSH! I love this perfume. It is for when I feel like I want to conquer the world. My fav favvvvvvv

reviews.review_title: Love The Fruity, Not The Violet
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this one so bad.  I love the fruity part of this scent but the violet nauseates me.  So sad.  I only recommend this because if you’re not sensitive to violet you may really enjoy this scent.
Love this scent SO MUCH! I wear it every day and you only need a few spritz. Definitely would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great signature scent. It’s fruity and smell go good. Lasting power is great as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t understand why people think this is a BR 540 dupe. It’s NOT. Yeah it was made by the same person, and yes they have a similar musk profile. But that’s it.  That said, I LOVE this strawberry smoothie treat of a scent. I don’t get jasmine at all, which I’m thankful for. Good enough longevity.

reviews.review_title: Great scent that lasts all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent! Bought it after getting a sample. Lasts all day and got so many compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good perfume option for an every day simple scent that lasts all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wear this soooo much all year long, mostly my go to for daytime, but have worn late. it smells like pure candy on me & I love the sweetness.

reviews.review_title: Identical smell to ariana grande cloud perfume
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
