reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really really like this scent!!! It lasts a long time too and isn’t too overwhelming. Def recommend this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing smell!! Not too intense but just enough. I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This parfum is absolutely beautiful, it’s sweet and makes me feel so pretty, definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first perfume and it's sooo pretty , i bought it after trying a sample. best purchase !! too bad the big one was sould out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I feel so girly and feminine when I wear this scent. I've never received so many compliments on a perfume before this one. It has a youthful yet sexy vibe to it that I love. Its fruity and floral with some warmth to it.

reviews.review_title: Nice scent for spring and summer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent a small sample to review.  And I must say I was pleasantly surprised with the scent.  Very nice clean light scent that will be perfect for springtime! I got many compliments when I was wearing this! I definitely will pick up a full size bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The violet note is very strong which gives it a plastic scent combined with fruity air freshener.  I'm glad I only bought the travel size because it is going in the trash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely is definitely the right word for this perfume. It’s light, floral and sweet. If you like Chanel Chance eau tendre I think you would enjoy this one. I spray on my neck and enjoy the scent all day long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I woke up in love with this fragrance.  The scent is beautifully powerful. I gave it four stars because it is a Spring/Summer scent..,,l purchased late Fall.  I layer Her with Nest Seville Orange.  It is on the pricey side but worth the hard earned coins.  The bottle is stunning but what’s inside the bottle is what counts more.  This perfume should be in every woman’s arsenal.  From 13 years old to 100+.  This smell gives me the Light Blue vibe from Dolce & Gabbana and I love that smell.  I like fun smells. Fragrances that will make you smile.  And Her is that fragrance.  I think l will purchase this for my sister once Spring approach hopefully it will be on sale or have a gift set to keep in one’s purse.  Okay. Enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this parfum. I can wear it everyday and it's not too strong.  I feel like a goddess wearing it!

reviews.review_title: Smells like a New York woman
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A strong and commanding scent of musky floral that calls for a sexy, mature, and very confident woman. A bit too powdery for my taste. Pairs well with a night out with full makeup and sequin dress and five inches heels.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you like musk, this may be great for you! I love fruity florals, so I tried a sample of this hoping that the jasmine and berry would balance out the musk. I LOVED the scent when I initially sprayed it, it was very fruity. But within a few minutes as it dried down, all I really got from it was musk, and maybe a bit of amber. It smelled very masculine on my skin. It does last well though, and I could still smell it on my skin even after a shower.  This may be my personal skin chemistry though, because some reviews seemed to have the opposite experience!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: fruity, lil powdery, very girly, and a bit of bath and body works vibes. i cant decide if i like it or not, something throws me off.

reviews.review_title: Had to get the Full size Bottle!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had received a sample size from sephora before.. and I completely fell in love.. Immediately purchased the full size.. it gets me a lot of compliments.. lasting power - around 6 hrs on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One summer evening I met a friend at the hospital to visit someone dear to us both. Everyone hates the smell of hospitals right but as we sat in the waiting room all I could smell was my friend. I asked her what she wearing and she replied Burberry Her. I was blown away because she lit up the entire area. It’s a warm, sweet, beautiful scent. A show stopper for sure! A few weeks later I went to Sephora at pentagon city mall just to browse. My sister wanted a new Jo Malone scent but needed assistance. Another sales associate approached me and I told her a few of my favorite scents, Baccarat 540, Bond New York Nights, Tom Ford Black Orchid she in turn recommended Burberry Her. I grabbed it and have been wearing it every day since.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so picky when it comes to perfumes because I find them really personal. I switch back and forth between this and Glossier You. They're both my top 2 and I get compliments on both though this one has more of a feminine floral to it. I also like that its not as overused but definitely underrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my ultimate favorite scent. I tried it on microperfumes first and loved it so I had to order the full sized bottle. It's light and feminine and summery. It smells strongly of raspberries and vanilla to me. The scent will last through my whole 8-hour work day (desk job). It earns me so many compliments. I'll wear it even during winter because it just lifts up my spirits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: How should I describe this fragrance? Smells like Halls smoothies cough drops the strawberry and cream ones. It’s a no.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be great, but they definitely changed the formula. It smells like a plastic barbie. Vey weak scent as well. Why do companies change the formula? roll eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve smelled some other dupes for MFK BR 540 and didn’t like a lot of them, and the original is too strong for me. This one though grew on me pretty quick, it’s not as medicinal smelling, or sickly sweet as some of the others. It’s a very warm, very sweet floral still though. It does last very well on my skin and I like it most when it’s been on my skin for a couple hours. If you like the original, I this is a well inspired version of it for a much better price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After reading other reviews I totally agree that it Smells like plastic strawberry shortcake doll lol. Not a fan

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I must be noseblind to the scent. I would spray myself a few times and then a couple hours later I can’t smell it much. I wouldn’t have such a problem with that if I enjoyed the scent, but to me it smells like pure berries. It wasn’t special enough for me to accept how short it lasted. I exchanged it for another perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I was quite surprised with how this perfume actually smelled in person since some reviews I read had said it smelled masculine on them. This is def a scent that you need to try for yourself cause for me, it smelled super sweet - almost like candy! I personally really love this scent!
The initial smell is lovely but then it dries down do a gross berry smell, almost like medicine. Definitely try this out on yourself before purchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Decided to buy it because of all the rave. Seeing the baby pink bottle I was expecting it to smell very girly and airy, but it smells like a soft mens cologne. Does not have any unique or very feminine notes in my opinion, and does not last long whatsoever which is disappointing for the price and hype it has. May be enjoyed by other people but not my cup of tea!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is classy and light, always get complimented while wearing. Though I noticed particles in the bottle after a while, it just looks unsettling. It may just depend on the user and rolling over the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Personally I absolutely loved this perfume, it never felt overpowering and I get compliments when I wear it. It’s more floral and light and reminds me of spring but also can be worn throughout all seasons

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so so good! Its one of my favorites. I do wish it was a little more long lasting on my skin. But I definitely love it and will repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry her…sweet and fruity and delicious. It is youthful and flirty and smells like your fave berry lotion. Spray it for a pick me up and get on with your day sort of scent.  Longevity moderate and silage and projection arms length. Definitely a good blind buy. Summer snd spring sort of perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly hate the scent on myself but it smells fantastic on my friend. Try before you but because it might be really bad depending on your body chemistry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I first came across this scent in a fragrance sampler I received as a gift and I loved it. I really enjoy the rollerball style - both for the price and I feel like the scent lasts longer on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this smells like raspberry ice cream I love fresh smells usually but this has some amazing sweet notes but nothing sickeningly sweet just right amount i think the Musk notes help to diffuse heavy sweetness but it smells clean raspberry’s and vanilla

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i’m soooooo glad i got this perfume. i ordered it online after researching it and reading reviews and descriptions of the notes. i was so nervous cause i’m super picky with scents but i couldn’t love it more. smells fruity but musky and sensual at the same time. not at all overbearing or too sweet or old lady-ish. also lasts all night. i work 10 hr shifts and i’ll spray some on my neck and wrists before leaving and i can still smell it on me when i get home and change out of my work clothes. ugh. love love love. buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so good! It smells sweet and light! My go to! Got it as a sample and had to go back for more! I get compliments on it everywhere I go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always heard good things about this perfume but never felt that drawn to it when it first came out, til i noticed a free sample option in the checkout so i knew i needed to smell it. i’m so glad that i did because i am In LOVE. the warm strawberry cloud i want to stay on forever, i could bathe myself in this. the staying power is excellent too with my body chemistry i can smell it for longer than 5+ hours which is impressive also this was created by the same guy who made the formula for Baccarat Rouge 540. THIS IS A MUST

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THE BEST. It reminds me of the girl you use to go to school with who had her life together. Very clean, soft smell with hints of floral and berries. Amazinggggg!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i dont know about you guys but this is a dupe for the baccarat rouge 540, made by the same guy who made baccarat! save your coin and buy this instead!!!!

reviews.review_title: Smells like the one pretty girl that you pass by
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift and this is my favorite fragrance. I remember testing this out in Sephora and fell in love with it as well. Definitely smells fruity and sweet. I wear this mostly everyday and it is my signature scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best purchase I did. It smells all day and doesn't fade away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells almost exactly like Baccarat Rouge, the $700 perfume. I was going to splurge on Baccarat Rouge but decided to go with this one since it’s almost identical. It is kind of masculine but in such a pretty way.

reviews.review_title: A More Sophisticated Victoria’s Secret Mist
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s giving Victoria’s Secret Pure Seduction Fragrance Mist but more grown up and sexy. They pair amazingly well together. I love it! Just wish it lasted longer on bare skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this one! I spray it with my eyes closed and take a deep breath, and feel like I get carried away to a romantic place in my mind... I’m a perfume snob but I absolutely love this one! 39yr old single white female from So Cal

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite perfume ever. It has a beautifully nostalgic scent that makes me feel very good inside.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a no from me. I find this scent really masculine smelling and it’s just not it. It’s really strong so a little goes a long way! This reminds me of axe body spray that polluted the hallways in high school!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my favorite perfume, marginally replacing Jimmy Choo Fever. The fragrance of Her is a bit sweeter than Fever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To me this smells like a berry multivitamin. I know that sounds bad but it actually smells sweet and delicious with a powdery/medicinal dry down . Longevity is not an issue, it lasted the whole day. I don't know how else to describe it, it smells like it came from lush. I think if you prefer lush scents you would like the sweet kind of powdery mix it has.  I would gladly wear this as an every day perfume if I see it on sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has tried both Burberry Her and MFK Baccarat Rouge 540 I can say they do share similarities and I understand why people call it a dupe. The musk note is what really makes the two similar. Burberry her differs because the sweetness comes from the berries and almost fades into a sweet soap/clean scent with the musk. BR540’s sweetness is more from that cotton candy note. If you like a fragrance that is more feminine go for Burberry her or Burberry her Intense and save some money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a Sephora favs pack and thought I would love this because Burberry Brit is one of my favorite scents. I actually had an opposite reaction to it and really disliked it right off the bat. It must be the dark berries listed in the ingredients that I dislike so much. I hate anything jammy and heavy like that. Oh well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I wanted a perfume I could wear everyday, I’ve gotten compliments on it and others say it’s nice and not super overwhelming. The projection is impressive as well, when I first apply it my brother will notice it even standing a metre away. It smells very sweet and kind of fruity and floral, I think it’s perfect for an everyday occasion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume! I always get compliments and the scent lasts all day! Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very light and feminine fragrance, long lasting scent, delicate floral notes, 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smell sooooo lovely omg , smell like a clean pretty girl who have a lovely personality.

reviews.review_title: Finally a fragrance that actually lasts on me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: STAY POWER: I've tried many many many fragrances as I am a former Fragrance Expert and Salesperson and this is one of the only fragrances that I've tried that stays through the day and night. I wake up with the fragrance still on me from the day before with no reapplication. If you have an issue with fragrances lasting with your body chemistry, try this one! BTW, not all Burberry fragrances are like this one. Her EDP is truly unique. I've tried literally all of the other Burberry women's fragrances and none last like this one does.  PRESENTATION: The bottle is certainly boring and not as interesting as other brands. It's not pretty to display like a Carolina Herrera or Marc Jacobs fragrance.  SCENT: It's a soft, sweet and feminine, but woody and warm fragrance. The top note is of fruity, dark berries with a hint of a feminine floral scent. Underneath all of that and as the day goes on, lies the warmth from what i believe to be sandalwood. The fragrance evolves into a more sexy and sophisticated scent throughout the night which contrasts the sweet and feminine scent from the first spray.   SIZE: I purchased the 3.3oz many many months ago and I still have most of my bottle. You don't need a lot as the fragrance projects very well, but if you do like to spray a lot it's not so strong that you'll offend everyone around you.  OVERALL: Definitely recommend for those who struggle with keeping a fragrance on their skin. Might bother sensitive noses or people who take to fragrances very well. My body does not and will make the scent of almost any fragrance disappear within 30mins (except this and Delina Exclusif by Parfums de Marly). So, big fan, it's my signature scent. Will continue to repurchase. Definitely recommend it to anyone looking to get their money's worth in a fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews… ever. But this perfume is AMAZING. I am so so picky with scents but this scent is just so delicious. I could smell it all day long. It lasts quite a while, longer than any other perfumes I have worn. It lasts about 4 hours before it starts to fade. The smell is so nice. It’s a hard smell to describe but this is going to be my new go to perfume. 5+ stars. Worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very beautiful scent. My boyfriend is obsessed. It will have others enticed

Oh my strawberries! I have been dying to find my signature scent and when I smelled this in store I instantly fell in love with it. It’s fruity, yummy, and has a top strawberry note to it which is my favorite kind of scent. In love. I feel so beautiful in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like the most popular girl in school. Sweet creamy rose strawberries is the best way I can describe lol
The smell is unique and feminine but has a strong peppery dry down that lasts until you wash it off

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: At first this excited me. The initial burst is juicy and tart berries with a little bit of floral underpinning it. Very fun and carefree kind of scent. Within an hour this became a very close to the skin scent of generic fruity shampoo and something remnincent of plastic doll heads. I can see the BR comparisons in the top notes with the tart berry notes, but I don't think this anywhere close to a dupe. If you've smelled BR you'd likely find this a huge let down in comparison. This scent completely fizzles out after a spectacular start. If I could hold on to those fun top notes I like this far more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am so in love with the fragrance! I received the sample size and I loved it it’s long lasting and the fragrance was not strong it was sweet. Definitely buying the larger size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not a floral fan because florals scents usually make me feel sick , dizzy and give me a headache.  However this fragrance smells beautiful , feminine, and expensive.  It reminds me of the jams off a charcuterie board from wealthy picnic and in my opinion the perfect floral for fall.   Teens - late 20s -30s if you’ve graduated from bath and body works and VS fragrances  but still desire a sweet feminine fragrance definitely try !   Settings, Date night , brunch , first business meeting,  Meeting clients, wedding guest , tea house , picnic   If MFK Baccarat 540 is a 5 “ Heel This is 3”- 4” heel with no platform. I layered the two baccarat first then Her and it’s perfection.  If you don’t want to spend the money for baccarat , this is a great dupe and it’s little more feminine.   Lastly , it last a long time I got all day wear out of it , and the dry down is beautiful ( this depends on your body chemistry).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite of the Burberry scents. I’m so in love with the sweetness of it, it gives the most flirtatious and girly feeling! I especially love that it is layerable to create your own custom scent. I use it for date night and my husband always compliments me throughout the night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My husband bought this for me for my birthday and I am so in love with this smell. It is pretty, elegant, soft, fruity and floral. I told him I feel expensive and beautiful whenever I spray it. You can definitely smell the berries!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this perfume! It's just so ultra feminine and girly- like the type of girl who has a white convertible mercedes, has weekly blowout appointments, a Clueless type of closet, and spends daddy's money for fun. This smells like sweet strawberry candy with warm amber in the background so it's not child-like. I'd say this is for late teens-late 20's. Perfect for a date night or a signature scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This. Is. Amazing! I purchased blind based on notes and reviews and I'm glad I did. It arrived at 4pm and I immediately sprayed it in. It's now 9:30am the next day and I can still smell it after a night out. I've seen alot of reviews compare it to BR540, which I also have. I can see a resemblance. I still get the same sweetness but Her isn't as strong or cloying as BR540. Her is everything I love about BR540 with none of the things I hate. It's inoffensive and complimentary. For reference my signature scents are Versace Yellow Diamond and Versace Bright Crystal, which I've been alternating for years. This is very different but I love it just the same.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s amazing, when I first used the tester i was like I definitely need to get the full bottle! It’s worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i absolutely loved this perfume but.. every time i went out with it on, bees followed. I had to return it because i couldn’t catch a break!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice scent. I purchased this a few months ago and fell in love. But just recently discovered this is a really good dupe of MKF Baccarat 540 which i have also. So if you love Baccarat 540, but not this price this is defiantly one to grab

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i seldom ever write reviews but this product disappointed me so much i just had to. i first tried a sample of burberry her and the scent lasted me a good 2 hours until it needed reapplying. 2 hours is not a long time but i still fell in love with the scent and wanted to treat myself to my first name brand perfume.. so i bought the biggest bottle in the name of treating myself! unfortunately the scent barely lasts 10 minutes on me no matter how much i moisturize beforehand. doesn’t last on my skin (which can be understandable because body chemistry) but i at least expected it to last a little on my clothes. it doesn’t! it’s as if someone opened the bottle and poured out half then replaced it with water. i’m heartbroken. $130 for a fragrance that doesn’t even last as long as my deodorant. regardless i still love the fragrance, just not on me :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: FAN FREAKING TASTIC!! This is a light, fruity, floral scent. I could not put it down and walk away. BUY THIS!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This reminds me of the perfume Pink Sugar, but a softer more mature version.  I find it to be more sweet than floral and absolutely delicious.  I don’t like most perfumes since they all give me headaches.  This one does not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent, it’s fresh but still kinda floral. It nice and light which will be perfect for school

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is really nice and have to be one of my favorite perfumes.
This is such a pretty and fresh scent! Always get compliments on this one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This smells perfect! It smells pretty sweet, and as a teenager, I love it!! Probably going to be my new signature scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a light and lovely scent that does not overpower.   The scent, to me, is the right combination of fruit and floral.  I have been complimented on it so many times so it is not just me that loves it.   I have read some reviews of others not liking the scent or that it is musty; I have not had the same experience of the scent whatsoever.  It is indeed a classy scent on me, and I would highly recommend others try it on themselves before reading the not so good reviews.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Liked it better in the store. I bought this debating between it and Chanel and the sales associate convinced me to go with this one. It was nice in the store by the time I picked up my daughter I couldn’t smell it anymore. I’m going to wear it tomorrow on clean fresh skin with no other scented items and see how it does. I have high hopes for this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this as it was described by many as a strawberry scent. It was not bad in the slightest but had no projection or lasting power on me. Was not something I would wear everyday. But was a scent that was good and reminded me a bit of Marc jacobs daisy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is a decent scent. Very feminine. It lasted an average amount of time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, I love this perfume. If you like warm and slightly sweet scents, this is perfect for you. It's fruity, sweet, light, floral, sophisticated, inviting, and not too strong. I bought this blindly online due to Youtube videos, perfume tik toks and positive reviews. I was really blown away. If you're a seasonal rotator, I could see this being a great addition to your spring or early summer collection.  Fragrances don't last too long on my skin (3-4 hours just spraying the chest area once or twice) unless they're really strong or super warm and musky. Her Parfum lasts about 5-6 hours on my skin. I like to spritz once on my clothes if I know I'm going to have a long day and it's never too overpowering. Just get it -- so worth the hype. Sharing a picture of my first thoughts when I smelled it just out of the bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this perfume! I typically don’t go for sweet scents but this one smells like candy but in a refined way. Sweet, fruity, floral, girly and flirty is the best way I can describe this, and it smells even better once it’s died down a bit a few minutes later. Scent lasts alll day too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite scents to keep in my purse. I really enjoy the fragrance and it's long lasting as well. Definitely recommend giving it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: makes a great gift for your sister or girlfriend. i really do recommend it because it works well with a lot of people’s body chemistry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it truly does live up to the hype, such an amazing fresh and feminine smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have one other Burberry fragrance and I have to say I love the ones of tried so far. they smell so good and last hours which is huge for me.

Hi! I received a free sample and I'm in love with this perfume. I already own a lot of Burberry's but I need to add this one to my collection. It has a sweet floral scent. So comforting and fresh! I love it. I only regret that it doesn't stay too long on my skin so I will need to reapply it throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best perfume I’ve ever owned. I used Bobbi Brown Beach for over 20 years. I smelled this on a whim in store and I fell in love. It’s the perfect mix of sweet on top with a deeper musk smell underneath. Zero vanilla or sandalwood smell which I do not like. My teenage daughter and I now both wear this and we are obsessed. It doesn’t last very long on the skin but I don’t mind that because I don’t love an overpowering perfume. Pick up the rollerball. You won’t be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells great. To me it’s a musky sweet smell. Not too much but more sultry. But you know everyone’s nose picks up different things lol. My biggest complaint is for it to be an Eau de parfum and $99 it does not last at all. I’ve put it on before bed multiple times now to test it out and it doesn’t even last an hour. Which is crazy. You’ll have to constantly reapply throughout the day. Love the scent but wouldn’t repurchase because of the quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favorite. Nothing compares to this perfume. If you see this and think, I’m not into florals, this will change your mind. It’s super sweet, fruity and a smidge floral but it’s absolutely beautiful. I’ve gotten multiple complements on this, and anyone I show this perfume to has ended up loving it and buying it. It’s super girly and pretty- it’s one of those perfumes that anytime I smell it I just think wow. I love this perfume. Pls just try it. Idk what these bad reviews are. This scent is absolutely amazing. If you’re young and looking for a good perfume to start off with let it be this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: unfortunately I was not a fan. after giving it several chances, I concluded that my initial impression was accurate (to me). I was expecting creamy berries surrounded by soft jasmine flowers and a bit of warm musk, but instead I got sharp and sour chemical berry. it applied that way and just lingered without developing. the scent was very strong and long lasting. kinda gave me anxiety lol. I wonder if I just got a bad batch? either way, I hate it, which is a shame because it sounded like something I would love. I had the same issue with Elizabeth Arden Green Tea and Fig, I wonder if there's a common ingredient in the mix that my nose doesn't agree with. definitely try it in a store if you can, I'll probably try it again someday from a Sephora tester in hopes that I just got a bad bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this smell. Absolutely love it, I find it’s fruity and playful and it lasts all day for me (learn to spray in the RIGHT places people, it makes a world of a difference!!!) however I’m taking off a star because the atomizer is bad. Every time I spray it, it leaks from the cap. I don’t understand why, but I feel like that’s something Burberry should figure out, because I’m basically wasting as much as I’m using and that’s a no go for me. Maybe I just got a faulty product? However as much as it pains me to do this, because of the atomizer and wasted product, I would not recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love it, it stays on for a long time, I am very happy with this purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So Im really perplexed. I bought the roller ball travel size. The scent is absolutely horrible and I don't understand because I usually love all the notes that are listed. To me this was a harsh and strong hairspray scent. So horrible I have to wash my arm with water and soap ASAP. I had high hopes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a lovely pretty feminine scent, not overly sweet! Smells so delicious and such a happy fragrance!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I instantly loved this perfume its so sweet and sexy, like strawberry baccarat Rouge

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first the scent is fresh and very fruity. ‘Boozy strawberries’ as someone else referred to it is an on point description. Almost too sweet. It then turns completely into a baby powder scent. I hate baby powder, so not for me but if that’s your thing, go for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this fragrance, I love anything sweet and fruity and this does it. It has a very strong strawberry scent to it at first but the base is very musky and subtle. Great for a person who loves a grown up sweet scent, definitely not a tween or early teens scent. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This smells identical to macerated strawberries. All you get from this is boozy, sweet strawberry. Like a strawberry that’s been soaking in alcohol and sugar. It’s a lovely scent… But I get a biiiit more of a pure alcohol smell from it (as in vodka alcohol, not a sweet liquor) than I would like, which turns me off a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect scent for daytime outings or when you want to smell effortlessly great! Used to love an older Burberry scent & this one def brought me back ;-)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointed .. the smell is nice but not long lasting  whatsoever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As soon as I smelt this perfume, I knew it would be my next signature scent. I sent it and bought the full size after five seconds of smelling it. No regrets, I love it so much. And i’m sure if I had a boyfriend he would love it too. It lasts all day, so you don’t have to reapply, and is perfect for any occasion! Not to mention the packaging is adorable. Someone on tiktok recommended this to me and I can’t thank them enough. Bring your S/O to their knees ladies. New summer scent? I think so!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Scent profile: starts off with white floral (perhaps jasmine and peony) with a powdery transformation and a mild touch of natural sweetness. This product smells like a scent that belongs in the form of body powder.   Although not a bad smell, it definitely was not my cup of tea. When I read the description of this product before purchasing, i suppose I was expecting something... different but not this.   This smell reminds me of someone born into old money who plays tennis on Wednesday's before going to the country club for mimosas and cucumber sandwiches lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My husband bought this for me for Mother’s Day . I didn’t love it at first but 2 weeks after I started using more and more. he bought me the 5ml lotion to go with the 100 ml bottle I find that it last way longer when I wear it with the lotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First ever review on here, but this perfume calls for one. This sent is sooooo lovely and lasts all day; it gives me the perfect amount of musk without being too musky. One of my all time favorites is the Acqua di Gioia (which is a polar opposite to this scent) and that in its self should tell you all you need to know!

reviews.review_title: I tried to love it but I couldn’t
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells amazing initially. Unfortunately, some middle  note was absolutely offensive to me. I wanted to love this one but I couldn’t. Thankfully, after about 4-5 hours the fragrance was completely gone so I didn’t have to wash it off. I usually give a fragrance three tries before making a final decision and this one just didn’t work for me. It’s a beautiful fragrance initially but the middle notes didn’t work for me and the base notes didn’t stick around long enough to make the harsh middle note tolerable. Hopefully your luck will be better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gonna be returning this one. The berry smell is great, but it has a baby powder background that makes you smell like an old lady. It smelled great on the tester, I hate how it smells on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell but the scent seemed to wear off on my skin. Maybe this is due to this being a roll on but the scent faded away after a three hours tops. You could only smell it if you sniffed me and im not a dog haha.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed in this purchase, I can't even describe what it smells like other than  a strong powdery and cheap scented chapstick smell. Went to the reviews and was pretty confident when placing my order, but now may just give this away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume made me second guess myself a few times. I got a sample of it and hated it at first but tried it again later and ended up loving it and buying the full size. It's straight up sweet powdery strawberry to me. I saw some reviews say that it doesn't last, for me it sticks around for 6+ hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this scent! So sad it doesn’t seem to last long on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Literally smells like my interpretation of heaven. It’s very strong and I only need one spray (or it will get too intoxicating). It’s very nice and sweet and feels like clouds to me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it!! i received a sample of the product and i fell in love with it and decided to get it! it’s not too mature smelling. it’s not really that youthful either. it’s perfectly in between. it’s a very sweet smell. i get a lot of compliments from it! i really recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it smelt really nice at first but it settled into this weird smell. reminds me of my orthodontists flavored latex glove lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry perfumes have  a sweet pepper after smell to all there perfumes. I don’t like it . Should’ve just got Chanel chance eu tender better .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my FAVOTIRE fragance of all, if you like a sweet & warm perfume this definetly it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this!! Not sure why all the negative reviews. The only reason people may not like it is if it just doesn’t mesh well with their skin chemistry. It is sweet when you first spray it but then, but then, the dry down! Amazing. Give it a try ladies, give it some time. Perfect for the spring and summer. Love all Burberry scents. This one is definitely in my top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells amazing! bought it for my sister and she keeps buying it! Def worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of it and it was okay, not as good as reviews made it seem. My husband hates it and said if I owned it he would want me to go shower it off so it’s a no-go for me. Only perfume he ever said he pretty much hated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite soft perfume EVER  My friends think it smells like baby powder on certain clothing materials lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As soon as I sprayed it, I was disgusted I’m sorry but a total waste of money. It smells like someone threw pepper on me. A hard NO

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I finally got a hold of this perfume in this size! I wish it came in a travel spray, but I’ll take what I can get. On first application it was almost smelled overpoweringly sweet. Definitely the dark berries. Then upon the dry down you get this sweet floral with a hint of the base; the musk. I see this as a spring night time scent. Definitely something you could wear to a first date. I love sweet and fruity scents and have always gravitated towards them. As I grow older I’m finding more appreciation for scents leaning towards  smelling like an adult woman. Can’t wait to have my boyfriend get a whiff of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume so much - the bottle is running out. I  heard to replace it. I always get sooo many compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and immediately it reminded me of a smell from my childhood. It smells so much like the strawberry scented Barbie that came out in the 90s. It’s very sweet and I really like it but it definitely gives me nostalgia for late 90s/early 2000s body sprays, but in the best way

reviews.review_title: Took me time to like it...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I blindly bought this perfume just based on the description in hopes that I'd like it. The smell of it in the bottle is really nice and the dark berry notes were really strong. However when I first wore it I HATED this perfume and couldnt wait to take a shower to wash it off. I went back to try the perfume again (idk why) and for some reason, I really liked it? I think its because I gave it time to dry down and let it linger on my skin and it smells really nice on me. I've been wearing it almost every day because its grown on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing! I have 10+ high end perfumes and this has got to be my favorite. I’ve never smelled anything like this but please go and smell it yourself I’m sure you’ll love it! I’m glad I took the Sephora employees recommendation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I picked this from the perfume sampler and it's one of the few high end perfumes I own. It's the perfect amount of fruity, floral, and powdery scent. It doesn't smell cheap/ like alcohol and lasts for around 6 hours on me. I recommend for anyone getting into expensive perfume and wanting to try something different from b&bw or vs.

reviews.review_title: Smells like an expired Flintstone vitamin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sooooo disappointed by this perfume! After reading all the positive reviews on here (which there a lot of ) and on youtube, I was excited to purchase this as I love fruity scents --But the powdery notes of reign the drivers seat of this perfume. Not just when it mixes with my body chemistry, but also when I smell it from the dispenser itself, it just smells like chalky fruit flavoured protein powder :( Not a safe blind buy!!! I only gave it one star bc you have to give it some sort of rating (plus the bottle is sooo pretty)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wrote a horrible review on this a couple months ago but I tried it again and I actually really like this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's very sickly sweet and too strong. It does smell like berries but in a cheap way, like something you could buy at B&BWs. Reminds me of a female version of a cologne my brother wore when he was a teenager. Glad I just got a sample but still sad I wasted points.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this scent. I just wish it lasted a little bit longer...but it’s worth it regardless!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect balance of sweet and sensual. I like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the sweet smell of berries but it smells so powdery and cheap so I hate it  bought it because I always hear people say it smells really good but when I put it on it smells like a taxi smell with powder and sweet berries.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best smelling perfume.scent lasts all day,10hrs.my daughter loves it too.I hope it never gets discontinued like some perfumes.

reviews.review_title: A Must Have For Her COLLECTION
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: EXCELLENT EXCELLENT EXCELLENT EXCELLENT  I Love The Way This Smells On My wife I Had To Buy Two.1 For Use And 1 For Good Luck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the scent when I was at the store but when I tried it back at home it was too sweet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant on trying this fragrance due to a few people telling me that the performance was not so great. I went to my local department store and asked the lady to spray it on my arm instead of on paper yesterday at 10 am. When I tell you that I could still smell it on my arm at 9pm I mean it. I tested it by asking my boyfriend to smell my arm and he also stated that he could smell it. By far the longest lasting perfume on my skin that I have ever tried. Fragrance usually lingers on my clothes but I have not found a fragrance that stays put on my skin quite like this one. The smell is delicious. Not too sweet, not powdery, and this transforms with the dry down on my skin into this subtle woody/fruity scent in the best way. It is feminine, and classy. Definitely worth trying.

reviews.review_title: If you're thinking about it, just do it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So when I was introduced to the Her line last year, I decided I liked Her Blossom best. But someone gifted me Her on accident (thinking it was Her Blossom) and I realized I loved Her much better. In my opinion this scent is much more versitle - you can wear it to the office or a night out, any time of the year. I prefer fruity and musky/woodsy scents to floral, and I truly get the best of both worlds with this scent: the top scents are very fruity (strawberry, currant and raspberry stick out to me) but the warmer notes like vanilla, amber, musk, and cashmere compliment the fruity scents so well. You don't need a lot: just one spray (or two) and done. 10/10 will continue buying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is so beautiful. The berries give a summery sweetness and the musk brings a really nice depth. It sits really well on my skin and it brings out the warmth as I wear it. My fav summer scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this fragrance and so does my husband! It always puts a smile on his face every time I wear it and definitely gives me a good confident boost ;)

reviews.review_title: get ready for lots of compliments!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I wear this perfume people go out of their way to stop me and tell me how great I smell! Highly recommend. This is a great fragrance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing! So light and beautiful and look amazing on my vanity. In love!
I love this long lasting perfume. My daughter  (26 years old) always talks about how much she loves it. I get compliments from strangers, men and women. It’s a keeper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells like strawberry sorbet, raspberries, lipstick, and like a little bit of jasmine & light white musk; so pretty & lightly sweet in a soft, feminine way; hard to overspray (never gets to a point where it's nauseating) but it still has great lasting power (i can still smell it on my clothes at the end of the day)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you love Maison Francis Kurkdjian’s Baccarat Rouge 540 but don’t want to spend the hefty price, Burberry Her is a lovely alternative fragrance with delicious fruity berry notes.  Created by Kurkdjian, this has a familiar vibe, that although not an exact dupe, it is still quite sophisticated. I am in love with this one! It is delicious! Wears beautifully on the skin and lasts all day long! I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best perfume ever, I don’t like the first spray but in 20-30 minutes it becomes my favourite smell. It’s sweet but not in a gourmand way and lasts very long on me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent so much! So sweet but not too cotton candy sweet. My only complaint is that it fades too quickly on me and I don’t want to spend time reapplying all throughout the day. Reminds me of La Vie Est Belle by Lancôme.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this perfume. Smells very good! The only reason for 4 stars is because the bottle leaked all over the place and i didnt get to use hardly any of it :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably one of the most disappointing scents! I bought the rollerball to test out since my local Sephora store doesn’t carry it. One of my favorite scents is Marc Jacobs Daisy Love, which unfortunately has NO staying power, so I started searching for a similar scent that might last a bit longer. I came across a rec on another site for this one, which has similar notes (berry top note, floral mid, woodsy base). When I first applied it, I was FLOORED. It smelled even better than Daisy Love, and I thought, this is it! I’ve found my signature scent.   Not five minutes later, those first gorgeous notes faded, and the perfume became a powdery nightmare. It reminded me of this cheap perfume that came in a pink bottle that was all the rage when I was a teen. I don’t even remember what it was called, just that it smelled like baby powder. That’s what this smelled like. I was devastated. How could something that started so beautiful turn so horrible?  And, to my chagrin, I got the staying power I wanted with this one because it did not fade for 8 hours, even after I aggressively scrubbed my wrists.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume. It smells youthful and fresh,but isn’t too sweet. The scent is unique enough to set it apart from other fruity perfumes, which I love.  It does tend to fade quickly, but I’d rather that than it be too strong and give me a headache.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep swing reviews saying this is a dupe for baccarat but to me personally baccarat smells like a hookah lounge mixed with a dentist office and rubber gloves. So this scent is 10X better than the rouge. It’s like a sweet soft musky berry scent. It smells very girly and playful without being too sweet or to musky and powdery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ok here’s a story- i was on YouTube looking for “best perfumes for women” and this shows up. a lot of women say that this perfume is similar to Baccarat Rouge. LOL. i don’t have $300 to spend on a bottle of perfume like that but if it’s as similar/a dupe for BR540 then you should definitely purchase this. the notes/scent are exactly as described. this is a must have perfume.

Ok, so I decided to blind buy this because I liked the notes and it got great reviews so I figured how bad could it go. On the first spray, it smelt a lot like dryer sheets and very musky. Which isn't terrible but I was really looking for STRAWBERRIES! as it dried down, I didn't get any fruitiness, which I was so disappointed over, but I don't think its a horrible scent. Its just very musky and floral which isn't my taste. I tend to like more sweet fragrances. overall, ill still keep it because its a nice everyday scent and it still smells very feminie.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little too musky for me, I'll give it 4 stars though because other than the musk I really enjoy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smelled totally different on me than it did when the girl sprayed it in store.  First time I used it I smelled baby shampoo.  I used it today and it smelled more like what it did in store.  I got this from the sampler.  Its not my favorite, but not terrible.  I'm more of a statement scent person, and this is very understated.  I would recommend this for work as its classic and unobtrusive.  Its nice, so I'm keeping it, but it wasn't my first choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favorite perfume <3  Its sweet with a tiny bit of musk

reviews.review_title: VERY Masculine NOT WHAT I EXPECTED
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the name “her” I was expecting a classic feminine fragrance, but I instantly recognized the smell of cologne. I was shocked given the reviews of a sweet floral which was not how it came off of my skin. Thought it might be the top notes of berry but I’ve been wearing it for hours now and it just won’t go away. There is no depth to the fragrance either, the notes never changed or faded. Even with its poor projection it still gave me a headache. The perfume smells okay and lasts long but I don’t want to go to parties or work smelling like a 15 year old boy wearing axe body spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like sweet berries, lasts all day and not annoying. I use it as my work fragrance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was introduced to this scent through a sampler kit. It smells great, a good choice for an everyday scent or a scent for special occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful scent that is the perfect combo of clean, floral, and fruity. Love everything about it.

reviews.review_title: Gourmand that you can wear everyday
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a gourmand berry vanilla fragrance that’s a little sweet on initial application but has a bit more gravitas than similar fragrances due to the musky and amber notes that develop over time. I find this a light, feminine scent that feels natural for winter without being sickly sweet or too heavy. I liked it so much that after I finished my little sample I bought a full size version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is not too sweet and not too musky, it is perfect for a date night or going out. If you like Versace Pink Diamond you'll love this 10/10
SO AMAZING!!! It smells like berries and it’s absolutely delicious. It’s the scent I will be picking from my Sephora favorites perfume set!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping for an adult fruity cocktail, based on the advertised notes. Bizarrely enough, this opens like an ICU before eventually settling into very faint strawberry cake - not sweet enough to be considered gourmand, but still sweeter than a standard floral oriental (floriental). It didn't project much on me, but it has at least seven hours of longevity, so that's something at least.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this!! It makes me crave fruit snacks lol it’s like a sophisticated fruit candy smell without being overbearingly sweet. Mixes well with the florals! Very fresh and feminine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favourite parfum, it`s very feminine and I always put as little as possible because it lasts for almost an entire day for me and I know people can feel it even considering social distance, I get questions what fragrance it is! Definetely will be buying it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a great, long lasting warm floral scent with a hint of sweet berry notes! I think it’s best for women in their 30s but overall a diverse group of people could enjoy this. Only knocking off one star because it was a bit mature for my age.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pleased by this scent. I received this as a gift and love how subtle but sweet it is. Also have gotten quite a few compliments while wearing this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not particular on this fragrance :( After viewing the reviews, I was hoping this would be my new favourite. It definitely isn’t, and I wouldn’t recommend to anyone. Smells way too floral and strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great on my skin. I can't wear a lot of perfumes because they smell funny after a little bit but this one smells the same all day.
If you're looking for a very soft and light fragrance that smells pretty this is it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: to me it smells like candy, like Hubba Bubba ( hahahahah ) but very settle and not over powering. I absolutely love this perfume. Light but yet very long lasting!! I always always get compliments on this perfume. I have always been a enthusiast about perfume and I can easily say this is my top favourite!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells sooooo yummy! A perfect change for the holidays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you're into lighter, sweet scents, this one is for you. I'm obsessed with the fruity and floral notes of it! Definitely would buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has the sophisticated type of smell I’ve been searching for without having to spend a ton of money! It lasts, and has a sweet, but woody smell. So great! Can be worn everyday in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful fragrance that lasts all day. However, Sephora categorized this as a floral fragrance when it is not floral. The berry scent is very strong; I don't detect any floral at all. If anything it's a pure fruity perfume. Nothing wrong with that but Sephora needs to update the description.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE the initial spray, smells like jellybeans. HATE when it settles, smells like flinstone vitamins. LOVE the base notes after minutes/hours of it on my skin, smells like a blend of marshmallows and a strawberry milkshake. keeping it for the first and last smells. disappointed that it had to go through with it's vitamin smell on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new signature scent. I get SO many compliments on it at work! It's very floral and girly but it also has that musky, preppy, Burberry feel underneath. It lasts all day and fades beautifully. Love it!!

reviews.review_title: A M A Z I N G
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t expect too much of that perfume but when I got a sample with one of my Sephora order I fell instantly in love with it. It’s a fruity floral that is very sophisticated and not childish at all. Smells similar to Ariana Grande Cloud but more grown up and less in your face. I bought a full 100 ml bottle the same day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Here me out - it smells like Diptyque Mimosa and the JW Marriott and it’s amazing. It’s definitely berry upfront which is fantastic but you’re glad it’s brief and settles to the warmer base. I love this. It also layers fantastically with Ombré Leather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I still don't fully know how I feel about this scent. It reminds me of a princess Jasmine doll I had as a kid where you got a bottle of Jasmine scent to pour in her back. It smells just like that. I almost feel like this is a tween scent. It's just so sweet. I really wanted to love this since I got this as part of a kit where we could get a full size bottle but I can't with this. Maybe if it was layered with a more adult scent.

reviews.review_title: This is What Dreams Are Made Of
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From the moment it was sprayed on a tester strip this scent answered my quest for the perfect fragrance (for me). To preface, I have been a long fan of Pink Sugar for its potently sweet and long-lasting scent, but I’ve been craving something with a dash of Chanel’s professional floral scent and this is the perfect union. It’s sugary sweet in a way that is not immature, blatantly dessert-like or overpowering, but enough to mask the traditional floral scent at its core. I was told it lasts 5+ hours on the skin and 8+ on clothing, and I’d have to agree. The spray itself is a mist, not a quick shoot from the bottle which is oddly satisfying and luxurious. Every time I inhale I smell the complexity of sweet and floral in a combo that is perfect for the office, the every day and every season, as it is not offensive to the nose or warrant for a sneeze. I can’t get over how beautifully sophisticated this fragrance is and it has instantly become my signature scent. (This is a unisex fragrance in my opinion).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute new favorite perfume!! I get so many compliments whenever I wear it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So yummy. I don’t get any floral notes it’s very sweet and juicy smelling. Definitely one of my favorites. You’ll fall in love at the first sniff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The nose behind Baccarat Rouge 540 created this perfume & I was curious to try it. It's at least 60% similar in my opinion. This has fruity berry notes but also floral, it definitely doesn't smell like most mainstream perfumes. It's a very girly scent, i would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this perfume complimentary of Influenster. It starts off sweet and like berries, then gradually changes to a long lasting floral musk. This lasts several hours on me, and starts pretty strong. It is almost like a cologne, but more feminine. It reminds me of a PINK body spray I had 10+ years ago, but the grown up, sophisticated version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: What a delicious fragrance. This is definitely  my kind of perfume, is not too sweet,  a bit musky and woody, strong but not overpowering. It last all day and everyone asked me what perfume  was that.  I'm definitely  getting  myself  a big bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this perfume complementary for testing purposes. Really liked this perfume with light notes. I felt like it could go easily from a day perfume to an evening perfume. I wore it to work one day and received so many complements!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance. It’s feminine, but not overpowering sweet, but not cloying.  Just a lovely, all-day fragrance!

reviews.review_text: I appreciate the scent of the fragrance and the best part about it for me is that it lasts a long time. I got a sample size and would purchase the full size of this product after trying it out. The Burberry Her Eau de Parfum has a very light floral, airy and fruity scent (Almost natural). reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance. It smells so nice and is so long lasting. I can still smell it on me the next day! I receive so many compliments when I wear it.

reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful everyday scent. I have gotten so many compliments when I'm wearing it, and it has great lasting power. It's very fresh, fruity and floral and I always feel and refreshed after a little spritz.

reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample from influenster. I really enjoyed the the floral/fruity but it wasn’t too overpowering. It lasted all day amd I got many complements

reviews.review_text: I am a fan of sweet perfumes so I really like this perfume! It smells more fruity to me than floral. Its a scent that lasts too! I really like it! I’ll be purchasing this! I received  a sample from Influenster for review!

reviews.review_text: I love this perfume! I tried another Burberry scent recently but much prefer this one. I love fruity and floral notes, and this is a perfect combination.

reviews.review_text: I really like this perfume. Pleasantly surprised.  Not really what I’m used to or expect from burberry.   But I might get this in full size.
