I wouldn’t wear this everyday but it’s okay if you want to switch up your perfume every now and then. It’s a very sweet smell which isn’t really my style.

reviews.review_title: Sweet, fruity, but refined and luxurious
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fruity, sweet, with a hint of luxury. This scent smells like summer vacation. I really enjoyed receiving this product to sample. I’ll be buying the full size bottle next summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always looking for a light scent I can wear any time of the year. This perfume from Burberry is amazing! It's a beautiful, light, and sexy scent. I feel amazing and confident every time I wear it. And the compliments? Everywhere I go,there is someone asking what scent I'm wearing. My husband loves it too. It lasts all day without being overpowering. The scent doesn't go away at all. I love this scent and I highly recommend this perfume to anyone and everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume!! Not tooo strong but last a long time! Love the floral sweet scent. Husband approves!! I received this product for free from Influenster for testing purposes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing. very sweet smelling and lasts a very long time. which is hard to find these days. it's a perfect fragrance for everyday use. I absolutely love it and will definitely be buying more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was presently surprised at the scent of this perfume. It’s very floral and sweet without being overbearing. If you like Victoria Secret mists then you will love this. I highly recommend it and I might pick up a full size for myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never worn a Burberry perfume before, and this didn’t disappoint! The scent is a mix of floral and fruity, but still light so it’s not overpowering. It lasts all day, which I love. It’s really annoying when perfumes wear off throughout your day. This is one I will be purchasing! I received this as a complementary sample from Influenster for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am normally not a huge fan of Burberry perfumes. Most to me smell old to me. This one smells soo good it’s definitely my favorite. I’ve worn it a few times and have gotten many compliments. Will definitely be purchasing a full size bottle soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not really my preferred smell, but I don’t hate it! I wouldn’t mind wearing this for a day’s scent. Personally, I think it would wear better as a daytime scent than a nighttime one due to its fruity and sweet notes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance. It does not feel overpowering which I’m always sensitive too. It’s a very pleasant floral smell and does not bother my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing this scent now since I received my free sample from Influenster for weeks now! I love it so much.. that I don’t want to run out and I am already planning to buy a full size! It is my new favorite scent by Burberry! Light, fun, calming and playful, this  scent manages to get you noticed while being subtle at the same time.  It is perfect for women of all ages.  This scent makes me truly feel ultra feminine when I wear it. And bonus... it also lasts for hours..Can’t wait to get my full size bottle!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always loved Burberry scents, and this one is no exception! I received a sample of this from Influenster to test, and I was really impressed. The musky base is a soft note that makes for a great beginning, and the sweet floral and jasmine middle notes build onto it beautifully and smell amazing with any body chemistry. The top berry notes make it smell great right out of the bottle and last longer than top notes in other perfumes I’ve tried. I loved this one, I will buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a small sample of this from Influenster to try and I really enjoyed it! It had a really nice, floral smell to me. I could also smell the musk and amber in it. I was satisfied with just one spray of this. For me, this would be a lovely daily wear perfume. It’s not overwhelming or off putting. I was complimented on the scent of it when worn around others. Looking at the price, it’s actually a really good price for the amount you get in comparison to other luxury perfumes. I would definitely purchase this for myself or as a gift in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This floral fragrance wasn't anything special to me. I didn't love it. it just smelled kind of common. I do like other Burberry fragrances but this one just didn't do it for me. It could also be that I only tried the sample size so I didn't get to really live the fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells like the name. “Her”. Very feminine. It was a strong yet soft smell that isn’t overpowering but doesn’t get lost. This is probably not one I would have bought on my own but I was pleasantly surprised by how much I liked it. It’s a very good perfume for any type of event.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What an absolutely amazingly gorgeous scent! My signature scent is Viktor Rolf Flowerbomb but this is just on par with and just as lovely but still different enough. It has staying power and you don't need to use much. I smelled it on my clothes later in the week when I went to launder them and fell in love all over again haha

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is absolutely amazing, a classic & feminine scent! For starters, the packaging is adorable. I love the pink and the bottle style overall. This perfume is very fruity without being too sweet. I love that this perfume smells like a high end fragrance but without all the notes that usually give me a headache. There is a tad of musk in this scent which I don’t love (that’s why I only gave it four stars) but thankfully it’s not too over powering. I sprayed my perfume in the morning and it was still lingering on me towards the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the smell of this perfume! It gave fruity and sweet notes. I couldn’t stop smelling myself!  The scent lasts for hours. I received a free sample from influenster for testing purposes but I definitely will be purchasing the full size.

It smells wonderful, wears really well and is not overpowering.  I can’t wait to wear this again and again ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free to test out from influenster. I wish I could explain to you how much I love this smell. I use other perfumes now and then but ive never tried a fragrance that made me want to switch over.  It is so warm but not musky; it is floral, citrusy and comforting. It could easily be worn as an every day scent without being over powering. It would be great for special occasions too. And it’s a little more sophisticated than my juicy scent. I will be making the switch to this as my new signature scent!!

The berries in it smell good, but for me the muskiness to it is way overpowering.  It reminds me of the powdered wigs they used to wear in court. It's a no from me dog.

Perfect spring or summer scent.  I have worn Burberry Brit for years so I am familiar with the quality of this company.  Fun, feminine packaging that would be lovely on your shelf.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume!! It smells so amazing and lasts for a long time! I wish I would have gotten a bigger sample, I received the sample size but i am happy I did because I may have found my new favorite perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This my new favorite perfume. I'm almost running out, but I'll definitely be buying the biggest bottle soon. I get compliments while wearing it all the time.  Younger women and older women can wear this. It's a sweet, floral scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Her opens with an intense blast of strawberry. The beginning smells like those old Strawberry Shortcake dolls from the 80's. For the younger kids who may not know that smell, I feel like a strawberry milkshake is a close representation of the Burberry Her opening. I really enjoy the fragrance and it lasts pretty long on my skin and clothes. As it dries down, the berry starts to fade and you get musk and amber. I never picked up any jasmine or violet, but that could be because of the way the fragrance was blended.  This is another one created by Francis Kurkdjian and I've heard comparisons between Burberry Her and Baccarat Rouge 540. While they share a similar DNA, Burberry Her is much more playful and fruity. I wouldn't mistake one for the other and they both have their appropriate time and place.  Burberry Her is a beautiful scent and I love it as a woman in my 30's. With that being said, I feel like this one is really well suited for a teenager just branching out into more complex fragrances or someone in their 20's. If I were younger, this would definitely be signature scent worthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent overall is not too heavy which I prefer. Its sweet, fruity and light. Not a huge sweet smell that is instantly too much also very feminine smell. I did not mind this product at all. I was actually quite surprised by it, I am not used Burberry having sweet and fruity scents. Not bad at all I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First and most importantly, this smell REALLY stays with you. I’ve worn it from morning to night with a full day of activities and could still smell it. It lightens, but doesn’t just disappear.   I don’t prefer the woody notes of the scent, which is the only reason I took it down a couple stars. If you don’t love a scent, the idea of it sticking around for 12 hours isn’t exactly appealing.  My husband thought it smelled amazing though!    **Disclaimer: I received a free sample of this product in exchange for my honest review!**

I will be wearing it when I’m out with my boyfriend but sadly I can’t wear it to work because it’s a tad bit too strong for my line of work. It will end up on my Christmas wish list though.

I would recommend if you enjoy floral scents. If you’re on the fence, get a sample and apply it to your skin. It really gets better as it warms up!

reviews.review_text: Kinda meh and smells kinda like baby powder. Not a fan and would not recommend........

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is nice scent that is not over powering it had a floral and amber like scent to it. I received a sample from Influenster and will definitely be purchasing this ASAP!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was a great perfume! It lasted on me throughout the day and still smelled great at the end of it! It reminded me of one of my favorite perfumes, si! Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample from Influenster to try and so glad I did! I love love love this perfume. Once I run out of my Dior one I will be purchasing this. It reminds me a little bit of flowerbomb but IMO better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a women approaching my mid 30s, my taste in scent has changed drastically since my early 20s. The scent was a sweet fruit gourmand based on red berries, jasmine, and amber. I didnt feel like it was the musky smell like our grandparents/great grandparents would wear from the great and silent generations. You know what I am talking about when I mention that musky smell. Burberry Her was naturally flattering and I didn't have to constantly spray it on throughout the day. Received numerous compliments on it from friends and family. Overall, this is my new go to.  Overall, if your like me and don't want to smell like grandma or wear the teenager scents, this perfume will not disappoint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample and I find the scent mature.  I usually love floral scent but this particular perfume did not appeal to me. It had a slight musky undertone. I think it lasts awhile. I didn’t have to reapply!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Is didn’t smell horrible but it hasn’t been one of my top scents. It’s a little too strong for my liking. My mother in law loved it though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not particularly for me. Upset that we were sent a micro sample of the product but happy to know that it would not have been for me anyhow as I am not a fan of amber musk and I noticed that linger a while. I perhaps would consider it as a gift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love perfume let me start by saying that but this might be my new favorite I love the fragrance it’s not to strong but not weak where u have to keep reapplying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is very nice. It has a lovely sweet and floral scent. It's a little sweeter smelling than I would typically like but the overall scent is very pleasant and feminine. It is also reasonably priced at other retailers.

I usually love floral scent but this particular perfume did completely appeal to me. It had a slight musky undertone and it did not last long. I got a sample size from Influenster and I had to keep reapplying through the day.

I was given a free sample to review. My review is 100 honest on this product . This was a free sample and was not at all what I expected. The smell was ok (not bad but also not great), it didn’t last long at all and a few friends actually said they were not fans of it as well. I expected a beautiful and lasting parfume and was extremely let down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not a huge perfume person, but this one I’m a fan of! You only need one spritz to get the effect and it’s a perfect blend of flavors (received free for testing)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t usually lean toward floral sweet scents so this was not my favorite. I received a sample size from Influenster to review. I wouldn’t buy the full size product especially given the cost because the scent does not last. It definitely needs to be reapplied throughout the day. It was a lot sweeter than anticipated but I did like the undertones of musk which took the edge off the flowery notes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sweet, floral scent. I received many compliments. It last all day. Would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Burberry perfume in the scent called Her has been amazing! I love the light and floral scent and that it is not too strong!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in a sampler set and it was one of my favourites next to Black Opium. I was trying to decide which full-size to order; I decided to go with this one because the scent is a lot more unique and it lasted SO much longer on my skin than the former (I put some of each on my wrist for a day).       The smell is very sweet and reminds me of summer. I've gotten compliments from both men and women while wearing just a bit of this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like to love this perfume but after giving it a few try i couldn't. It smells sweet and florally ( think of rose) at the beginning but after couple hours on my skin the sweet florally scent was gone and it leaves a musky smell. its too mature smelling for me even my boyfriend commented that whatever im wearing smells like old lady.

reviews.review_title: Love the way I feel with it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This one is the best ‘flower garden’ perfume on me! It’s not too sweet and quite unique. People always note they’ve never felt such a wonderful smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very pleased with this product. It smelled amazing and thought it to be perfect for special occasion wear!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is amazing! I’ve never used a Burberry product and now I know what all of the rave is about. It smells so good, even my husband loves it when I wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this perfume was okay. it had somewhat of a sweet yet spicy scent. It lasted for about 3-5 hours. For the price, I probably will not purchase.

reviews.review_title: Light, floral, and fresh. A must buy!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this perfume. The floral scent is sweet, fresh,  and light. It is not too overpowering and lasts throughout the day without any weird smell. I did receive this as a free sample but it is one I plan on purchasing myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try a new scent. However this one is not for me... sadly it came in the box broken and by first smell I thought I might like it, but once it was on my skin is smelled way to musky for my liking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im never smell a burberry perfume before this is the first time. It was a sample size i would have loved to have it in full size but i fell completely in love with it its sweet fruity a little floral but its not that sticky sweet scent. It is long lasting very concentrated so a little goes a long way highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this perfume out as I love to wear perfume and always excited to add a new scent to my collection of fragrances. The scent was okay I love fruity and floral scents and this one definitely had both but the musk was a little to overpowering of the other 2. I prefer a little more floral. On the positive side it was super long lasting and a little goes a long way! I am constantly on the go with 3 kids so it was nice to still smell the fragrance after running around and several hours passing. It’s a versatile scent you can wear for daily use or special occasions. I liked the scent but it wasn’t my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love! Scent lasts all day and you really don’t need to use a lot, a little goes a long way! I received this product complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has an elegant floral scent that leaves you feeling fresh; just a few pumps will last you all day. Perfect for date night!!! A must have if you love floral scents!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance isn’t bad, it’s just not to my taste. It’s too sweet for me. I tend to like fragrances more in the style of Jo Malone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh, fruity, floral. It’s great for summertime, especially during the day; it’s just easy to wear because it’s not too strong or overpowering. Slightly on the sweet side for me, but the fresh and clean jasmine tones balance it out nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells beautiful and elegant, and it lasts so well throughout the entire day! It’s hard to describe how it can be subtle, but ever-present all at once, but that’s the best way I can describe it. Some scents are too pungent and can give me a headache, but this doesn’t overpower at all. I would highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for a fresh, floral, elegant fragrance.

reviews.review_title: Sugary sweet with a layer of musk
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent was very sweet and reminiscent of flower bomb with an added layer of musk. Making it heavier, and a bit over powering for me. Im not sure what time of year I would choose to wear this either. It’s a bit much for summer for me so maybe a appropriate for fall. Definitely not my favorite by Burberry. I received this as a promotional sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this perfume. Smells amazing! Use a little bit and it goes along way. Dark berry note. Bold but beautiful. Easily wear everyday or for a night out on the town. Definitely buying! Tested for free through influenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A bit different than what I was expecting but in a good way! Not overly sweet but strong enough to last. I've been wearing this the last few weeks going to work and I love it and get compliments on it weekly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this! The smell is sweet with a hint of a musk. I makes me think of a powdery cloud. It’s soft and subtle. Love this. Got compliments when I was wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great light scent that lasts all day. It smells very clean but also has nice floral notes that aren’t overpowering. A little goes a long way with this perfume!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Scent was fresh and light, however the little sample size i got to try took forever to actually spray anything, i almost gave up. I would have preferred a bottle as I also choose perfume off packaging but the scent was nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved it ! This fragrance smells delicate and have a great fixation! Of course it’s a fancy fragrance, so good!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the scent but wish it lasts longer! It’s perfect for a summer scent. I got many compliments with this one. I would normally use this on my clothes or hair so the scent could last a bit longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: At first, I wanted to like this. It’s sweet but not too sweet and has a nice fresh smell. But, I sprayed one spray and it was SO strong! I’m normally not sensitive to perfumes but this one was too much for me. If you like a stronger perfume, I would suggest trying it. I received a sample to try complimentary from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is so elegant. I’m not one to have a great ton of different perfumes, but I must buy this one once my sample is finished. It is pleasant and elegant  It’s perfect for date night or just any special occasion really. I would definitely recommend this to all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i love this perfume! it smells sweet and floral and clean. my mother who hates most perfumes loves this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I dont wear much perfume due to most being overwhelming, but her is light and sweet. i was impressed especially being the first time trying a perfume by Burberry. if i had to improve anything, it would be wearability. seems like the scent wore off quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this perfume from influenster and omg I have never tried Burberry before and now I want the biggest bottle ever created of it! it has a beautiful floral smell with just a hint of fruit an very very subtle spice to it.. and it stays on ur clothes an thats my biggest pet peeve with perfumes it HAS TO STAY ON THE CLOTHES! and let me tell u my shirts smell heavenly!!!! #influenster #voxbox

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for a night out! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes but I would definitely consider purchasing it now that I’ve tried it. I noticed a floral/musky scent. Smells flirty for a date night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this scent was super fun. It smells sweet and reminded me a little of cotton candy. This would be a great scent to use for daily wear, or a fun occasion. It lasted longer than other brands I've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never owned a burberry perfume before! I actually loved the way it smelled. It was lightly sweet and flowery but not overpowering. The scent lasted all day. I feel like its hard for me to find a scent that I can smell all day. This scent exceeded my expectations. I have even hinted to my husband that I wanted this for Christmas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of Burberry as they have some of the best fragrances! This one smells absolutely amazing and stays on your skin for a long time, which I appreciate!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells absolutely amazing. I would definitely tell everyone to go out and get it. It doesn’t irritate my skin and it leaves me smelling wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume. It's natural and sweet which is just amazing. it's perfect for every day wear. it's very refreshing and not overwhelming. The fragrance has hints of jasmine, woods, strawberry,musk and amber. Love, love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For me this was a miss, I really wanted to like this as I like Burberry's other scents but for me this was just to strong.  Maybe it was the amber in it because amber tends to be a strong scent and I am not a fan of it. Also I love a long lasting scent that I can wear all day and still smell it however after I showered I could still smell the scent on me. This would be something I would give to my niece because she would love it. I would still recommend this because I do not think the scent smells bad it just did not work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Another Beautiful Perfume by Burberry. Spicy, but floral. I picture a Strong Woman who has it all together. It's stands out, but not to where it's just too much. It last a few hours. So a touch up mid day may be necessary. This doesn't scream Teen (nor Grandma). I personally love Burberry and this is another great perfume. I would wear this to am Interview, a Meeting. When going out with girlfriends and or Hubby I prefer a more sexy perfume. But this definitely has its place!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First off, this perfume smells incredible! It reminds me of the glossier perfume. It’ll make you smell like a rich old lady but in the best way possible. A warm sweet perfume GUARANTEED to last the whole day. I wore it the day before and woke up the next morning still able to smell it on my body. I’ve already used up the complimentary sample given to me in my voxbox for testing purposes but I’m for sure buying the full bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfume has very strong floral notes. One spray is more than enough. The floral scent is so strong that I got a headache from it. My husband said it smells like pungent flowers in your face. If you are not into that type of perfume, this is not for you. I would test or sample this perfume before purchasing larger bottles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really Love the smell of this- it’s like a warm, floral scent. It stays on all day and you only need a very small amount of it. It’s not overwhelming by any means. I usually Don’t like perfume but I could Wear this daily! I did Receive this product for testing purposes for free

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When it comes to perfume I’m picky! I can say that this perfume is absolutely amazing! I received a sample from Influenster to try and after wearing it I felt in love. It smells so good and I noticed after I took a shower it was still smelling in my skin, so the perfume last longer (which for me is extremely important to decide if I’ll buy the product or no). The perfume has some notes of black cherry and after a while I could noticed a note of wood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful, fresh fragrance. It is floral with a slight musk to it that adds warmth. I usually love sweet, citrus, and floral. I probably wouldn’t have looked at this fragrance, but I received a complimentary sample for testing purposes. And I’m glad I did get the sample and try it out because I do really like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: At first I didn’t think I was going to like this. I’m more of a sweet perfume gal but after wearing it around I really like the more masculine undertones. I think this is the perfect fall scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of light and floral scents so I was very into this fragrance! I typically love Marc Jacobs Daisy, so if you like that type of scent I would definitely recommend trying this one! Absolutely beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: From reading the notes I knew this perfume was going to smell good but when I actually smelled it..... It smells like a feminine mystery with flowers. I’m in love. I actually went and bought a full size after receiving my sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it!! A little goes a long. The scent last all night. It is a little strong but nothing too crazy foe my sensitive sense of smell. Will definitely buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s like smelling cotton candy and flowers all at the same time. It leaves the senses guessing of what it will smell like once it has settled onto the skin. This is a great scent if you are looking for something new.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells perfect they did an awesome job on this one. I'd definitely purchase this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent smelled very nice and wasn't overpowering. I could douse myself in this and not feel sick. It was sweet and citrusy. I didn't get the floral notes that it supposedly has? However for the price it does NOT last long. I definitely stop noticing after an hour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While the scent reminds me of an old male friend’s cologne, I do have to say this smells absolutely amazing. The floral scents are soothing and not overpowering. After spraying on my wrists, the scent lasted throughout the day and even after washing hands and showering it stuck to a cloth bracelet I wear daily. While some may not like that the scent will linger on clothing, it’s such a pleasant scent I couldn’t be upset about it. The sample size is perfect for carrying in a bag for touch ups throughout the day. I don’t typically like drowning myself in perfumes and scents, so a little goes a long way for me. The price is high and as I don’t wear a lot of scents, unless on special occasions, I don’t see myself buying the largest size available.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this scent by Burberry,her. It's long lasting and a great scent. I honestly think it more smells like a man scent than for a women,but it smells wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from Influenster to test and review and it’s one of my new favorite smells! It’s so subtle, yet packs the right amount of punch. It’s such a dainty and beautiful smell with definite notes of floral and citrus! It’s such a feminine smell and would be great to wear on a date night! This will be added to my fragrance collection for sure! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance makes me feel feminine and beautiful! It’s light and delicate. It is a cherry, berry warm scent. I have been wearing it everyday since receiving my sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent! I received a sample to try out, and instantly fell in love. I sprayed a spritz on my wrist and one on my neck.  My husband came home from work and  instantly commented how nice I smelled. It’s a perfect mix of floral and sweet smelling, but not too sweet. Floral scent with a hint of vanilla. It’s very feminine smelling. Almost kind of flirty. Definitely a good date night scent.  I can’t wait to guy buy a full size bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells pretty, the dominant note is the berries. It’s not unique enough for me. Received a sample complimentary of Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this fragrance. To me, its a very nondescript fruity-floral fragrance that I could see a lot of women of different ages wearing. It smells like a creamy strawberry-smoothie--very sweet, very strawberry. I don't quite get the woodiness that is listed in the notes, but I do think this is a good everyday fragrance to throw on if you want to smell pleasant and feminine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hesitate to say this, but this one really wasn’t my cup of tea! When I’m picking a fragrance, I want to be knocked off my feet, and not be able to stop smelling it. This one wasn’t it unfortunately!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the scent when I first smelled it and put it on. But throughout the day the floral scent gives way to the more sweet tones and it the sweet becomes too much. It’s not awful because the scent isn’t super strong or long lasting overall. I just thought it was pretty average.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite perfume and I will be purchasing a full size! I didn’t know what to expect but I love it! I usually like vanilla scents but this is light and clean and I love it more than any other perfume I own!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m picky when it comes to perfumes but I like this one! For reference my usual perfume is Ralph Lauren Tender Romance. I got the 7.5 sample size and it went faster than I was expecting.   Please note I received this product complimentary from Influenster to test for a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: (I’ve received this for free for review.) Oh emm geeeeee! This smells so Delicious! It’s such a good scent not too strong or overpowering! Lasted all day for me and glad it did it smells so good I would definitely recommend this scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very impressed on the scent of this perfume I’m obsessed with perfumes and this one has to be one of my new favorites! To me it lasted all day and with just 2 sprays so to me is so worth it. Absolutely loved it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very lovely perfume. It is a wonderfully luxurious and floral scent which I really love - however it sadly doesn’t smell right on me. I would recommend trying it and hopefully it mixes with your body chemistry better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly enjoyed this perfume. It’s a strong musky-woodsy scent which I am not used to. I usually wear light floral perfumes, but I liked this one because it’s not overpowering but it is strong enough to last all day. I wore it to work, came back home and the scent was still going strong. I received this as a free sample but I will definitely be purchasing soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and fell in love. This fragrance is a fresh floral that smells amazing. Since I wash my hands frequently I put this on my forearm and my neck and it last all day. Once I used up my sample I had to purchase it for myself. It has become my everyday fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is the perfect combination of sweet and floral all in one. It is long lasting however won't last all day. After receiving it from @influenster complimentary for review. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re looking for the perfect sweet, citrusy, floral scent- then this is it! It lasts for quite a while but isn’t as long lasting as other scents I’ve used. I don’t mind though- I love reapplying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent — it’s warm, but not too heavy. Love that I could still catch the slight smell of it even after hours of wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received this complimentary gift and I gatta say, I love it! I’m not much of a perfume person myself as I find most to be a little overwhelming but this is a perfect hint of lovely! Might actually have to buy the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is amazing. I tried a sample of it, & am asking for a bottle for Christmas! (If I can wait that long)   It is light & refreshing, but smells polished & lasts all night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample. I think this is a great day time scent with is lightweight and not too overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great! Super feminine, it last most of the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to review on Influenster, and I think it is great. It has a nice, sleek bottle. All of my male friends complimented me whenever I used this perfume. Additionally, it lasts through a large portion of the day, and only needs a small application. This scent is not overpowering at all, and has a nice earthy, floral scent to it. I would definitely buy this in stores. It smells like it is a higher quality type of perfume, in my opinion. It has a light, sweet afterscent to it, as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, subtle, feminine scent! I liked it so much I considered buying full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

I was surprised how much I enjoyed this product! however i don't feel that for 100$ it smells like a 100$ perfume i feel like it doesn't last as long as it should i would suggest that if this is what you choose as ur sent go ahead and invest in the roller ball as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im in love with this perfume smells so good. I will be buying a big bottle of this perfume. Perfect to wear for work school for any occasion smells amazing.

reviews.review_text: I received this product free for testing purposes from Influenster. I absolutely love this perfume. The smell lasts most of the day but isn’t overwhelming. It has a floral scent with a mint of musk. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never met a Burberry fragrance I didn’t like, and Her is no exception. This fruity gourmand scent is light and feminine and lasts a good 8 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Clean, light scent. This was my first time trying this and I will surely try it again. I was gifted this scent. It is so feminine and not overwhelmingly heavy at all. I really like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells DELIGHTFUL! Deff worth its dollar. Not too stong. Very feminine sent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely gorgeously scented perfume!! It's not overpowering and lasts all day! It smells sweet and so delicious!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free to test. love perfume but some just don’t smell right on me. I’m pretty active and always looking for an “everyday” perfume that still makes me feel confident and this did just that! It’s bright and beautiful and I loved how it smelled on my skin. I could apply a few sprays and I never thought it was overpowering. It smelled even better as the day went on. I even enjoyed it as I was working out. Loving it! It feels flirty and playful on and love that it has a unique smell but never overpowering!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary sample of this perfume. I really like it! It reminds me of cotton candy, a very sweet scent but NOT overly sweet. I would describe it as very girly and feminine. It also has fairly good lasting power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A really good fragrance for a first date, a brunch with the ladies or even a quick pick me up. It’s incredibly refreshing, light but floral. I love that the scent lasts quite some time and lingers well if sprayed in your hair. It’s something I’ll keep in my handbag if I ever need it. My husband also loves it, finds it warm to smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from influencer to test it has a beautiful floral smell but after using the whole sample through out the week it does not stay all day.

reviews.review_title: Nice beginner fragrance, but not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry has quite a reputation for fragrances, and when you think of burberry perfumes, you probably think of their standouts that have been worn for decades.  The imagery of this perfume is girly-early 20s, mini skirts, carefree love. when I out it on, I got raspberry and musk. my first impression was that, while that's a nice mix, with musk adding complexity to girly fruity raspberry, it was just an odd combination. As it dried down, I got strawberry milkshake, candy, and fli stone vitamins as a powdery, chalky note. That's not to say that it's awful, but it's just a really youthful fragrance, smells like something a 17 year old who loves London fashion and longs for maturity, but secretly loves her saccharine vices, would wear. Sillage is decent-My boyfriend could smell it sitting a few feet away from me. I could smell it 8 hours later if I sniffed my wrist, but it sticks best to clothes and hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this perfume. It's slightly floral but not overwhelming with a sweet clean scent. I have worn it several times and the scent last most of the day. I would definitely recommend this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary form Influenster for testing purposes, and it smells so good! The smell reminds me of a rich debutant, but it’s still light enough for someone young(I’m 25.) I’ll definitely be purchasing this when my sample runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I tend to be pretty picky with perfumes — I hate ones that are too musky or overpowering. I’ve been using Glossier’s perfume for 2 years and over time, the scent has not lasted as long as I would like. With Her, I’m in love because it only takes one spritz and voila — I smell amazing. It’s a strong but not overpowering scent that has a nice spice to it. My boyfriend is also a big fan and keeps commenting on how good I smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved a complimentary sample size of Burberry Her. When I first spray this perfume on it smells sweet. As it settles it has more of an adult scent, something I would wear to work more than for a night out. The scent is not too 'perfume-y' and didn't cause any sort of headache or irritation. The perfume stays on all day without wearing off or starting to smell old. Overall this is a perfume that I will continue to wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size from #Influenster #VoxBox. As always, I find it hard to full review sample sized items as the bottle, dispenser et cetera is a factor; for Parfumes this statement is immensely true as the sample size seems to diffuse differently.   The scent itself is beautiful. I find it to be playful and sexy. I received compliments from many; Including just husband who is hard to impress.   The musks have been in heavy release as Fall comes. I'm in a hot part of the country, but feel like this floral, spicey, musk would be improved by wear in a slightly cooler area.   This is a healthy, playful musk with a sexy floral trail. Smooth and lasts quite some time.  - I could not review the bottle.

This product was sent to me from influenster and I tried it and I'm just going to tell you right now hands down it is one of my all-time favorite friends I absolutely loved it it smells beautiful and classy and it had a very pretty sent and made me feel beautiful and I fell in love with it and I purchased one bottle immediately. Everywhere I Go somebody is asking me what perfume I'm wearing and I tell them and they have all went and got bottles! I am now obsessed and I hope that after you read this review if you have been wanting to try this but was hesitant please go get the bottle is the best.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A little bit sure does go a long way with this one. The scent is nothing I would rave about. It's not terrible but it's not necessarily something I would pick at the store. I will say it gets 5 stars for how long it lasts. I don't think I've ever owned a perfume that lasts as long as this one. If you like smelling like baby powder than this is definitely for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

Doesn’t last Too long so between the price and how long it lasts kind of sucks.  I was going to order a regular sized item until I realized how much it cost. Hopefully they will run a sale sometime soon. Maybe I’ll add it to my Xmas list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume as a sample from Influenster to try and in glad I got it. Cute and flirty scent.  Notes of sandalwood peonies and pink peppercorn.  It does last long on my skin and the scent gives me an Adventist for her(creed) kinda smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The name “her” fits this so perfectly. It’s floral and soft for any time. This really seems sophisticated and expensive overall. It’s really memorable but it does say soft and sweet. I would recommend this to anyone that likes the ocean or flower smells. Or even if you need a date night special smell. I really like this because it is different than my more earthy smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like strawberries, vanilla, and champagne mixed together! Delicious and not overwhelming. Thankfully has no alcohol scent to it like most perfumes. I love this. I received this product complimentary to review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: while it's a nice floral kind of scent, it doesn't have much staying power and i notice it leaving fairly quickly as is the problem with most floral perfumes. the sample was smaller than i expected

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a small sample size from Influenster and the smell is a cross between a perfume for older women and young adult women. I can see why some women are unsure about it. It’s not too pricey depending on where you buy it from.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A woman with her head held high, hips swinging, heading toward a meeting with haste. This is what this smell makes me think of. Its strong, long lasting, and has the potential to make your head spin. You can definitely get a wiff of something sweet smelling but it turns into a delicate floral smell. There is also a brash woody scent when its concentrated but as it wears out, it leaves an intoxicating smell, like a dark twist on Flower Bomb by Victor Rolf.   I received this free or complimentary from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this clave the it smells amazing it even smells great days after spraying , will be purchasing this it the near future being I only received a sample size .   I received these products complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved a 1.5ml Sample of this in my Influenster Vox Box in exchange for my honest review.  So here it is: I was taken aback by how sweet and strong the scent is - and not in a good way.  It is just too sweet for what I like.  I prefer floral and spicy notes and this is just a very sweet strong perfume.  I tried just spraying the tiniest amount, in hopes that would help - but it didn't.  I couldn't wait for it to wear off of me.  I give 2 stars because it isn't a terrible scent and it does have staying power.  But it missed the mark with me.  I more prefer perfumes like: VS Tease, Philosophy Nude Rose, and YSL Black Opium (to give some reference).

Not that I think fragrances have textures, but there’s something in all my favorites that have a “smell” (for lack of better words) that translates to me as resinous, fuzzy to the point of almost becoming tactile. Cloud has this quality as well, which I think is what gives them relatively similar vibes. This, however, blew me away! It has that resin-like feel from first spray through the drydown, which is outstanding with the strawberry dominated top notes. I don’t necessarily get the ice cream/sorbet typed strawberry here, but I saw someone say jammy, and I feel that describes it wonderfully. Strawberries with caramelized sugar, that melts into a not too sweet cream that gives a really beautiful dense feeling to it. It doesn’t drydown to any bandaid or antiseptic smell to me, but it holds up very, very well. I haven’t worn a Burberry fragrance since high school, but I’m so happy to have this. It’s definitely worth a try if you’re looking for a new signature scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very surprised by this perfume. I normally gravitate towards non-sweet and classic smells (vanilla notes) but this one smelled really good. My partner noticed it right away and I only put on a little. It’s semi floral but with a tint of vanilla, not super strong and smooth. I would definitely consider buying the full bottle! The only thing is that the smell didn’t last all day, I work 9-5 and by midday I couldn’t smell the perfume.

reviews.review_title: I like it, but my husband’s obsessed...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have a pretty substantial collection of perfumes, soaps and lotions ranging from inexpensive to high end. Smelling good helps my mood and makes me feel sexy.   That being said, this is something my husband loves about me. Out of all the perfumes I wear and spent money on, I got this complimentary perfume sample from Influenster and my husband had the nerve to tell me this was his favorite out of ALL OF THEM. I couldn’t believe it lol. I wore it about five times and each time he instantly noticed I had it on and was all over me.   The layers of this perfume are complex and each one is different than the next. On my skin, it starts off clean and sharp with a lingering scent of jasmine. Then, as it sits, that smell disappears (unfortunately because it’s my favorite note) and turns into a sweet berry smell. That smell lingers a while and then you begin to smell the vanilla and amber a bit more.   I’ve owned Burberry perfume and I’ve never smelled a sweet scent from them, so I was pleasantly surprised. It’s not sickeningly sweet like teen spirit, but it’s a mature, warm sweetness that comforts you and entices you at the same time. I liked it when I smelled it, but I’ll admit that my husband’s love for it made me like it more. He politely let me know he’ll be buying me the full bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume as a sample and it smell good. Would buy it. I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary for testing purposes. It was just on. Smells good but doesn’t last very long. It’s more on the sugary sweet side, which I don’t mind, but I wish it lasted throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Influenster in a sample size and absolutely loved it! It’s the oerfect feminine scent for women in their 20s or 30s. I am definitely getting a bigger bottle. My husband noticed right away too and complimented me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a free sample in the sample size. I had never tried this perfume before, and it has a sweet smell, it lasted me all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the smell of this fragrance. It was light and not overpower. I loved the slight flower scent it had. It also helped that color was very visually appealing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This might be my new favorite perfume! It smells sweet and fruity. The best part is it’s hard to find a perfume that lasts all day but it managed to do so!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this perfume in exchange for my honest review. The scent reminded me immediately of a gummy bear scented body spray that my friends and I wore as kids. Obviously, this one smells a bit more mature, but it is definitely on the sweeter side. My husband complimented it every time I wore it and said it smelled “fresh, but not like a fresh scent.” It has good lasting power too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this perfume which at first I didnt like too much because it was very strong and flowery/fruity. However, once it wore off a little bit I loved the smell. Its very rich and the scent last a long time. However, if you are against those strong scents this might not be the perfume for you. My boyfrjend loved it but jm not sure I would buy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received complimentary sample size of Burberry's Her Eau de Parfum and I love it! When you first spray it, it smells very sweet and fruity. A little spray definitely goes a long way. As you wear it longer, the scent mellows out and has a very soft smell. I would consider buying this in the future in a full size bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a free sample and have to say it does smell very nice but not sure if it’s for me per say. It reminds me of cotton candy with some warmth to it. The first time I wore it very summery but was good for day time brunch in the fall the other day as well. I felt though the smell didn’t last long though. I suggest people trying this. It’s clean and light and may work better for others than myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received this sample size perfume to test out, and I gotta say I have never had a perfume actually last long..  it smell if flowery which I don’t really vibe with but with this one I actually can..  I’m a little disappointed that it was such a small size. 1.5ML-0.05 I would totally buy the bigger one...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume was a complimentary for testing  from Influenster. It took me a couple of days to try it because I’m not a fan of Burberry, but when I did I was surprised of how soft it smells. The scent is very light which is perfect for me. It last about 6 hours. Definitely is a daytime perfume. But even with the  light scent I would rather wear it for brunch or shopping not at the office. So if you think you’ll be around people that are sensitive to strong smell of perfumes, they will love the scent of this one because it’s perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample vial to test this parfum out. It’s a spicy floral scent that changes from the first Layer to the bottom layer. My only concern is on me, I found this fragrance did not wear long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary of Burberry, I was given the opportunity to try Burberry Her Eau de Parfum for free. Some things I enjoyed about the perfume were the overall notes. I used to love extremely sweet scents but haven’t reached for perfumes like that in a while, so this reminded me of a more muted sweet scent I would’ve worn back in the day. I really enjoy the sweet, fruity notes with a perfect balance of softer, more sultry notes that complimented each other perfectly. I typically don’t love floral scents alone as they are too strong, but this scent was lighter and didn’t bother me whatsoever. I even received compliments when wearing the perfume. As for the negatives, I received half a vile of a small sample, so it was hard to fully test and review since it lasted maybe 3-4 wears. Additionally, I noticed that the perfume did not have a long staying power and I felt that it wore off by the time I got to wherever I was going after application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When I read the notes that are in this scent, I was very excited. Red and dark berries and white wood accord representing the vibrant, bold, and full of life city of London. I wish I could have liked this scent, but on my skin, it smelled very flowery and powder room-y. I definitely was not a fan of this scent on me specifically, but I’m sure it would be beautiful on someone else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this scent smelled good but it was a little sting for me. You definitely only need a little spray for the perfect amount of scent that lasts all day. It has many floral tones with a hint of a spicy bite. This would be a perfect scent for going out or a fancy sophisticated occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells very strong from the initial whiff from the bottle. The only note I got from the initial smell was the scent of dryer sheets. It was very overwhelming. After spraying the perfume on my wrist, I still smelled the undertone of musk and cotton, but the scent had much more depth overall. I guess the best way to describe it is a warm and fuzzy scent. I enjoy the floral scent that comes out when actually on my skin. I probably wouldn’t purchase this based on the cost. It has a beautiful, classy bottle, but it’s a pass for me. I do think it is worth trying it out to see if it works for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was given a sample for testing purposes. I am sensitive to fragrances whether reactions or headaches sometimes. This; however, did not cause one for me! It is a sophisticated, floral scent with hints of sweetness and warmth. It also layers well with other scents. My only complaint is it didn’t last long and had to reapply in just a couple hours. I cannot comment on packs fine but judging by the pictures it looks classic, elegant and simple. I’m a perfume collector and know that is also important to some! I would consider purchasing this in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has great qualities in regards to the smell staying on me all day until I shower and how potent it is. But I unfortunately I was just not a fan of the smell personally. I do have this brand of perfume already just another scent and they are great! Would definitely recommend to a friends or family that I know would enjoy the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is super pretty. I really liked it. I even liked it when I sprayed it. Unfortunately, when it mixed with my skin the scent changed to a decent I really didn’t like. Was so bummed out when that happened.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry makes fine upscale products, so I was excited to receive a free sample of Her perfume through Influenster. I chose to give a 3 star review simply because the scent isn’t for me. It’s not unpleasant at all, and I’ll spritz my sample on for a change of pace, but overall, it’s very sweet - I prefer subtle, smoky florals. The most notable scent is a very bright, sweet scent that reminds me of pink rock candy or a Jolly Rancher, followed by an ending floral note. The bottle is pretty on it’s simplicity, and I think the price point is fair. The fragrance lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Had a beautiful light floral scent. Not too heavy and it was light and airy. I received it for free in exchange for my honest review. I only wish I had been sent a larger size. The VERY tiny sample is hard to get a decent opinion based on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i got this for free on influenster and i love the smell! they sent me a tiny one, and it’s a nice pleasantly strong scent that will last so it’s good value and i definitely will buy it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this because BR540 is my favorite perfume and I wanted to smell this for myself since I kept seeing the comparison everywhere. I DON’T GET IT. BR540 is so complex, sweet yet woodsy, and this just smells like one of those scented dolls from the 90s to me. Insanely sweet plastic is all I get from this on my skin. If you love this, no judgement, but if you’re looking for a BR540 dupe, this ain’t it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is spectacular, it has a sexy and sweet aroma at the same time, the packaging is very cute and elegant, you will definitely not regret it, it is for women with style

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample trial size of this and I really like this perfume. It’s floral scented but not overly floral ish. I only needed a small spritz of it and it lasted quite a while. I like that it’s long lasting without being overly strong. Def would recommend if you like floral scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great smell but I wish it would last longer once you apply. Besides that, I totally love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Her might be my new fav scent:.   Received as a complimentary sample.  Woodsy yet fruity smell.   Perfect fall scent.  Many compliments wearing  this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It is a very Cotton candy  Kind of smell very sweet smell great last all day  . I received as complimentary  for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Burberry Her Eau De Parfum complimentary from Influenster to review. Overall, the scent wasn’t for me. It smelled a too sweet and mature for me. The fragrance was very strong. The product description does say that the scent is bold, but I personally think it goes beyond bold, to overpowering. Both my mom and my husband did not like the strong smell, either. The perfume had a strong alcohol scent upon first spraying it and it took a while to dissipate. Even after the scent wore off a bit, it was still overpowering; I smelled my wrist after I’d been wearing it for nearly five hours and the scent was still strong enough to make me sneeze. On a positive note, the fragrance is very long-lasting. However, I’d caution anyone with allergies or a sensitive nose against buying this fragrance since it’s so strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the fact that this is a great scent, day or night...it doesn’t last too long on the skin and it could be a bit less expensive for that very reason. I do like the brand but I would improve the lasting time once sprayed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so nice! It has a floral and clean scent with a hint of sweetness. I love sweet scents but not too overpowering which makes this scent perfect. I spray 3 times near my neck and wrist and the scent lasts the whole day. I received a sample size for this perfume but would like to get the full size soon. I received this product as a free sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You know when you want that go to perfume where it’s not so heavy but it smells just right this is the perfume for you.  I could honestly say I could wear this every day and not get sick of it, it is definitely an every day type of perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this product to try. It has a sweet scent but it’s not overwhelming. It lasted a really long time on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I got this in my influenster box and I was super excited to try it. However, I wasn’t in love with it. It is very sweet , too sweet for my liking. I saw a lot of people saying this is “fresh” I don’t feel like it’s fresh at all. I feel like the sweetness makes it heavy. I wore it a couple different times and I did get compliments on it but not something I’d want to buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample from Influenster it was a lovely perfume and had a great smell. Something I would recommend for anyone’s collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how Fresh and light this scent is. It’s perfect for everyday and is so beautiful. I received this as a sample and would love to add it to my perfume collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a fan of Burberry, but definitely not of this scent.  I wore it out 3 different times and had complaints all 3 times about my hideous perfume.  this scent just isn't for me personally  thanks for the free sample anyways!

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample to try out. This will be my honest opinion though. It’s a light scent..but you don’t need to  reapply throughout the day it’s a scent that lingers. Sweet not like flowery or like a pastry  but sweet nonetheless. Someone who is not into highly scented items or sensitive about scents  may love this. It’s not for me but I will keep the sample...it goes very well with one of my scented lotions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this amazing perfume from Influenster and absolutely loved it! It’s so fresh and smells incredible. I usually wear Opium by YSL but this sample has me changing my mind! Would definitely recommend :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample from Influenster for testing purposes and totally loved it. The scent is very fresh! I love the color and packaging... I would definitely recommend this for any purfum lover!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not a big fan of this scent.  It is just OK for me.  It is very strong at first and gets softer afterwards.  It does last all day but it’s not the kind of smell I want on my body.  I prefer soft, feminine, floral and sweet scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very soft fragrance that lasts for hours. The scent is bearable and is very refreshing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On initial spritz on my arm it smells nicely floral and turns into a musky mature scent. For the duration of the scent on my arm it goes from manly to grandma-floral very fast. Not my favorite and I would steer clear if you don't like mature scents like these. The staying power is pretty decent and lasts on my arm. Nothing too strong or overpowering. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a free sample from Influenster. The first scent of this perfume I absolutely loved, however the after scent on me was just not my favorite. The beginning is fruity and floral, almost similar to the Daisy (pink bottle, want to say daisy love) but there’s a second scent to it that wasn’t as great. For the price per bottle, I wouldn’t purchase this bottle and would instead choose the pink daisy bottle! Overall it’s not a bad scent, just the afterscent didn’t last long or smell the same on me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample from Influenster for testing purposes and I enjoyed it. The scent is very subtle with a fresh note. The base is fantastic and long lasting. I would definitely recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love love this perfume! I only wish it came in a bigger size because it's almost gone! Burberry really hit the nail on the head with this one. Looking up the actual bottle, I fell in love even more!

reviews.review_title: Wish I sampled this scent sooner !!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
