reviews.review_text: Wow I have never bothered to sample Burberry perfume before boy do I regret it. This smells AMAZING. It has a very feminine, elegance to it. It's a sweet scent without being too sweet. Subtle sweetness. Its very long lasting as I've only sprayed my wrist with one mist and it's been 5 hrs and I can still smell it. It's not over powering at all. I found myself smelling my wrist constantly because it's just so good. I'm just sad the complimentaeybsample I received was so small. Now I HAVE to buy the full full size asap!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells almost identical to chapstick brand cherry chapstick. Which for me is neither a good or a bad thing, more nostalgic than anything else. Would I buy this fragrance for my regular rotation? No, but fit the few weeks I’ve worn it during the last lingering days of summer it’s been a fun reminiscent scent. I received this product free in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume had a musky after scent that I personally don’t prefer. Kinda reminds me of the Tom Fords scents.    I received this product as a free sample

reviews.review_title: Different than what I normally would go for
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have to admit that this isn’t something that I would normally reach for but I am pleasantly surprised! It is exactly what the scent describes with red and dark berry notes and woodsy. I will be using my sample until the last drop!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tested this out for a day wearing it work and errands. It definitely lasts and I even got whiffs of it after wearing all day! It smells fruity and woodsy at the same time which makes it so mysterious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The fruity notes from this parfum are the first and most intense fragrance you catch. Underneath a light and playful catch of white wood comes next. This lasts longer on the skin than the first berry notes. The packaging is beautiful a modern take on Burberry classic motif.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVED the scent. It’s a mix of floral and fruity. Definitely feminine, flirty, and upbeat. It actually reminded me of a soap I make, which was a fun surprise. The scent itself is totally 5 stars. Two reasons I’m giving 4 stars- ingredients and price. The price of the fill-size bottle is a little steep for me, but I would love to grab a roller ball size. And all- natural and toxin free ingredients are important to me, which this product isn’t.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I looove how sweet this perfume is, it smells really good and it’s not overwhelming at all but you can smell it for sure. Definitely is going to be my next purchase
Great scent! A really intriguing mix of sweet and musky. Definitely smells unique in a good way. My only complaint is that I wish the scent was longer lasting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is my new all time favorite! I've never smelled this scent before receiving a complementary sample in my Vox Box, but it's a lovely light floral, clean, slightly musky scent. It's such a beautiful combination and sits well on your skin and the scent lasts all day. Totally recommend this to everyone. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this intoxicating scent. I’m a religious user of Viva La Juicy and this just replaced it. It’s warm and feminine and I get so many compliments on it. It’s not overpowering and lasts all day long.

reviews.review_title: Does not smell fruity or floral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume does not smell floral at all whatsoever! It’s very heavy on the amber/musk tones. On the bright side it is long lasting. If you’re into fruity floral scents like I am pass on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary sample of the Burberry Her fragrance from Influenster. This fragrance smells amazing, it is light, fruity and makes you feel fresh and feminine. I would certainly recommend this product for women who enjoy a fresh floral and fruity fragrance. This exact product is my favorite kind of fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster for review. I've been stuck buying the same perfume for years since I am a person of habit so I am glad I got the opportunity to try this perfume out. I love how sweet, delicious, and delicate it smells. It a nice smell that reminds me of cotton candy and like I am in some whimsical dream. I now wear it every day and am definitely going to buy a full sized bottle soon. Definitely recommend people trying it if you like sweet fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time sampling a Burberry perfume. It smells amazing!! It’s definitely the type of scent I would wear–smells so sweet! I wish it came in a bigger sample size instead of the 1.5ml because I liked it so much. Glad I got to try it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent, it is definitely worth the money! It's sophisticated, sweet and warm. I get many compliments when I wear it, LOVE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am already a fan of Burberry's fragrances, and Her definitely does not disappoint! This is my first time trying this scent, and I really like it a lot. At first I was a little bit unsure because it was so strong, but once it settled down and mixed with my natural chemistry it was very light and subtle. It smells like a mix of floral and berries, with a slight woody hint. The description of the scent matches it pretty perfectly. I do wish that I had a little bit larger of a bottle to sample, because the scent fades away rather fast compared to other fragrances. I got a couple of day's use out of my sample bottle, so a few more day's worth would really give me a better idea of if I want to purchase a full sized bottle or not. Burberry fragrances are a little bit pricey, and I like Brit and London a bit more than this one. I definitely recommend this if you like floral scents. I honestly don't know if I want to repurchase this one or not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I was skeptical but being Burberry I knew it couldn't be disappointed and hunni I was so right!! This sample came to me in ny Voxbox from influenster and this little sample packed a sweet flirty light smelling sent that last all day. It's not an old lady smell whatsoever and I wpuld wear this sent during the spring time or on a sexy night with a special someone after showering and I would rub my skin all over his as he endures this sweet sweet smell on my hot sexy body. The purchase is worth it and I'm sold get it now before it sells out cause it will.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For the first spray, it came off strong and I didn't know what type of scent I was picking up so I kept using it. The best way I can describe it is that it is a  woody, floral scent with some sweetness and warmth in it. It is definitely different than what I usually like. I surprisingly like it and am thinking about buying the full size.

When I got the email that I was part of the campaign I seriously had the biggest smile on my face cause I couldn’t wait to try it ! I really really love it !! I’ve have purchased Burberry perfumes in the past and this one hands down might be my favorite. It’s a sweeter scent perfume but not overwhelming. It’s on the lighter side and I think it’s perfect for everyday use.. when I first tried it on everyone in my house asked what it was and they said they loved it! Definitely purchasing the bigger size bottle ! Highly recommended to everyone looking for a new go-to scent I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So there’s part of me that absolutely loves the smell of this and part of me that hates it. At first I was like oh no, this smells like an old lady’s bathroom but five minutes later the scent changed and because very light and clean. It’s just a bit too sweet for me. Once that sweetness fades and the clean scent comes out then it’s a good one. I just wish that sweetness wasn’t there at all. I got a sample complimentary from Influenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample in a voxbox and was really happy with the scent. It's not too strong but definitely stays smelling really nice for a long time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really great perfume. I am super picky about what scents I can wear because they don’t mix well with my chemistry but this one is light enough that I am not left with a headache. It’s the right combo of sweet and floral. I was given a tester bottle of this but I will be buying a big bottle shortly! It’s a winner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this perfume. The smell is heavenly. Floral, girly, clean, fresh. I can’t wait to buy a bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this scent. It literally distracted me from work because it’s a heady, sensual mix of undertones. It has sweet fruity notes, with a bit of floral musk. If I was walking through a public space & smelled this, I would instantly turn to locate the person wearing it.  Perfect for a first date, anniversary, big meeting - I feel confident and, dare I say, sexy, when just walking through my house. My husband loves it too (naturally ;) )

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a soft floral scent. It’s a very appealing scent not too over bearing but still powerful enough to be noticed. I will buy again foe sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing. The blush color is to die for the smell is sweet smelling not overpowering. Last all day will definitely recommend and gift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this scent. It's light but feminine. It almost reminds me of cotton candy. I usually use body sprays and not perfume, but this has made me change my mind. I plan to get more. I wear it every day and I love that the scent lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Burberry perfume is a beautiful, classic, feminine scent. It lingers and lasts all day. I found the scent even stays on my clothes. It is not overpowering or too fragrant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved it i havent had a favorite perfume in a while. It smells elegant and expensive

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Is verry woody but it has a toned scent like acid the i don't like. I use it 2 days straight and got sick off the smell. Maybe for a more older women or someone whit old spirit will love it but not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This really is that girl. I love the smell and it doesn’t fade easily. This is definitely a gem worth having

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this perfume!!! the scent lasts forever. im very sensitive to certain body sprays and perfumes, I get headaches alot from some of them and this one doesn't give me a headache. definitely one of .my new favorite scents which is crazy cause I love scents that are woodsy and earthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume! I wish the scent lasted a little longer, but other than that it is absolutely wonderful. Will buy again & recommend to all my friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfume does have a soft sweet scent when first applying. However, within minutes the scent becomes overwhelming with the amber and musk. I would like to give this more stars based on the fact the perfume stays and lingers for quite a long time. However the scent is not quite what I like. I did give this 4 stars instead of 3 because I let my mom try this and she loved it. She said the warm amber was delightful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying this fragrance. I really wanted to love this perfume but it smelled awful. It was not what I was expecting from Burberry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent! I wore it a couple times and love it not a overwhelming scent. I definitely will purchase and recommend. I wore to a birthday party and received compliments on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry's Her is a dedication to the city of London. It has a burst of red and dark berry notes lightened by a luminous, white woody accord. It smells great. I love the concept of the bottle as it's simple and beautiful just like any other Burberry bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With the price being so steep the only con I can say is evident is the lack of longevity. I really wish the berry notes stayed but they fade pretty quickly and the more musky clean jasmine notes stay a bit longer. I still like this scent regardless and plan on purchasing just not a big bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume complimentary of Influenster to give my honest review.  I wish Influenster would have sent me a larger bottle. I really like this fragrance and I will be purchasing a full bottle in the future ( soon). I like the subtle not overbearing strong scent and I really like how it has a sweet aroma to it. It has a cotton candy like scent to it too.  It great for days when you are going to a dinner date or even a romantic night. This is another for my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent of this fragrance, floral and sexy at the same time. Last forever and I mean forever, sprayed my purse by mistake a few days ago and I swear I still smell it on there. Thank you to Influenster for letting me try my new favorite perfume for free first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this perfume. It lasts all day and has a very sophisticated scent. It is definitely a perfume you can use for many occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think it’s just me and my own personal preferences when it comes to scents, but I found this to be incredibly sweet. I’m much more inclined to more woodsy or musty scents and this is the complete opposite of that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received these products complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes. I love this perfume. It’s the prefect scent. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary sample of Burberry Her to test and review.  Light, floral, fruity- very feminine and romantic. Would be a great summer evening fragrance and ideal for date night. I love how sexy it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the Burberry her campain Voxbox from Influenster. It was a free sample for testing purpose of the perfum and I have to say I love how I could smell the burst of red and dark berry notes.   I think it is a perfum that makes me feel adventurous, brave, powerful, full of energy, more beautiful, and with good vibes!  I definitely loved it and will recommend it to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary sample of Burberry Her to test and review.  Light, floral, fruity- very feminine and romantic. Would be a great summer evening fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this perfume a lot. the floral and berry notes are lovely but very sweet. It reminds me of candy. I am a fan of sweet perfumes but this one can be a bit overpowering. I think it may be a pass for people that are sensitive to strong scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a fun and flirty scent. Very sweet. Everyone love it. Even my co worker is looking to buy. Was able to try it free via influencer. And made a purchase for more. Must try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Burberry fragrances nces, but this one sadly , doesn't work for me. Too woody

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is extremely sweet smelling. Not what I expected from Burberry. It smelled very young, something I would expect a teenager to wear. It was a very long lasting perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this perfume and it’s such a cute scent. It’s light and feminine. It’s definitely a floral scented and would be amazing year round. I didn’t get a headache so I’d recommend to those who love lighter scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has multiple layers or waves of scent. It’s sweet but not too sweet and then it is earthy. I likes the smell better after it had been on my skin for a few min versus straight out of the bottle. I received this product complementary In exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in my voxbox. so tiny that I could spray it only once. I was totally disappointed with smell. Not at all long lasting. I saw price on sephora and its very expensive. not at all worth it. I don't love the smell also its not at all ling lasting. After an hour I met my friend and asked her if she could smell it but she said it seems like you forgot to use it. No smell at all. Worst perfume ever. Note: Received tiny sample from influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, I was hoping I’d like this and I gave it a try two separate days. I can’t pinpoint exactly why I don’t like it but the smell is not pleasing. I received this as a sample for my honest review on this product. I’m usually a huge fan of Burberry but this scent is a No for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Prepare yourself, for the fun flirty and citrusy scent of her! This perfume is the perfect combination of light, crispy and airy scents with an undertone of floral aspects. Personally I think it’s the perfect perfume to wear to brunch or out for an evening of winetasting. Not per se and every day sent, but rather something to really dress up your outfit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A little too much for me. One spray is all I need it’s very powerful for my liking. Super fruity and a little floral scent. I received my complimentary sample through Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a fan. It smells very sweet and doesn’t last all day. I expected more from Burberry. The sample was also a very tiny container, not easy to use and fully experience the scent.

reviews.review_title: Heavy on fruity, light on floral
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m barely getting the floral notes. I feel like the sweet notes are very strong. just as a personal preference I prefer more masculine notes or true floral. sweet smiles remind me of body sprays or school-age. I received a very small sample through influenster so im not sure if maybe im not applying enough. I cant smell it after a little while and i dont receive any compliments or feedback so im assuming it just fades quickly. i think this would be a nice gift for a young girl or somebody who likes sweet perfumes. just not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this product in my Sept. VOX BOX, and I loved it. It is youthful with fruity and floral notes.  It is a great everyday perfume that smells great in yhe bottle, but even better on the skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This easily became my new signature fragrance! I love the notes in this scent, it’s floral, yet hints of amber musk peak through. It’s not too strong, but lasts all day. I received it as a sample from Influenster, but I plan to purchase since I loved it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Never tried Burberry perfume due to my thoughts of the scent, I thought it paired better with older women. However after trying the free sample from Influenster,  I am a changed woman! However I give it 4/5 because the scent tends to fade after the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has a really strong powdery/floral scent that lasts a long time. Even a small spritz will last a few hours so go lightly if you’re sensitive to strong perfumes! This is a very sweet, feminine scent perfect for a spring/summer outing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: a fruity floral gourmand with raspberry, cherry, strawberry, blackberry, blueberry, violet, jasmine, woods, musk and amber. ... By 30 minutes in, it wears like a mild fruity musk, rather clean, lightly vanillic, with a pale dusting of powder. It does smell young, and it does smell blush pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this sample free from Influenster! I don’t normally like Burberry perfumes but this one smells amazing. It has a sweet flowery smell on it plus I’ve gotten a ton of compliments on it!! Thanks Influenster!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So i really HATE sweet smelling perfumes but this one was a perfect blend of sweetness! it reminded me a little of cotton candy, but not too sweet at all. I will be buying the big bottle of this, it’s that’s good  I received this as a free sample from influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start by saying that this fragrance smells nice. It is my first time trying Burberry's fragrance. I personally have it 4 stars instead of 5 because it's a bit too sweet for my liking. I'm usually one who prefers a more earthy or musky scent, so this was far too sweet for my personally preference; however, it is still a very nice perfume scent and it seems to last for a decent amount of time (not all day though). If you're one who likes sweet, almost candy like smells, your will love this fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this sample free from Influenster! I don’t normally like Burberry perfumes but this one smells amazing. It smells so light and airy plus I’ve gotten a ton of compliments on it! I also love the look of the bottle! May be repurchasing very soon! Thanks Influenster!!!

reviews.review_title: Amazing scent, not so amazing wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is great but not long lasting. Such a shame! The scent is truly so beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this perfume complimentary for testing purposes, and I was not particularly a fan of it. It is advertised as floral and powdery, but it is very sweet and very very strong smelling. One spray made the whole room smell of it and it lingered. If you're prone to headaches from perfume, I wouldnt recommend this one. Scent is very powdery, fruity, gourmand, which I'm personally not a fan of. The price is ok for the brand and how long lasting the scent is, but its not a perfume I would buy given a choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s nice and long lasting but not quite my scent profile. It has somewhat of a powdery scent but is bit stronger and muskier end note. Overall it’s nice for people who prefer that scent profile. I tend to prefer fresh scents

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a typical scent I would have purchased but it has a nice light smell. It doesn't last as long as I would prefer. As for price, it is on average with other perfumes. I would purchase this as a nice summer scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is literally my favorite perfume of all time. it smells so good, it’s not too light, it’s not too heavy, it’s slightly floral, it’s slightly musky, it’s an ethereal combination, and i use it every single day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has a very nice fragrance. It’s more on the warm and sweet side.  Scent is potent and long lasting but not overwhelming. I received a sample size of this and sprayed about half of the little vial. Scent lasted from afternoon into the late night. Price is a bit expensive, but I love the fragrance and would purchase in the future.
This scent is extremely bold and powerful. It’s a very distinct scent. Smells very sweet and fruity. I received this fragrance complimentary to review on Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love warm but fresh scents. Her is just that; a beautiful warm but fresh soft scent. One of those scents you can’t accidentally over apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing, I love the combination of fruity and floral. I don’t like anything that is too floral, this is just right! I have a sample only but will definitely purchase in a larger size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Less is definitely more with this perfume, and the scent lasts a loooooong time. It’s not as fruity or clean as perfumes I usually go for, but it’s good to wear every now and again. It’s challenging to get a full view of the perfume since the sample size I got on my voxbox was so small.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honest amazing perfume, the scent is more sweet but fresh as well. I honestly just received a sample and now I’m going to have to buy the whole perfume. It stays on your a while as well. Literally obsessed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I tried this perfume the first thing I noticed was how it smells different than all other perfumes. It is a blend of sweet and spicy, but I’d say it leans more on the spicy side as you wear it throughout the day. It’s definitely long lasting, I’ve had it one for the entire day and I can still smell it. I definitely like it and would recommend it to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so amazing and fresh. After I received the sample I had to run out and buy the larger bottle. Burberry hit it out of the park on this one.  It is a bit pricy but you get what you pay for.  I would recommend this to others!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume lasts all day and smells amazing. It’s light but not too light. I am absolutely in love with it and will be purchasing a full size bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you for sending me this product, it’s great for summer time. So fresh and light! Highly recommended for those ladies who likes semi sweat perfumes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've found that some fragrance companies think that women want to smell sweet. Although I like a little bit of sweet undertones, Burberry's Her is way too sweet. I'm thankful that the fragrance lasts a long time, but I wish the sweetness were tuned down a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells so sweet, girly and light. I love it. It might just be my new favorite perfume. Even though it’s light, you still don’t need to put much on. It lasts all day. I would definitely recommend this to friends and family!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample to try for this review. If you love the scent, I have good news for you! The scent lasts for hours and is quite strong. This particular perfume was not my favorite. I think more sophisticated, older women would love this. I felt the scent was a bit too old fashioned for someone in their late 20s/ early 30s.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free for testing from influenster. I love the smell of this! It's so beautiful and floral but in a clean, light and airy way. Its a bit pricey but it's a great fragrance for any occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent, but not for me. This scent is a bit more fem than my style, but would recommend to a friend. Not as long lasting as I would’ve liked but I love that the scent isn’t simple. It is floral, fruity, musky... ?! Really unique and sweet! Great every day scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received these products complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes. Omg this scent is heavenly! Such a good winter smell it reminds me of a fancy gala. I love this smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Recieved a free sample and love the smell. It has a light airy fragrance and last all day. Fragrances can always be considered pricey but this is a great everyday fragrance. My husband could not get enough of it so now we are looking for a mens with similar notes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the floral scent! People commented all day! Only thing was I had to use 5 sprays instead of my normal 3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes. Unfortunately it didn’t smell as nice on my skin as it did in the bottle. It’s just a case of bad chemistry between the two. The scent is long lasting on me which would be a pro for anyone who loves this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is so good!  It smells so nice once applied to my skin and isn’t overpowering at all.  I received this as a sample from Influenster and I’m so glad I did.  The smell is floral and fruity at the same time.  Very feminine and perfect for day, everyday wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so so good! I received this product for free for review from Influenster. It is such a good smelling perfume. I highly recommend. I need to purchase a larger bottle so I can have it longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! It has such a sweet, girly scent. This is a perfume that I would wear during the day or for a night out. The scent is noticeable but not too heavy. This is one of my favorites for any occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is a little too strong for my taste. The sweetness from the berry smell is strong, but the woody undertones helps to soften that. The parfum lasts a long time, which is good. All in all a decent perfume if you like the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free sample by Influenster. Although I have to say I’m in love with scent! It’s long lasting and isn’t overwhelming!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this sample complimentary of Burberry and Influenster! I actually really love this fragrance! It’s high end, long lasting and glamorous without giving you a headache. It’s slightly floral and sweet. It’s on the pricier side, but you don’t really need to reapply it throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this perfume it smells good it has a fruity and floral scent and it's long lasting which I like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The sweet smell of this perfume is great at first spray. Then the woodsy notes take over. After the perfume sits on your skin or clothes for a few minutes it has a stale expired perfume scent to it.  I absolutely love how it smells at first!! It’s very misleading though because of how the scent changes after a few minutes. It’s almost like 2 perfumes in one. Such a bummer. I had high hopes for this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There hasn’t been a Burberry scent I’ve tried that I didn’t love! This one smells so amazing and throughout the day the smell softens but it’s is still there. I got lots of compliments and questions asking what was I wearing. Even my mom asked and now wants this scent. It is a amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a fresh and vibrant scent that goes a long way without being overwhelming! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Woah girl. I received a complimentary sample of this perfume and I am so impressed. I am sensitive to perfumes, they make me sneeze, and this one didn’t. It’s the perfect subtle feminine perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample as an Influenster Voxbox campaign and I really enjoy the floral scent. It is not overbearing but is delicate & fresh, my guy also liked the scent which is always a plus. This is a great new scent by Burberry I would definitely try a sample if you’re hesitant on buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample... but baby this is it... if I had the money to buy the bottle I would.. it has a mix a floral and girly smell but that grown woman handling busy too it as well .. I like a lot

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this perfume as part of an Influenster campaign. Overall, the scent is nice. It is warm and sweet but also classy at the same time. It was just a little too sweet for my preference though and I don’t think I would buy in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received this product for sampling purposes and I’m so happy I did!! It has a very nice fruity scent to it! I can’t to add it to my collection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I applied it and it smells so sweet and gave me a classy vibe.  My boyfriend loves it so much !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion and review this was  my first time wearing Burberry 'her' I found  it to be very young  the scent top notes were mixed berries with a light vanilla musk floral undertones. I liked that the scent lasted all day without the need to  reapply. I definitely will make this my new parfume. As well as reccomend it to  my friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a sexy, warm, and long lasting fragrance that makes me feel feminine and alluring! When it's first sprayed, I can small the berry notes, and then as out warms up to skin, I notice that it becomes more woody and bold. I like spraying it in my hair or wrists because you don't need to spray a lot to detect it. I would buy this as a gift for a friend or just keep it for me during the fall and winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have always liked Burberry fragrances and this one is really nice! It wore really well on me and I immediately liked it from the first spray. It is not heavy and or overpowering. I am considering buying a rollerball for travel!

reviews.review_title: Long lasting mix of fruity/floral scents
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The mix of fruity and floral fragrances is divine! I love this perfume scent so much-it’s just the right balance and lasts all day long. It’s perfect for a work day or a night out. I received a free sample for testing purposes from Influenster and will definitely be purchasing the full size!

With the first spray, I felt the scent was overpowering. It’s bold with a musky scent at first, but then it settles into a sweet floral. Originally I was not the biggest fan but with a couple more uses the smell grows on you. It’s a great fall fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received small vial of Burberry Her as a sample from Influenster. Upon spraying it my initial thoughts were that it was too fruity/sweet for my taste. After it settle with my body chemistry it smelled more powdery/soft and I liked it better. I got a couple compliments while wearing it, but the smell doesn’t last throughout the day. Definitely dissatisfied with the longevity of the sent. I’d give it a 6/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample and I’m so glad I did. It is light and airy. Has a floral but powder fresh scent. It’s perfect. It smells amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how the Burberry HER perfume smells. I can sometimes be sensitive to perfume fragrances, some of them give me a horrible headache... This is not one of them. It smells really nice, not overpowering but it's definitely noticeable. It's fresh, but also sultry, and just generally beautiful. I received a sample size of this for free to review, but I'm totally planning on buying a full size soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample from Influenster and I couldn’t wait to try it! A lot of perfumes often irritate my asthma however this one did not! The smell was sweet and not too much. The smell lasted throughout the day and I received several compliments on it! I’ll definitely be purchasing a full size !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry “HER” Has a really good woodsy berry scent that I think is perfect for the Fall and Winter months ahead. When I first spray it on it comes out strong but settles down fast and isn’t overwhelming. It’s long lasting and a little definitely goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love sweet perfumes in general but this one was different. Its delicate and sweet yet subtle enough to not overpower. It also has a satisfying clean scent and will mellow out throughout the day. I sprayed some on both my wrist and all day I could smell the light yet floral scent as i moved around. Compare to other burberry perfumes this one is not as overpowering or overly sweet. I would definitely wear this regularly as an everyday scent, its lovely

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complementary sample size of this perfume through Influenster and used after my shower. It has a light floral scent that isn’t over powering. The scent doesn’t linger for a long time so you will have to reapply throughout the day to maintain the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent lasts all day, which is good. But it smells a little too sweet for me. Smells just like fresh berries.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as part of an Influenster sample and I was very excited to try it. I actually really liked a lot of aspects of this perfume. It has a beautiful light floral scent but my one complaint is that it is overwhelmed by a powerful sweet, musky smell. Unfortunately, as the perfume wears, the floral is all but lost and the sweetness really begins to stand out. However, I have to say this is a perfume that does grow on you after awhile. At first I didn't see myself wearing it but upon several days of wearing, I decided that this is a very sexy perfume. I think this is something you could wear out to a club or on a nice date with someone. I don't think I would wear this to work because I think that requires something fresher and brighter. This perfume though is the perfect sultry scent to wear with a slinky dress and bold eyeliner. And this perfume lasts really well, I don't find the scent fading after a few short hours which I find is a common issue with many luxury perfumes. All in all, this perfume is a 4 star find for me. It definitely has a lot of great aspects that I think many people would like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to test this product. I put some on righ before going to work and as soon as I got in, I got so many compliments about smelling really nice. Even after hours of wearing, the compliments kept coming. I absolutely fell in love with the scent that I placed an order for the size. The scent is sweet, with a hint of muskiness . This is probably one of my new faves, right next to Si by Giorgio Armani and princess by Vera want .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this smells! It lasted for a while and I continued to smell good all day. Sometimes I think perfumes tend to smell like they’re for an older generation, but this is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells really good, but it's very strong. I sprayed a tiny bit on my wrist and it's all I've been able to smell all day. The scent lasts all day and it's a nice floral scent, but the next time I use it I'm going to spray it somewhere else.   I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample size of Her Eau De Parfum by Burberry from Influenster to test and I must say it is a very nice, long lasting scent. It has a sweet floral (but not sickening sweet) aroma with a powdery softness to it. I asked my husband what he thought about it and he said the first thing that came to his mind was cute and Hawaii. I feel like it is a good autumnal scent, bridging summer and fall. I sprayed one spritz to my left wrist from about a foot away and it held on for the entire day.  All in all a great scent, long lasting stay, and cute and simple feminine packaging with different price points to suit many!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all I love the pink bottle and packaging. The scent is very unique, you won’t smell like everyone else which I love! It’s powerful and sexy, almost smells like a cologne but more feminine. It’s also pretty long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has a soft sent, I definitely smell the woody part of it, it is similar to a man’s sent, I enjoy the sample but there’s not one I would purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fall in love with the essence is so good sweet and lit sour for daily dates the only thing is thqy should be more last longer. This stays in your skin for maybe half of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume was smooth and strong! I sprayed a very little splash on my wrist and WOW! It has an after smell on my skin I was not a fan of but everybody is different. Lasted a long time! I even tried to wash off and didn’t come off! I would not purchase the big bottle but would recommend to lots of friends n family!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will start off by saying this is not the type of perfume I usually go for but I did enjoy it. Her is sweet perfume but very subtle and not overwhelming. The smell lasted all day which is impressive and I got several compliments on it. I recommend this to try for people who may find some sweet scents too aggressive, it is nicely balanced and feminine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The fragrance is spectacular, in very sweet, has a very rich fruity smell that goes with my personality. When I tried it, it lasted more than 12 hours

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t really place my finger on why I don’t enjoy this fragrance but I definitely do not enjoy this fragrance on my skin. As soon as I sprayed it i don’t like it but sometimes a fragrance will grow on me but that was not the case with this fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells wonderful! Very settled scent and not so over powering. Great for a brunch date with friends or just a casual day shopping. Absolutely love this scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary sample from Influenster, it’s seriously one of the best scents. It’s a subtle sweet definitely something I can wear all season. It smells so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Omg this new Burberry Her smells so good . I love that it has floral and fruity notes like strawberry , tart juicy cherry, raspberry black currant and blackberry . Plus the sultry note of jasmine and the powdery note of violet definately add a special scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just tried my Burberry eau de parfum and I can definitely smell the city of London a beautiful bold and vibrant scent. It does smell very powdery after about 10 minutes otherwise I rather enjoy this perfume and I would purchase this. I feel that this is a rather mid to older age scent appropriate. Very elegant and sophicated. my estimate is it lasts up to 5+ hours. And you can get this perfume at your local Sephora. I received this complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m usually not a big fan of the Burberry line scents for women. But I have to put this up there with my Chanel chance that is my absolute favorite. This is a bit sweeter and has a warmer under tone but I actually really like. I will go purchase this item I like it so much. Since I received this product for free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received as a free sample from Influenster. Definitely a strong fragrance! Floral and very sweet. I think the sweetness overpowers the floral a bit. Lasts a good while and didn’t cause any headaches or irritation. Works well for daily wear and special occasions. Overall if you love super sweet and floral, this is your cup of tea!

Lovely, lovely scent. Perfectly balanced with fresh berry and slightly sweet floral notes. Elegant, but fun and playful. Would be great for women of any age- young to old. Received a sample, but I love it so much that I’m considering buying the full size version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this perfume. I received the small sample size complimentary from Influenster and honestly now I want to go buy a full sized bottle. It is a warm floral smell and would work well for daily wear even.

I always have a really hard time finding scents that I like and that don’t immediately give me a headache. I am really sensitive to most scents, but this one is so sweet, light and refreshing! I really love it and can wear it all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample from Influenster and i have always known Burberry perfumes to be extremely sweet to my taste but I actually enjoyed every bit of HER by Burberry, the berry notes were the ones I perceived easier and longer and made this scent an absolute delight.   I was also very happy it did not trigger a headache which happens to me with very sweet and strong perfumes and that fact makes me consider it for purchase.   If I hadn’t received this complimentary sample by Influenster I don’t think Inwould have even dared to try this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE the smell! Not too floral and feminine even though it is named her. My boyfriend loved the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's a floral fruity smell , I smell the berries more . I feel like it's an everyday smell . Its soft enough , the times that I have wron it I got many compliments .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I expected more since it’s Burberry, but I was a bit disappointed by the scent. It’s a confusing scent with no strong notes coming out to me. It’s described as a blend of berries and wood but it smells a bit more candy/sweet smelling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE the scent of this perfume. It has both floral and citrusy notes that feel really light and fresh. It has a mature scent however and it’s great for professional women! I truly enjoy it and would 100 percent recommend it to anyone who is looking for a new scent to try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to have my first Burberry perfume to try out. The color is a soft pink and reminds me of fall season. I smell hints of floral, fruit, and like described a woodsy scent. I asked a co-worker who is not into wearing perfume because certain scents give her headaches. I asked her opinion on the smell and she likes it, and was impressed it didn't give her a headache. Overall I like the perfume and is a great fall scent. Thank you Influenster for allowing me to try out this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Her Eau de Parfum smells  exquisite. Red and dark berry scent combined with a white woody fragrance. Makes you feel like a queen with it long lasting scent. It is a bit pricey, but worth it. I received a complimentary sample for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great smelling, and long lasting. The scent is very light and airy with floral accents. Definitely crisp for this time of year. Will be buying again in the future. Definitely would recommend to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice scent! Really fresh with a little sweetness and maybe a little bit of musk? I usually don't like musk but I really like this! Stays on for a while, and strong enough that you can smell it while it's on you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this perfume.  I am typically a fan of Burberry scents but can’t get behind this one.  It is very powdery smelling and not my style at all.  It makes me think of an older woman’s scent not someone in their 30’s.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the sample and sprayed the tiniest amount in my hand and it’s all I can smell. It is super strong but so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recived a sample from influenster It is a very soft and pleasant smell, incredible that I only use very little and the smell was very strong, I am falling in love with this perfume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received these products complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes.   This scent is definitely a day perfume. It have a light berry scent with a woody undertone. I love how soft but yet prominent the scent shows up, perfect for date.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m always skeptical to try new perfumes because I have my signature scents, but I’m so glad I received the complimentary size of this from Influenster because I love it! A little definitely goes a long way, so be sure not to overindulge, but the scent is fantastic. It’s not too musky and also has a floral/berry scent, which makes for a great combination. I’ll have to add a full size bottle of this to my perfume collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very aggressive scent. Intense and spicy. It lasts a very long time, and was mildly headache inducing. I prefer a sweeter scent. Would not purchase again, but if you're into a spicy scent then you might like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a complimentary sample size from Influenster to test this product.  I am very sensitive to scents so it can be hard for me to find a perfume I can use without feeling overwhelmed all day. This perfume was PERFECT!!! I sprayed a little bit on my wrist & rubbed them together just to see how I would do with the smell for a day. It was flowery with a smell of something a little stronger but not overwhelming. It was a perfect combination of the two. I used more today and haven’t felt overwhelmed. It such a wonderful scent! Honestly I’m obsessed! I will definitely be grabbing a big bottle of this perfume!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its a sweet smell smells a little cheap as well. Scent was not long lasting.  I would not purchase this because i dont think its worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this in a sample size to evaluate for Influenster.  I am not a big perfume wearer because it is hard for me to find a scent that appeals to me.  After trying this, I was very happy with the overall effect.  the perfume is very feminine and floral, but also clean smelling, not heavy or with loud scents.  My husband is usually fairly sensitive to scents and he really liked this on me.  I would recommend this for someone who likes gentler fragrancesthat are still strong enough to stay all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this fragrance.“ I received this product as a free sample” but I just might buy a full size bottle! My husband loves it and complimented my scent after hours of wearing it. It smells very musky but sexy. Make sure to let it dry or it does smell like a shot of vodka.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is a great scent to wear during the day and even transfer over to the evening. It’s like a pair of shoes that can be dressed up or down. The smell is a very fresh floral with a hint of amber/musk.  It lasted mostly through the whole day, and I only had to refresh just a little in the evening. I received compliments throughout the day and will surely buy this in a larger bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample and was shocked at how beautifully it smelled. This scent lasts ALL day on my skin. It’s floral and woodsy smelling with light fruit notes and it’s not sickeningly sweet which I absolutely love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I generally prefer a parfume that is more crisp and floral, however HER by Burberry is pleasantly light, sweet and a touch floral. This is the first Burberry that I think I could wear all day without being annoyed by the sweet scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only sprayed the tiniest bit on my wrists and the smell was very strong which I like in a perfume.  I don't want to use half a bottle to be able to smell good. The smell has a nice floral/fresh scent that I really enjoy. It isn't too fluffy girly smelling which is what I prefer. I would go out and buy this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this perfume to try from Influenster. I like that this fragrance is light and feminine and a bit fruity, which are the notes I prefer in a perfume. However, when I actually tried it on my skin it changed and almost had a baby powder smell which I did not like at all. I know perfume can smell different on different people, so it may be worth a try for someone else, but unfortunately this scent is not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very sweet scent - almost like candy. It’s nice and somewhat refreshing but too sweet for my preference

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little too sweet of a scent to wear daily, reminiscent of “pink sugar”

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love sweet perfumes but this is not the scent for me. Overall it has a sweet note similar to Dolce and Gabana light blue, but there is a scent mixed in that reminds me of cough syrup.  Overall, not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very picky with perfume and am easily bothered by most scents, but I love this one. I'm almost mad that I like the sample this much because now I want to buy the full product, which is expensive. This might be a new favorite of mine. I recieved this product complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice scent . Pretty fresh and sweet . I got a pretty small sample of it to try it out and the scent was nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great. Long lasting. Fresh, feminine, and uplifting scent. Works well for an everyday scent and is appropriate for work. Highly recommend. Received complimentary from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So this is more of a day to day perfume. It smells very delicate and has a hints of floral and powder. It’s not overpowering and not underwhelming either. It’s the perfect combination of both and it lasts long as well. I think it’s appropriate for all ages to wear. I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this perfume to review. It has a nice floral and citrus scent. It isn’t too strong for either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I expected more from Burberry seeing as they are a luxury, designer brand. This perfume smelled nice but did not last once I put it on. By the time i walked out the door I was asking myself if I sprayed anything on. I will not be buying this scent in the future. Nor will I be recommending to my family or friends. It needs to be stronger for sure+

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free product in exchange for my honest review. I love the smell it reminds me of cotton candy mixed with something dark and sensual. The fragrance lasts all day, through a hard 10+ hour day and constantly washing my hands and I can still smell it on me. It is subtle but still very there if that makes sense. I’d definitely purchase it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with this perfume I got a sample from influenster and decided to wear it to work and received so many compliments all day long! I love how sweet it smells. I will be purchasing this perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample from Influenster and I liked it overall. It smells like roses, candies and unicorns. Too sweet for my taste, and overpowering. It is a nice perfume though, and it lasts for the whole day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The full size bottle is gorgeous, first of all, and I love when a company focuses on the detail of the packaging. The scent itself is amazing, and it smells just as good as I imagined a Burberry scent would. I'm not usually a huge fan of woody scents, but for this parfum, it really made a giant impact without overstating itself. I would recommend to anyone and everyone. It is fantastically made.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not my favorite scent! I would pass. I received this product free to test

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m very picky when it comes to perfumes. I usually go towards sexy and musky smells (VS heavenly, Vera Wang Princess, VS Tease, for example). This perfume is amazing! It’s soft and sexy yet fruity. I’m sooooo in love with it! I’d definitely recommend this to everyone who loves any of the other perfumes listed above. I also found out it smells a lot like Bath and Body Works Snowflakes and Cashmere but with a fruitier scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just had to rewrite this entire review, so I’ll just make it short. When first putting it on, I was pleasantly surprised and intrigued… as it has more of a full-bodied texture in the scent. However, the deep floral, woodsy and blackberry undertones that balance each other are kind of overshadowed by the new recognition of baby powder smell that I can’t un-smell. It’s not bad, but once you smell it you can’t not smell it. I definitely  know people who would like this, so I would recommend it for them, but You should definitely try it before you buy it. This was a sample provided by Influenster, but since it was such a small sample (typical free .05 fluid ounce sample you get from stores), I can’t actually review anything about the packaging bottle or presentation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The perfume smells so good, This will be best for young adults. Smells like a young soul. Very sweet and fruity. Would recommend to everyone I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this perfume. It has a great floral, fruity scent that is perfectly feminine. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 full stars is that the sweetness makes it more of a daytime fragrance and not one that I would routinely grab for a night out. Both my husband and child have told me that I smell really good. Can’t complain about that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is a bit strong for my personal preference. The complexity of it is incredible though. It’s like every time you get a scent of it it changes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complementary sample size of this perfume in my influenster voxbox and i love it. Im going to purchase a full size. The scent is super girly and sweet not too overpowering and definitely lasts all day. I highly recommend this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not exactly sure what it is about this perfume that I hate, but I hated it. You had me at berries, and lost me at musky-amber. Smells very mature to me, not quite masculine as some are claiming though in my opinion.  Def a pass on this one, even if I did receive it complimentary through Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually am very picky with scents. Too floral scents will give me a headache. This does not! This has a great balance of floral, woody, and sweetness. It’s mostly sweet to me. It smells like spring in a bottle while eating gummy peaches. It’s very feminine and cute. I would purchase a full size. Smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes It smells so good! Like a sweet pea with pinch of orange ..it’s very soft but lingering Smells very pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Her was an instant favorite for me! Reminiscent of classic sultry Burberry but balanced and bright. Love the floral notes combined with musk. I will be wearing this forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Burberry Her Perfume,  it has a fruity floral scent. A little goes a long way.  I sprayed this on in the morning and I was still able to smell it in the evening when I got home from work. Was a complimentary from Influenster.

reviews.review_title: Powerful & feminine, but scent changes considerabl
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received ‘Her’ by Burberry in exchange for my honest review. It is no-doubt a powerful feminine scent. It is a spicy floral scent, but not overly sweet, which I like. This scent has lasting power, which is usually a big plus. However, the scent that lingers from this perfume hours later is not similar at all to when you first spray it on (which is a shame)!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just got this in my mail complementary in exchange of a honest review.  I got a sample size, tiny one, which I was a bit disappointed. However, speaking of the scent, it super classic, sweet but not too sweet, smells like fruity scent mixed with some vanilla warm scent.  I really like it so as my boyfriend.  With only one push, the scent spreads around me and it stays for a good couple hours.  If you like fruit or vanilla or looking for a fresh date fragrance, this would be IT.  I think the scent is likeable to most of the people. I just wish I could’ve tried full bottle so that I can have full experience with this cute bottle and that weight of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary voxbox with a sample of this perfume and I love it it smells amazing it has a sweet fruity berry smell with a hint of a powdery scent and it is long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Her Eau Perfum smells amazing. I only sprayed it twice on me and the fragrance lasted almost all day. I like that it wasn't too strong and not too soft. It has a fruity and floral smell to it and I absolutely love it. I see myself buying this perfume in the future. I would recommend to my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has a nice scent at first but I thought it was a little overwhelming after a few minutes. It has a very strong floral scent initially but it also smells heavy and musky. I would say this scent leans toward a more mature smell. I don’t love it and I don’t hate it. I received a sample of this from Influenster to try and I don’t think I will be purchasing a full version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s fruity and sweet and I can definitely smell berries on the first spray and gets a little bit of powdery scent as it sets. It also has a hint of musky scent. This is something that I’ll probably wear in winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i received this free! but holy cow. this scent smells amazing. i will definitely be purchasing. the scent is probably my new fave. would recommend! go bye it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this scent free to sample through influenster. It was a nice, strong scent. It was a mix of floral and sweet fruit. I liked it! It also lasted all day, even through a work out. Very nice perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like the smell of this purfum it last long  I received 1.2mls as a complimentary gift from influenster.

I really had high hopes for this Burberry her perfume but it is reallllly strong. It almost smells like bug spray and a flowery perfume mixed together. And it lasts the entire day! 3 stars for the lasting effect but the scent is much too strong! This is definitely not for me. You may like it if you like really strong flowery scents. If it was a toned down flowery scent with something light and clean smelling, it would be great. But this is not that.

reviews.review_title: Gorgeous scent, love the berry notes!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this perfume & it’s absolutely beautiful & gorgeous! The scent is semi sweet with berry notes but is not overpowering! The scent is light & airy but did last well throughout the day. I love Burberry & everything they design. I have also had quite a few different perfumes from them in the past & this one is definitely a favorite now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample. I put it on before work and others were able to smell it 7 hours later.  The scent was nice,  it was a floral fruity smell upon application,  then as the day went on the musk scent came out.  A nice scent,  but not special enough that I would purchase it myself. Longevity of the fragrance is pretty good though,  that would make me consider trying other Burberry fragrances. 3 stars for longevity and for being a pleasant fragrance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary for testing purposes. I really enjoy the fragrance of this perfume. It had a slightly floral sweet smell, I’m honestly a sucker for jasmine and musk and this combines it SO WELL. Not too strong or overpowering smell at first, it doesn’t take hardly anytime to get the full fragrance after a spritz. I just did yard work and I can still smell the perfume where I blotted it!!! I really want the full size now!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t put my finger on the specific reason why, but this scent is not for me. It almost has a masculine undertone to it, which I like, but it kind of reminds me of walking into an Abercrombie and Fitch in 2007. The longer I wear it, the more it grows on me but I wouldn’t see myself repurchasing the full size. I could also understand other people really liking it!! Again, just not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent!! I really like floral perfumes, and sweet scented perfumes, but sometimes it’s hard to really get the right balance without it being too strong.
