This is the perfect balance. It is sweet and floral without smelling like a cheap body spray or a powdery jasmine perfume. I like to have a variety of scents to match my mood, and I do love a deep sensual scent but also brighter ones as well, and I think this perfectly captures that all in one. I got a sample of this perfume for free to test and review and definitely want to purchase for myself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is very light and fresh. Good for day wear or a night out. It would work amazingly for all age groups and has great longevity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a pleasant fragrance. This is a very feminine and romantic scent that is also fruity. I wasn't overwhelmed by the smell like some others I have tried, this scent is youthful, yet classic. It's a scent that can be worn both day and night, and the scent lasts long after you first spray it on. A little goes a long way, so a bottle of this would last for quite awhile. I was gifted a sample of this perfume from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review. My thoughts are my own and are in no way influenced by anyone else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this from Influenster to try out.  I was really excited and I was hoping I would like it.  The fragrance is too fruity for me.  When I sprayed it on once, all I could think about is sugar.  This is not for me...I don't really like fruity scents.  I wish I could like it, but I tend to lean more towards floral or earthy scents.  Good thing it's a sample, if I got the full size, I won't know what to do with it.  Even if I don't like it, I think a lot of people will, as long as they don't mind the fruitiness of the fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this perfum!! It's sweet, fresh and delicate. I highly recommend if you're looking for a fruit floral scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells clean and the scent definitely lasts long! I could smell it on my wrist the following morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! This has such a rich variety of aromas in it.i smelled hints of Burberry Brit and it smells rich and floral and sweet.i highly recommend this fragrancE. I'm most definitely purchasing this fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent is sweet but not overpowering. Perfect every day fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this scent! It has a sweet berry smell with undertones that are sort of woodsy. Long lasting and smells great!

reviews.review_title: I got a sample of this to try out ...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: and then to give my thoughts on it. I used the tube in one time/sprays. I wish I would have been able to try it out a few times to really see how it wears and to make up my mind on it.  At first spray, its alluring a d not overpowering, it's very feminine and floral with hint of a berry to it. As it dries down it smells musk like. It's a very interesting combo of smells/flavours.  I used it on my wrists,  behind my ears and neck area and it was gone. I would have loved to try it a couple times in my hair, and on my clothes just to get a realistic feel for it.  I love scents and all kinds of them. This is very feminine.  This would be something you could wear to work, or somewhere where you're in close proximity to others without it being too much like some scents do.  The wear time on it seems a bit short.  All in all this will be a nice scent to add to your collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very feminine hence the name lol kind of a powdery floral..which isn't my usual go to but I do like it. lasts a long time which I love... nothing worse than a perfume that fades before you even leave your house. If you like powdery scents this is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm pretty picky about perfume. Burberry Her smells phenomenal! I love it and my husband loves it too. It's delicate, but has great undertones that will last the day. Highly recommend if you like a girly scent that's not overly fruity or floral. I received this free fir testing purposes, but will definitely be a buyer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this sample complimentary for testing purposes.  Fragrance is immediately sweet like cotton candy then mellows out to berry like then softens to something woodsy. Definitely a young person smell. It's fun and light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The smell is sweet and citrusy with a little touch of woody aroma – it last long, took a shower and still smells great! Just buy it if you love sweet perfumes since the citrusy and woody smell goes away after a couple of minutes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The bottle is different from most other bottles. The scent has a more woody scent but with hints of BlackBerry and raspberry. I love the scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is a beautiful light and sweet smell. It reminds me a bit of the Juicy Couture perfume that everyone wore in middle school, but more grown up. Would be great for everyday or special occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received these products complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes.  I love the scent it was floral/fresh. I loved this product, definitely worth getting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got very excited as soon as I sprayed this on me! It smelled quite sweet, like candy. But the smell very soon faded into what smells like basic old, worn perfume...not attractive. Perhaps it wears better on others. I received a sample of this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this scent! I would absolutely gift it to a friend and I would wear it every day if I could! Definitely my favorite and will be purchasing in the future! Also a huge plus, my husband loves it too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary for testing purposes from Influenster . #BurberryHer #Influenster #Voxbox  This fragrance smells amazing ,the top notes are red and dark berries the  Middle notes are floral with a scent of jasmine and the base is  sensual musk-amber!  I would describe this fragrance as a fruity floral gourmand with raspberry, cherry, strawberry, blackberry, blueberry, violet, jasmine, woods, musk and amber. ... The bottle is meant to recall the brand's first fragrance, 1981's Burberrys for Men, but in blush pink. It does smell young, and it does smell blush pink.. Her Eau de Parfum is the embodiment of the Londoner attitude, adventurous, spirited and bold. It's a dedication to the city of London—a beautiful, bustling, creative metropolis that's eclectic and full of life.Burberry Amazing fragrance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this perfume. It’s fruity and musky at the same time. It’s not fruity like I expected. It’s a mature and refined berry scent.  If you want something bright and sweet this is not it. I found it to be a little bit strong when I first applied it. It lasted most of the day and I could still notice it when I got home. If you are looking a new spin on a fruity fragrance you should give this a go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Influenster, and I kid you not, this is the best perfume I have smelled. This is now my favorite, and I will definitely be purchasing the full size! The only way I can describe this is that it smells like a fruity cotton candy! I sprayed it on my pulse points and my husband can smell me from across the room.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this perfume complimentary from Influenster! I just sprayed a little on my wrists, and I really like it! It has a sweet, floral scent,  and a little goes a long way! I can’t wait to buy the full sized product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely fall for perfumes and let me tell you! This scent is PHENOMENAL to say the least. I am definitely picking up the whole bottle as soon as possible! I usually feel perfumes are too strong and I go for body sprays. This changed my mind! Besides my Gucci,  this is my new go to for perfume usage! I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely fell in love with this smell. I normally wear body sprays but this takes the cake. It’s sweet and feminine but not being over powering or pepper smelling. I would recommend bc of the smell but it slightly pricey for a everyday wear

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is so light and subtle but has such a nice floral note to it. My boyfriend said I smell like a garden. I love that it’s not an overwhelming scent, it’s fresh without being too heavy. This will definitely be a bottle I purchase in the future.
This perfume has a super nice scent. It’s fresh, feminine, and fruity. Kind of sweet but not a sickeningly sweet sort of smell. I would definitely purchase this in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the smell of this parfum:) Its very vibrant and full of life! The florals in this are sweet and sophisticated:) the bottle is so gorgeous too! My only complaint is how it didn’t seem to have much silage ( long lasting) like I had hoped for but it’s still a great fragrance for any lady who loves something that’s not too much for the nostrils and or sweet floral lovers!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a trial size to test out the smell, longevity and quality. The smell is so delicious, light yet floral but fresh! Omg it’s like walking outdoors in windy afternoon through a field of smelly beautiful colorful flowers. I think the longevity of the smell could be better. If it lasted longer I’d be a happier camper. But I definitely want the bigger version of it because it’s delishhhh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I would gift this perfume because it is a good blend of fresh and sweet but the scent is not right for me. Reminded me a little bit “Si” by Giorgio Armani at first and then it takes a turns. Great for all seasons. It’s a very interesting perfume for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always loved Burberry fragrances But this one is my very favorite! It’s smells amazing! A deep berry with some woodsy scent it’s great to wear anytime!! *I received a complementary sample for testing purposes*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A beautiful romantic scent - you can really smell the berries at the beginning but has a lovely warm, woodsy undertone that lingers. Has good staying power, but not too strong. Great for all day wear, perfect scent for the Fall/Winter. Will definitely purchase for myself!   I’d received this sample complimentary from Influenster for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really loved this scent, perfect for fall! It’s feminine but not too sweet. Would recommend / would want to purchase more in future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a pleasant fruity scent, and a bit musky. Slightly vanilla-y and spicy to balance the sweet/fruit scent. A very enjoyable, nicely balanced scent overall. Would be good for everyday wear or date night. Good for those who like sweet scents but not overpoweringly sweet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There are so many scents out there that it’s hard to keep up and distinguish them all. I liked this Burberry scent more than 75% similar scents on the market. It’s a sweet, feminine fragrance with even some fruity notes. It lingers longer than I would expect and works well with my skin chemistry. I like the pale pink packaging even if it’s a bit basic. It’s not crazy memorable but it’s pleasant enough for everyday use, especially at the office. It’s a mood lifter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size of this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion.   I really do love the smell of this perfume. On me it smells like berries with a slight baby powder linen and musk smell. It’s a smell I’ve never smelled on me before, but it’s not unpleasant. The only thing that upset me was the size I received. The packaging of the box cost more than the sample. We should have at least gotten a roller ball or travel sized sample. I only have enough for maybe a couple or few days.   Overall, I do like the smell and does seem to have enough strength to last the entire day with maybe a refresher spritz for the evening. I would recommend this scent to a friend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the smell , I highly recommend if you're looking for a fruity floral scent...I didn't even know I liked this kind of fragrance until I tried this and I couldn't be happier. I got more complements than I thought I’m definitely going to buy it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this scent. It's pretty unique its a bit floral and a bit musk. It's a perfect balance of both. My favorite thing about this particular scent is that it has a mature smell. It's not over bearing or to strong. It tends to last all day with possible need to apply again for evening. Overall I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample size of this perfume for testing. It smells nice. A little bit def goes a long way unlike other perfumes and it lasts quite a while. Wish I had gotten a larger bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was actually very intrigued and surprised with this perfume, Burberry has always had light, fruity perfumes but this new perfume took a whole new spin and it worked. It has a very settle but strong combination of berry and white wood which is exactly how i would describe the smell to someone. It’s a settle woodsy aroma that should definitely be tried out! Burberry never disappoints!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this perfume. I’m a collector of musks and love perfume so was so excited to try this. Granted I only had a sample size so only really had it for a few days but I thought it was overwhelming sweet and not musky like it was advertised to me. Certainly smells nice but a little too strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: wow I am shocked I love this scent! it’s a mix between sweet and floral but the floral isn’t over powering. I got the sample size so I will probably buy the full size soon! i’m picky about my scents and really love this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this perfume. I think it is quite different from my other perfumes so it felt like it lasted quite a bit on my skin. It is most fruity, but could also be described as sweet, woody, powdery and musky. Both the longevity and sillage are great and I think this is a nice perfume for a young professional. I was gifted this in a sample size from Influenster, complimentary in exchange for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product. I only got a sample size and I wish I got a bigger bottle. This perfume has a sweet floral smell that lasts all day. It has become my favorite scent! I would absolutely buy a bigger bottle. I would recommend this to a friend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got a complimentary sample size of this for testing and my opinion is its good not great. The scent is very woodsy and a mature scent. I personally like a more floral scent. However, the bottle is gorgeous  and the scent does stay on all day so it is quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume as a sample complimentary. Love the sweet soft sent. Lasted most of the day. Definitely would recommend this perfume. Will purchase this perfume, when I am done with this sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice floral scent that is not overly sweet. It smells very young (more teens-early twenties). It also didn't last as long as I would expect from Burberry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Burberry perfumes, but this is definitely my fave! It still has that cozy, all wrapped up feeling I love, but the added sweetness of the berries really brightens the woodsy scent. I am obsessed! Definitely my new go-to, I will be buying this and adding it to my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Her is such a divine and most pleasant scent. I’ve purchased a lot of perfume and I'm very picky about perfume. This perfume is not overpowering.  I find it just so lovely. You can definitely pick up on the berry notes and it's not overly sweet. It's very well balanced and long lasting too. It would definitively be the perfect scent for everyday use. I absolutely love it!  I received a sample of this product complimentary for testing purposes but all opinions are truthful and my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this sample complimentary from Influenster for my opinion. It’s not the typical floral scent I would usually go for, it’s very sweet and the smell of berries comes through a lot for me, but in a good way. I think it would be a good fall/winter scent. I’m unable to comment on the bottle/packaging because I received a tiny sample size vial, however in the pictures it looks pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received this as a sample and wasn't expecting the pleasant scent when I sprayed it. I will definitely be purchasing this i fell in love with it! One thing I will say is that a little goes a long way i sprayed too much and gave myself a headache lol if you're thinking about getting it go for it. Its a sweet scent mixed with a hint of mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got my sample in the mail today and I’ve already ordered a bottle. I haven’t used Burberry in a good minute and this has just brought me back to it. It’s such a refreshing, sweet, (somewhat addictive) fragrance. Not overpowering, but, it seems to last. It might actually be my new favorite! I definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent, is is sweet but not too sweet or overpowering, very subtle and mellow. I would totally wear this as an every day scent. Pleasantly surprised at how much I enjoyed and loved this perfume! I received this in a voxbox from influenster to sample for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent so much! It smells absolutely amazing and it wears well for any event from holidays to just an evening out with friends. I absolutely would recommend this to anyone looking for a light, charming fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Clean and unique. Definitely my favorite so far from Burberry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This smells really sweet and fresh. You can really smell all the different notes in this, and you only need one spray. it's super strong so be careful with the amount you put on. After a while it does calm down and you're left with this really nice sugar and wood scent. I think this would be the perfect gift for any perfume lover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The overall smell of the perfume is nice. It's floral but ends on a sweet note. Personally I'm not a fan of sweet scents overall so this perfume is not for me. However, it isn't too offputting where I wouldn't wear it. It does take some time to adjust to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free sample for testing purposes and I’m so glad I did. It smells amazing. It’s a nice, soft, daytime fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: BURBERRY’s Her Eau de Parfum is a sophisticated, bold scent! Its berry long lasting fragrance is perfect for every day or evening occasion. Every girls dream! * I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t always been a fan of Burberry fragrance, but this one was a win for me! Light and clean scent that isn’t overpowering, but gives off a beautiful vibe. I received the sample size from Influenster and will likely purchase the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so good! A fresh clean scent but not overpowering. I received this sample free from Influenster but I will definitely be purchasing a full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing perfume, it smells very sweet so if you like more sweet perfumes then this is perfect for you

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells really good! I love Burberry and they definitely didn’t disappoint with this perfume. I will definitely be purchasing even though it’s a bit pricy but it’s worth the price! I definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this scent on first spray. It’s not too feminine at all which I tend to enjoy- the base is definitely a musky but one of the middle notes is jasmine which I looove the smell of. However after about 30 mins of application I started to get a very strong headache (which happens with some fragrances, I am sensitive to smell). I only sprayed one spritz and on the inner part of my elbow so I know I didn’t overapply. It is a very very strong scent and it lasted a decent time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a trial size complimentary of influenster.  This perfume has such an elegant scent it’s floral with a hint of amber really enjoying it. This is perfect for a night out to dinner or a movie

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume by Burberry is beautiful. I love the notes in the scent. Its like a romantic scent to wear on a date night. The scent gives floral feel.  And its good in general.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: just recieved my sample and I'm not sure how I feel about it. I guess I was spoiled by my last sample size and was expecting something bigger. As for the scent, it smells peppery and a bit like a cedar plank. It has a sweet quality but upon first smell.  I'm not too sure. I keep getting whiffs of it as I move around and it reminds me of something...I just cant figure it out at the moment.  *I recieved this sample complimentary from Influenster!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh and girly scent. This has a sweet musk smell to it and isn’t overwhelming. It’s very nice alluring scent. Reminds me of springtime. I like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this product from Influenster and was so excited to try it! Unfortunately, I didn’t love the scent. I prefer light, fresh and clean scents and this scent was just too heavy for me. Though it smelled okay, it reminded me of a perfume my grandmother would wear. I will say that it has great lasting power though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got it as a sample from influenster. Just love the scent. Its not too strong.  It's sweet and kinda floral. Very lady like. Got compliments from my friends.  Love it. A must try perfume. ❤❤❤

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample from Influenster and I can honestly say, I really love it. I’ve been wearing it for a few days, and I’ve gotten so many compliments. It’s sweet, but not too sweet, and there are definitely floral notes, as well. It’s light enough that you can wear it every day, but also be really nice on a romantic date. I’m going to be sad when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item complimentary through Influenster and I was a little nervous to try it. I've had some Burberry scents in the past and they've been a bit strong. However, this scent was so fragrant without being musty or pungent. Such a great fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent. Very sweet but has masculine tones to it. A little goes a long way and is very unique.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this scent. It is light enough to be worn daily, definitely not overpowering. This is the first free complementary sample that I recieved in my #Influenster #Voxbox . This perfume is sweet, seductive and perfect for al day wear. It lasts all day and smells like strawberry sorbet with something extra to add maturity to the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample & I’m in love with the smell. It’s very subtle but long lasting. This is a very sweet smelling perfume, with strong hints of jasmine, cherry, and violet, with the perfect amount of musk. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: light fragrance with long lasting scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: so this perfume smells delicious. I really like that the fragrance is light and floral but still doesn’t smell too much like flowers. I think my only complaint is I have a sample size and once it’s finished I’ll definitely have to buy a full sized bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although this perfume is called “Her”, I think this smell is super androgynous which I love. This perfume has a bold smell to last the whole day which may be a drawback for someone who is sensitive to fragrance. This fragrance is super sexy and definitely will be reserved for a date night or a night out. It’s evenly balanced between berry notes, jasmine and amber making it my new favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells really nice but it definitely smells like a mature scent.  It's really musky and woody.  I liked how it smelled but it just felt like something my mom or aunt would wear.  I actually kept getting compliments from some older women I was around haha.  I think it's a nice scent for evening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sweet scent. It's a mix between Burberry Brit and sweet berries. The smell is not overpowering and is very light. I feel that the actual scent does not last very long on myself though but it could just be me. If you do not like sweet or berry scented perfume I would not recommend this one for you. Overall it is a very nice fresh and sweet smelling perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry always has the best sweet and floral fragrances that aren’t too strong! Love the sleek,pale pink bottle too! Her is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample as a gift from Influenster, and I love it! A perfect fragrance for summer and fall as well. It's fruity, but also has that woodsy/musk scent to it. Will def be purchasing this scent in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this perfume. It's not overwhelmingly strong. Its light, fresh hints of fruity/sweet with some floral. Just one spray or two will do. I get comfortable everytime I wore it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i received this fragrance for free for testing purposes. this fragrance is great ! I love the berry/ woody smell. I would recommend this fragrance. its a thumbs up for me. I would def buy the full size

reviews.review_title: my husband won’t leave me alone now
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: To start off, this review is for a product I received for free for the purpose of reviewing.    With soft floral notes reminiscent of a early summer evening in a garden, and strong fruit undertones (dark cherries and a burst of citrus,) this is an excellent choice for daily or formal wear. The scent is a bit strong, especially on your pulse points, and should be used sparingly.    Due to the nature of my product, I can’t review the packaging, but Burberry is well known for their classic glass designs.   My husband absolutely adores the scent of this perfume, and stated that it is by far the best scent I have ever worn, including Díor and Lancôme scents. “It’s a very sensual scent,” to quote him.  If your bedroom is dead, maybe give this a shot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this Burberry Her perfume! It’s going to be a new fave for me and perfect for end of summer/transitioning into fall since it has the fruity notes but still smells woodsy. Although, I received a free sample for testing and review purposes, I will be purchasing the full size. It smells that good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how the scent is a little fruity and with floral hints without being overpowering. The perfect everyday scent.

reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift from influenster. This perfume smells amazing! It’s a clean and fresh scent. Kinda smells sweet and floral. I would definitely wear it daily!!

reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this perfume and I really like it. It smells sweet but not too sweet also smells a bit floral and towards the end of the smell as it dries it’s a bit spicey. I really like the smell but I am not crazy about it.  I own a Burberry perfume already which is London for women’s. So I was excited to smell this one, as London is my favorite perfume. I really don’t think I’ll purchase this for myself because of the spice at the end but it does last a long time and it does have a nice smell. It’s just not something I’d prefer. I’d like either floral and sweet or just floral. But not all three. I also do not like spicey smells and this gives me a little spicey at the end after it dries.

My husband came in and said it smells sugary like cotton candy. I don’t know where he got that, but if you like the smell of curious then you will love the smell of this!

reviews.review_title: Nice flowery scent, not overly feminine

So I personally wouldn’t purchase this in the future. Not because I didn’t like it, I just prefer Burberry Brit and would recommend that to everyone. They’re similar enough in cost. I’d recommend this if you happen to really want a floral scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

It hints of sweetness and serenity- soft, yet powerful- but not overbearing. I find this scent to be on the girlier side- also meaning, perfect for dates! I think this scent could pass as a year-round scent. And also, seems like a lovely scent for simple outings on any day you may fancy! I recommend.

I was most disappointed to find my sample vial half empty before even trying the product. Even more disappointed that the packaging was so wasteful. Not keen to try this product to be honest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

It’s a beautiful scent, not “old” at all. It’s smells classy (if that’s a thing?) I had been living off of samples for a few months and got so many compliments! Definitely will repurchase this one after I finish it! ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly with perfumes you have to try them in person. Despite the good reviews and described like one of my favorite types of scent, this fragrance makes me extremely nauseous. It’s overwhelming, unpleasantly strong floral no matter how little you put on. It smells generic and boring powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this scent, it doesn’t feel “older” like some perfumes do, and it’s lasts a loooong time. I always get compliments when I wear this perfume

reviews.review_title: Smells great but not on me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the roller ball for my mom because she smelled it in a magazine, and loved it. Then she walked past me one day, and I was like WHAT are you wearing?!? She said the Burberry perfume you bought me. So, I asked to use it, and at first it was bomb, but then I start to feel alil queasy and annoyed by it. But I didn't wash it off or anything because I wanted to love it too lol. Then it happened all over again, mom's walked past, and I was like you smell so good! So, I tried it again, and this time no bueno, I washed it off. I recently gave away a full bottle of D&G the one because it made me feel the same way. Two of the notes in it, that are the same in this are amber & musk. I don't like Amber, but I love musk the two combined is a no go for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume. I’ve become somewhat of a perfume connoisseur recently and had to add this one to my collection after hearing it smelled similar to Baccarat Rouge 540. I bought the fragrance sample box and opened and smelled each one with my kids and when I got to this one both of my kids said “Mmmm I like that one mommy!” I knew it was the one after their reaction! I love the fruity opening and it fades down to a beautiful fresh but slightly sweet powdery scent. I would have to say I wish it lasted longer. I feel it is not an overpowering fragrance compared to some of my other perfumes, it’s a light fresh fruity scent that is beautiful for any time of year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this parfum!! It smells so good and not to over powering. Anytime I wear it people notice and compliment and ask me what scent I’m wearing because they love how it smells. My bf even noticed and said he loves the scent of this parfum on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume!! It smells so nice  and it lasts a long time too! The floral tone makes it a perfect feminine perfume. I love it. ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing scent and long lasting. Worth the money. My favourite go to after My Burberry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

If you’re into fruity perfume this is a go to it finishes with a hit of floral and berries and a little bit powdery but smell really nice. I love to mix this with my Chloe EDP they compliment each other !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

But the smell after dry down for me was too bitter, I ended up washing it off. It perhaps didn't work with my body chemistry. If you're looking for a yummy fruity floral go for My Burberry Blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a sample at the store and I swear to God I cannot stop thinking about the smell. It lasted for a week on my jacket and I could not stop smelling it. It might be a little strong for some people which is why I squirt it once and mix it with some water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a deluxe sample of Burberry Her, and I guess I expected something softer.  There's berries, jasmine (sharp smelling), and musk to soften the jasmine, but I just don't think the jasmine/berries combo works. Even with the musk, it still smells sharp.  Burberry should have just let the jasmine ride, and not tried to mask it so much.  Didn't like on me, would not like smelling it on someone else, won't be buying a bottle.

reviews.review_text: This fragrance smells good at first like fresh strawberries and sugar,  but after like 20 minutes it becomes extremely cloying and heavy, I even had my brother tell me that I smelled puke inducing. The only good thing about this fragrance is it's staying power. Maybe it just doesn't work with my body chemistry, but it's definitely not for me. I'm gonna stick to my Marc Jacobs Daisy Love

This one is the better choice for what I was looking for. It's good for day or night. It can be worn at the office as it's not an overpowering or offensive fragrance.

reviews.review_text: You need to smell this. Heard about it from a blogger, had to go try it right away. A little goes a long way. It’s SO GOOD.

Such a shame, Burberry The Beat used to be my signature scent, but this one is a hard pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

My mom loved it too, so she purchased the large bottle and I got the rollerball version. It smells like a flowery, sophisticated, fruity smell. I usually get VS perfumes for cheap, so the price point seems high, but for luxury perfumes, this is actually is on point. I do wish this came in a spray form rather than rollerball only. Overall, I enjoy this perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I am generally a whatever I like type of person and that includes products of all price levels but I really tend to love the higher priced perfumes and fragrances. Her was no exception. It enjoyed the fruity fresh smell with the light floral undertones. It felt perfect for my age (early 30s) - not too sweet or cloying but also not too powdery or stuffy. My only slightly negative feedback was that I had to apply throughout the day to keep the scent going. For this price, i’d hate to go through the bottle that way just to keep it on my body. Otherwise, definitely something I’d go for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells absolutely amazing and lasts!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells great and anyone who disagrees something must be wrong with their noses!

reviews.review_text: This smells amazing! My favorite perfume right now it is sweet smelling lingers when you leave the room and just has an inviting and seductive sent will be purchasing this product soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was fortunate to try this for free through Influenster. Before I use a new fragrance I always spray it on a piece of paper or something so I can tell if the scent is going to bother me. I sprayed this on the insert that came in the VoxBox and left it on the kitchen table. Later I was sitting in my chair in the living room and started asking my husband what cologne he was wearing and why it was so strong. That day I got a migraine and had to go lay down. The next day I was sitting at table and smelled it again. That’s when I realized it was the fragrance! So to me this smells very masculine and my head told me it was a no go. Glad I was considered to try it but it gave me bad headaches without spraying on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

The scent is strong, but has a sort of musky base that makes it feel almost cologne like despite the floral notes. Would recommend for longwear, but the florals aren’t my favorite. I received this product free from Influenster for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is so classic. And its not overwhelming too so its a good every day scent. My boyfriend loves it and the bottle is beautiful. I will repurchase

As it wears it gets lighter and transforms into a sweet yet sultry scent. It also lasts all day! My husband loves this scent, which is always a bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

I have gotten so many compliments on this scent by my son and my husband and people at work. It almost smells to me a little like the very original Burberry and a little like Burberry Blush mixed together. The lasting power is unreal. I dabbed some on before going to bed and I woke in the early morning and I could smell it and even days later I could smell it on my night shirt. This scent to me is a more casual everyday scent. If I had to put this scent in a category with other scents smelling similar I would say it’s similar to Lancome La Vie Est Belle and Flowerbomb.

reviews.review_title: Yum!  Worth getting a large bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: let me start off by saying i am NOT a fruity floral person at all. i own many fragrances and not one is a fruity floral i just dont like them and they dont settle on my skin very well. i received a sample of this in my order and i am so in love! it had a slight sweetness but its so sensual and warm its not too heavy not too light its well balanced. its a soft slightly sweet slightly fruity jasmine with a beautiful musk and i can definitely smell some amber. this fragrance is very sexy and a very intimate scent. im glad i got a sample because i would never thing to buy this and im ordering a full size bottle now its addictive. smells very expensive and it lasts all day on the skin. as it settles it gets less and less sweet which i love and ur just left with a sexy ambery musky jasmine w a little sweetness its just perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a sucker for clean and sweet scents so upon searching for new fragrances I came across this scent and it most certainly did not disappoint. It has a sweet but soft scent that I absolutely love. This just may very well be another scent to add to my scent family ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I like thi perfume but no. To much musk and wood notes. As for me, it's more homme perfume than femme.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This just didn’t mesh well with my body chemistry. There’s a powdery scent that reminds me of potpourri. Intentionally tested how long how the scent would last and it only lasted for about 2 hours. If you like sweet powdery scents you’ll love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not bad. Like the scent in the store but when took it home it didn’t have the same smell. Maybe I was smelling different scents and got confused. It’s mostly like a sweet scent and it doesn’t seem to last too long. It’s more of a summer fragrance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best perfume I’ve ever used!❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is described as a fruit floral with gourmand notes.  All I get from this is grandma and cotton candy.  It was off-putting and unexpected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s sweet and fresh at the same time. It’s honestly the perfect scent for the summer and winter and I’ll be wearing this perfume everyday moving forward lol my husband absolutely loved it too so catch me wearing for date night for some extra lovin’ lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous on its own and layers well too! Especially with Gucci Bamboo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite fragrance out there right now and the rollerball option makes it affordable until I’m ready to splurge on the expensive bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite scent!! Definitely repurchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful. Smells amazing and does not overpower. Great for spring and summer....we’ll see for fall. Its like the original Burberry but with a sweet touch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this smell. Very light and floral

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best perfumes I've tried in recent years. It's clean and light and it doesn't turn into something strange hours after application.  I am very pleased. I've always been a Burberry fan and this latest perfume did not disappoint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got a Sample of this in my last Sephora Order. I immediately logged on and ordered a bottle. Its light, sweet, yet people ask me ALL the time what Im wearing! This is my daily go to scent. A little goes a long way too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: perfect for daily wear and special events

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume, it smells sweet like fruity cotton candy and the smell isn’t too strong. The best part is how long it lasts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i'm extremely picky about scents and am often reluctant to try new ones because many tend to give me debilitating headaches. Not this one! no matter how much of how often I apply this, I have not suffered from one headache. The scent is really lovely. Not too sweet, not too mature.. Burberry really knocked this one out of the park.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought Burberry Her on recommendation from makeupbycherylh. So happy I did. This perfume is decadent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favourite perfume I have ever owned. The scent lasts forever and I get compliments all the time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample and had to order the full size right away! Amazing smell, feminine and floral but not too sweet.

Absolutely love this perfume!!! I’m always looking for a new scent because I usually get stuck on one kind. However, I received the tester in the mail where you can smell the fragrance prior to purchasing and knew immediately that I needed this fragrance. I went out and bought it the next day. I have had multiple compliments each time I wear it. I definitely recommend this perfume and would even consider it a great gift for the important ladies in your life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my perfect summer scent. smells delicious all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample and will definitely buy it for when I don’t want to wear something as strong as my REPLICA Flower Market. This smells like the grown-up version of the Britney Spears Curious Perfume from 2000.  Light and not headache inducing.

reviews.review_title: MY NEW FAVORITE FRAGRANCE! FRESH FRUITY FLORAL
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry has done it AGAIN! HER is a real winner and it was love at first spritz! If you enjoy a FRESH, CLEAN FRUITY FLORAL, it doesn’t get much better than this. The scent is so pretty, not overwhelming like some floral fragrances. It makes you want to lean in and get closer. If you are looking for a new signature fragrance, this might be it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I get so many compliments when I wear this, it's light but has rich complexity in the scent. I only need one spritz and find it's surprisingly long-lasting. I switch between this, Flowerbomb and Ralph Lauren Romance (I find they have similar notes) but I get the most compliments when I wear this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is amazing. I LOVE it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very approachable every day scent. Its soft and feminine. I can smell the berries when I first spray it but it dies down quite quickly so I would say this perfume is more of a floral musk and not fruity floral.   I’m not usually a fan of jasmine in my fragrances but this is quite lovely and is softened by the amber musk.    This is something that I would classify as being a signature scent because you could easily wear it to work, in the evenings for a night out and its light enough that you could just wear it running errands without feeling overly done up. Decent lasting power like most Burberry fragrances. Medium silage.   I got this as a sample but I’m going back for the rollerball... maybe even the full bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can't stress enough how much I love this scent. It's light, clean and incredibly sexy. I get complimented every time I wear it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot even describe how good this smells.  This smell is so unique and really sticks to you all day.  I have gotten countless compliments telling me I smell good since starting to wear this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent.  It's very sweet at first, and as time goes by, it becomes a warm, musky fragrance.  It has great staying power too ~ lasts all day on me.  It has become my favorite Date Night fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so good!! Soft and sweet smell, you can use a very small amount and it’ll last!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent so much. It's very pretty, but it DOES not last on me. Not on my skin, not on my clothes. For 100 dollars it should last more than two hours, but I have to constantly reapply. I even had someone sniff to see if they could smell it on me (in case I went nose blind) and nothing. Really disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The most wonderful smelling perfume. Very light and sweet. Will definitely restock once I run out of the one I have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just bought this and I am in LOVE. It smells amazing. I don't like floral/powdery scents at all. There is a light floral note to this, but the musky base makes it smell delicious. If you like Black Opium you will probably like this, too. This is my new go to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a completely new scent for me and I absolutely love it. It is a unique fragrance that I would describe as feminine and slightly sweet. It is beautiful and lasts throughout the day. This was a great purchase. You can't go wrong with Burberry. All of their fragrances are amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow was so happy when this perfume arrived   waited a long  time for its arrival     I received a 30ml bottle for a reward   and let me tell you darlings  the scent extremely  femine   and pleasing to the soul  my only gripe  is  this gorgeous  fragrance  has no staying power

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! The best perfume that I have ever smelled. I smelled it on my friend and the next day I went and bought it. The scent lasts long and it just smells divine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have no idea how to find or buy fragrances. The ladies working there instantly brought me over to this and honestly it's one of the best smells my nose has ever encountered. It smells good enough to eat (would not recommend doing though). Definitely feel like I am now a part of those communities of ladies walking around and other people are wondering what they are wearing. Her. I am wearing Her, thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like raspberries. Scent is long lasting. Might be too sweet for some but I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so nice and i get so many compliments from friends when i use it. It isnt too overpowering but if feminine and sexy. Normally I wear Daisy by Marc Jacobs but I wanted  to try something different. If you like Daisy youll most likely like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this from my partner for 8. March, and I was quite surprised, because I wanted it but I already have crazy amount of parfumes and wouldn't buy it myself :)   It is one of the rare parfumes with jasmine that I like, because it's not too heavy and overpowering. The scent combo is unusual and weird, but it smells great on me - he is sniffing my hairline even as I write this :)   It stays on for decent amount of time - I sprayed it in the early afternoon and now it's evening, and it's still there. I have already added it to my (not so small) list of favourites.

reviews.review_title: Didn't mix well with my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never had issues with a scent not mixing well with my skin. That changed when I got a sample of this, for some reason only after a few minutes of spraying it became a bit sour and very cheap smelling on me. Would recommend getting a sample before buying the bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful scent, love wearing it and received lots of compliments while wearing it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always have a hard time finding perfume to match my chemistry. This one is by far the best and works the best with me. 10/10 worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had been dreaming of this perfume ever since it came out but didn't dare buying it before I got to smell it in person which took months. But once I did and once I tried it, it was all over: I just had to get it. I got the rollerball at first because, well, budget! But ended up buying the small bottle not long after as well. It has a nice sweet scent that isn't too overpowering. It has a nice staying power without having to put more than a small spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the scent! I honestly believe every woman should smell like this, its sweet but floral, very light and elegant. The only issue I had and it was what made me return the item is that the scent would not last 20 min on me, and that has never happend to me before with a fragance. I believe its because this one has a lot of natural ingredients. But I recommend  testing it out in the store before buying it ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG!!! I have most of the Burberry perfumes, and I loved Blush for a long long time...BUT, after I smelled HER, I knew this was going to be my absolute favorite!  It’s DELICIOUS! Fruity, a bit floral. It has a sweetness that smells like a fruit/pastry dessert baking. Plus, it reminds me of Spring. Warm like being outdoors in the fresh air with hints of blooming flowers on the wind. Idk, it’s just gorgeous. If you haven’t smelled this yet, please do! The wear time is decent as well. No regrets here!

reviews.review_title: GREAT, UNIQUE GROWN UP- GIRLY PERFUME
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Stunning fragrance, makes you feel more beautiful and feminine. Comparable to Givenchy Hot Couture EDT but longer lasting and more appealing, and modern. Love this new perfume by Burberry and the pink chic bottle really fits the theme and perfume style! Lasts about 8-10 hours on me. Not great projection but enough for people to notice in a room with them, and not overbearing whatsoever! Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume. I work in Fragrance. I have yet to find anything like this. Everyone smells watermelon when I spray it on. It is super refreshing, and very different then Burberry’s other women’s scents for sure. I strongly recommend! Ill definitely buy it again and again. Good to have in the collection for casual wear. Very sophisticated. Though it comes across fruity it does not smell like a cheap fruity scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is THEE perfume to get!!! My husband has made me well aware of the many scents that can give people migraines... this does not - it’s a PERFECT blend of berry, jasmine, and musk. This perfume is light enough for sensitive olfactories, yet has long-lasting and delicious scent. I’m super excited that, after 9 years of marriage, I can finally wear perfume again!  ... Thanks to Sephora for giving samples, I was able to get this scent “approved” by my husband as he cannot even walk into the store without getting a migraine. He bought the large bottle for me this Christmas.  SEPHORA, PLEASE KEEP CARRYING THIS SCENT!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVEEEEE THIS SMELL! its a nice subtle smell that lasts long! I got this as a sample at first but then purchased it because it was sooo yummy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This parfum has an amazing floral scent that I adore but I would not buy a full bottle because of the overwhelming baby powder scant that takes over after a while. That powdery scent is all I end up smelling for the rest of the day (and it will last all day). It's a shame because the notes are perfect but it really does smell like I bathed myself in old school scented powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells beautiful. Love it :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing!! Scent lasts all day!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i have the roller ball and the lotion. it’s soo sweet smelling which i love.  my husband was in the water closet with the door closed and i walked by. he yelled out “i smell cookies”. lol. he likes when i smell sweet. the rollerball lasts all day on me even without putting on the lotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was looking for a new fragrance since 1 year. This is definitely my favorite ever!! Love it! Not too strong smell. I have dificulty with a lot of perfumes smelling too much but this one is subtil and last all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: best perfume in the collection right now. amazing scent. lasts all day just awsome

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing scent! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am not usually a perfume person but this smells so incredible! I have been wearing it everyday and I it is a new stample in mybag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love! I got this as a sample with purchase and loved it instantly. It’s my favourite scent. It is a long lasting scent. I’m buying another bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The **BEST/most unique fragrance I've tried in a long time! It's strong yet subtle and sweet/sexy with an addictive lingering scent that lasts for hours! Have never received so many compliments on a perfume before. 10/10 would recommend for any fragrance lovers out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I took a risk and bought this online without smelling it and I'm so glad I did! This is a beautiful scent not too light and not too strong. It's very elegant and blends with my skin very nicely. It also lasts very long on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Extraordinary scent. Love, love, love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's something you have to smell for yourself. It's so unique. I smelled so many perfumes today at Sephora and as soon as I smelled this I was like OMG I have to buy it. It has such a unique scent, similar to the way Si and Black Opium do but in a more feminine way. It's bold. It's amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing scent!! I bought elsewhere as Sephora didn’t have it yet and happy to see it’s available here. This scent drives me wild, can’t get enough of it! Definitely in a class of its own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with that parfum instantly! I was looking for unique parfum that would be my new signature and I definitely found it!
